original: [1a1] // slob dpon yon tan 'od gyis mdzad pa'i 'dul ba mdo ba'i lags so / shri la
analyzed: R slob dpon tan od gyis mdzad pai dul bai mdo bai

original: a ka ras bris ga xiv.1 vinayasūtram guṇaprabha (62 patra)
analyzed: a ka ras bris ga xiv vinayasūtram guṇaprabha patra

original: Vin_1.2 / sarvasmin* sannipatite saṃghe kṛtedaṃ veṣaṃ nipatya pragṛhītāñjalim utkuṭusthaṃ
analyzed: sarvasmin sannipatite saṃghe kṛta idam veṣam nipatya pragṛhīta añjalim utkuṭu stham

original: vṛddhāntaṃ yācivantaṃ trir jñapticaturthena karmaṇā saha pravrajyopasaṃpadāv upanayeyur iti purākalpaḥ /
analyzed: vṛddha antam yācivantam tris jñapti caturthena karmaṇā saha pravrajyā upasaṃpadau upanayeyuḥ iti purākalpaḥ

original: Vin_1.3 / niśritasya kañcid bhikṣuṃ tatropādhyāyatayā pravrajyopasampadau /
analyzed: niśritasya kañcid bhikṣum tatra upādhyāya tayā pravrajyā upasampadau
pṛṣṭvā āntarāyikam pariśuddhāya pūrva upādhyāya tvena avakāśam kuryāt
na anupapannasya pūrvam upāsaka tva śrāmaṇera tva bhikṣu tvānām uttaram
śaraṇa gati abhyupagama vacana upakramam upāsaka tva śrāmaṇera tva abhyupagama vacanam kurvīta

original: Vin_1.8 / svayam upāsakatām upanīyārocakāya saṃghasyārpayet* bhikṣave /
analyzed: svayam upāsaka tām upanīya arocakāya saṃghasya arpayet bhikṣave

original: Vin_1.9 / kañcit pariśuddhya tīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham ā[1b3]rocayet* /

analyzed: sarva sannipātena vā saṃniṣaṇṇe nu layanam vā
avatāryatām cūḍā iti pṛṣṭena anujñāte tām

original: Vin_1.23 / kañcit pariśuddhyatīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham upanayet* /
analyzed: kañcid pariśuddhi atīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham upanayet
rahaḥ nuśāsaka karmakāraka niḥśraya dāyaka pāṭhakāḥ ca

original: Vin_1.27 / abhyupagatāv u[1b5]pādhyāyasya yājñāyāṃ tad udbhūti /
Vin_1.28 / āvṛttau tṛtīye ṅśe ntyāyāṃ vṛttatvaṃ /
analyzed: āvṛttau tṛtīye ṅśe ntyāyām vṛtta tvam
tat yathā para utkīrtana kāle śrāmaṇera tvasya
paryantaḥ niḥśreya dānasya eka rātram niḥśraya tvena pratyupasthānam
na a pāṭhana abhiprāyeṇa uccāraṇe pāṭha tvam

original: Vin_1.36 / nānuktvā sahitam arthahetor nāma gṛhnāmīty upādhyāyanāma gṛhnīyāt*
analyzed: na an uktvā sahitam artha hetoḥ nāma gṛhnāmi iti upādhyāya nāma gṛhnīyāt

original: Vin_1.38 / upādhyāyatāyām unmukhībhūtaḥ karmakārakam adhīcched raho nuśāsakañ ca bhikṣuṃ /
analyzed: upādhyāya tāyām unmukhībhūtaḥ karma kārakam adhīcchet rahaḥ nuśāsakam ca bhikṣum

original: Vin_1.40 / sa svayam enaṃ tricīvaram adhiṣṭhāpayet* /
analyzed: sa svayam enam tri cīvaram adhiṣṭhāpayet

original: Vin_1.42 / supātram ity anevaṃ brūyuḥ sarve /
analyzed: su pātram iti an evam brūyuḥ sarve

original: Vin_1.43 / apakasite ka ity ākhyāpya raha nuśāsakam utsāhya karmakārakaḥ saṃghaṃ yenam anujñā..payet* /
analyzed: apakasite kaḥ iti ākhyāpya raha nuśāsakam utsāhya karma kārakaḥ saṃgham yenam anujñāpayet

original: Vin_1.45 / tiṣṭha mā śabditā gamiṣyasīty enam uktvā samanuśiṣṭa iti saṃghāya pariśuddhiṃ nivedya kim āgacchatv ity āgamanaṃ pṛcchet* /
analyzed: tiṣṭha mā śabditā gamiṣyasi iti enam uktvā samanuśiṣṭaḥ iti saṃghāya pariśuddhim nivedya kim āgacchatu iti āgamanam pṛcchet

original: Vin_1.55 / hemantito graismiko vārṣiko mitavārṣik. dīrghavārṣika iti /
Vin_1.63 / sa[m*]pannatāṃ samyagtayā ca prepsitasyotgrāhya śīlasāmānyagatatārāgaṇe niyuñjīt* /
analyzed: sampanna tām samyak tayā ca prepsitasya utgrāhya śīla sāmānya gata tārā gaṇe niyuñjīt
saṃpad samāna tām an ākhyāta samātta parijñānasya ācakṣīt

original: Vin_1.70 // nānavalokya niḥśrayaṃ niḥśritaḥ kāraṇīyaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: na an avalokya niḥśrayam niḥśritaḥ kāraṇīyam kuryāt

original: Vin_1.72 / dantakāṣṭhavisarjanaṃ sopavicāre vihāre cetyam abhivandanaṃ /
analyzed: dantakāṣṭha visarjanam sa upavicāre vihāre cetyam abhivandanam

original: Vin_1.73 / ekānnaṃ pañcāśavyāmaparyantād vihārato gamanaṃ [2a5] pātracīvarakarmaṇo
analyzed: eka annam pañcāśat vyāma paryantāt vihārataḥ gamanam
glāna upasthāne kokṛtya prativinodane pāpaka dṛṣṭi gata pratiniḥsarge tīvram autsugyam
āpadyeta ahovata aham kuryām kārayeyam vā iti

original: Vin_1.74 / praṇidhātukāme saṃghe ho vata saṃgho syedaṃ praṇidhikarma na kuryād iti /
analyzed: praṇidhātu kāme saṃghe ho vata saṃghaḥ sya idam praṇidhi karma na kuryāt iti

original: Vin_1.76 / parivāsamūlaparivāsamānāpy amūlamānāpy āvartaṇārthini niḥśraye ho vata saṃghasya parivāsādi catuṣkaṃ dadyād ā[2a6]bṛhet iti /
Vin_1.77 / so py etad asmai kuryād utsṛjyāvalokanaṃ /
analyzed: saḥ api etat asmai kuryāt utsṛjya avalokanam
na ūna daśa varṣe upasaṃpadā upādhyāya tva niḥśraya tva a niḥśrita vāsān kuryāt
na a samanvite kenacid an antarebhyaḥ samāyogena
glāna upasthāna kaukṛtya prativinodana pāpaka dṛṣṭi gata pratiniḥsarga anabhirati sthāna pramīlanānām karaṇa kāraṇe sīmā artham
utpatti prajñapti anuprajñā pati pratikṣepa abhyanujñā abhijña tvam
saha grāhaṇa pratibala tvena niḥśrayasya aniḥśrayasya vā

original: Vin_1.101 / cared a[2b3]niḥśritaḥ pañcavarṣaḥ paścimasamayogena samanvitajanapadacārikaṃ /
analyzed: caret pañca varṣaḥ paścima sama yogena samanvita janapada cārikam

original: Vin_1.103 / māsi tīrthya iti pravrajyārtham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcched upasampādakāś ca /
analyzed: māsi tīrthyaḥ iti pravrajyā artham upasaṃkrāntam pṛcchet upasampādakāḥ ca

original: Vin_1.104 / nānārādhitacittam utsṛjya śākyam āgneyañ ca jaṭilaṃ tīrthyaṃ pravrajayeyur upasaṃpādayeyur vā kṛte tattīrthyānārādhitāditīrthyānta[ra]varjam*
analyzed: na an ārādhita cittam utsṛjya śākyam āgneyam ca jaṭilam tīrthyam pravrajayeyuḥ upasaṃpādayeyuḥ vā kṛte tad tīrthya an ārādhita ādi tīrthya antara varjam

original: Vin_1.105 / ratnānāṃ varṇasya [2b4] tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasyoktāv akupyatvamārādhitacittatā /
analyzed: ratnānām varṇasya tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasya uktau akupya tvam ārādhita citta tā

original: Vin_1.106 / tadartham atadvan tam enaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayed* saṃgho datvā parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
analyzed: tad artham a tadvān tam enam kṛta upāsaka tā antam caturaḥ māsān parivāsayet saṃghaḥ da tvā parivāsam karmaṇā

original: Vin_1.110 / paripūrṇapañcadaśavarṣo sīti pravrajyartham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
analyzed: paripūrṇa pañcadaśa varṣaḥ si iti pravraji artham upasaṃkrāntam pṛcchet

original: Vin_1.111 / nonam asamarthaṃ kākoḍḍāyane samartham vā [2b5] saptavarṣaṃ pravrajayeyuḥ /
analyzed: na ūnam asamartham kāka uḍḍāyane samartham vā sapta varṣam pravrajayeyuḥ
na ekatas ūrdham śramaṇa uddeśam upasthāpayet

original: Vin_1.113 / aruciś ced anekadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ pravrajyātiriktam upasam*pādayet* /
analyzed: aruciḥ ced anekadhyam pravrajyāyām pravrajyā atiriktam upasampādayet

original: Vin_1.114 / ūnaś ced anyasmā upaniśrityartham arpayet* /
analyzed: ūnaḥ ced anyasmai upaniśriti artham arpayet

original: Vin_1.116 / upasaṃpādayed aprayacchato balād ādāya kṛdhāsaḥ /
Vin_1.117 / vyasiste kasyacit kicid deyam alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā /
analyzed: vyasiḥ te kasyacid kicid deyam alpam vā prabhūtam vā
tābhyām adūra deśam pravrajyā apekṣaiḥ sapta aham dhārayet

original: Vin_1.120 / nānārocitaṃ dūradeśam apy enaṃ saṃghe pravrājayet* /
analyzed: nānā rocitam dūra deśam api enam saṃghe pravrājayet
yuktam pravrajyā apekṣasya saṃghena bhakta dānam

original: Vin_1.122 / kṛtānujñāte so mātapitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūradeśakaṃ /
analyzed: kṛta anujñāte saḥ māta pitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūra deśakam

original: Vin_1.123 / māsi glānam ity upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
Vin_1.124 / mā te glānyaṃ kañcid astīti vā /
analyzed: mā te glānyam kaścid asti iti vā
na asti asya prarohaṇa dharma tā iti ca

original: Vin_1.132 / pāñcavidhyam asya jātyā pakṣāsaktaprādurbhāvīrṣayāpatkṛta iti /
analyzed: pāñcavidhyam asya jātyā pakṣa āsakta prādurbhāvi īrṣayā āpad kṛtaḥ iti

original: jānato kṛtatāṃ vidher upasaṃpado prarūḍhatām vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghe na sā[3a2]rdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tatvaṃ /
analyzed: jānataḥ kṛta tām vidheḥ upasaṃpadaḥ prarūḍha tām vā dvitīyāyām saṃghe na karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūta tāyām

original: Vin_1.135 / samāttedaṃ pravrajyasya taddṛṣṭer nikṣipyedaṃ cīvaran tena dhvajena tatrāruṇodgamane tattvaṃ /
analyzed: pravrajyasya tad dṛṣṭeḥ nikṣipya idam tena dhvajena tatra aruṇa udgamane tattvam

original: Vin_1.143 / caturṇāṃ [3a3] pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ /
analyzed: caturṇām pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ

original: Vin_1.144 / bhyupapataḥ syāc cet sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānaṃ /

analyzed: hasta chinnāḥ pāda chinnāḥ aṅgulī phaṇa hastakāḥ

original: / khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo tha vā manaḥ /
analyzed: khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjaḥ vā manaḥ

original: / strīchinnā bhārachinnā mārgachinnāś ca ye narāḥ /
analyzed: strī chinnāḥ bhāra chinnāḥ mārga chinnāḥ ca ye narāḥ

original: / tālam uktā kandalichinnāḥ evaṃrūpa hi puruṣāḥ pratikṣiptā maharṣiṇā /
analyzed: tālam hi puruṣāḥ pratikṣiptāḥ mahā ṛṣiṇā
saṃgrāhya gatam samāptam ca pravrajya vastu
na rathakāra caṇḍāla pukkasa tadvidhān pravrājayet
hāridra keśāḥ hari keśāḥ harita keśāḥ tathā eva ca

original: / avadātakeśāś ca ye narā nāgakeśā akeśakā /
analyzed: avadāta keśāḥ ca ye narāḥ nāga keśāḥ akeśakā
ghāṭā śirāḥ badra śirāḥ ati sthūlāḥ cipāṭakāḥ
khara sūkara śīrṣāḥ ca dvi śīrṣāḥ api a śīrṣakāḥ
khara sūkara karṇāḥ ca eka karṇāḥ akarṇakāḥ
kāca akṣāḥ budbu dakṣāḥ ca eka akṣa api an akṣakāḥ
hasti nāsā aśva nāsāḥ goṇa margaṭa nāsakāḥ
khara sūkara nāsāḥ ca eka nāsāḥ a nāsakāḥ
hasti joḍāḥ aśva joḍāḥ goṇa margaṭa joḍakāḥ
hasti danta aśva dantāḥ goṇa margaṭa dantakāḥ
khara sūkara dantāḥ ca eka dantāḥ adantakāḥ

original: / atigrīvā agrīvāś ca skandhākṣā api kubjakāḥ /
analyzed: atigrīvāḥ agrīvāḥ ca skandha akṣāḥ api kubjakāḥ
ati dīrgha ati hrasvāḥ ca kriśāḥ ca ati kilāsinaḥ

original: / caturbhiś ca chavivarṇaiḥ khelā vikaṭakās tathā /
analyzed: caturbhiḥ ca chavi varṇaiḥ khelāḥ vikaṭakāḥ tathā
na jāti kāya duṣṭam pravrajitam upasthāyet
yujyate na ekasya eka upādhyāyasya ekena vacasā upādanam ātrayāt

original: Vin_1.155 / na dvyaṅgulād ūrdham āraṇyakaḥ keṣān dhārayet* /
analyzed: na dvi aṅgulāt ūrdham āraṇyakaḥ dhārayet
na etat arvāk tvāt grāma antikaḥ

original: Vin_1.161 / kārayeta vraṇanimittam arūṭṭāv anyathā vijñān* sthavirasthavirān avalokya /
analyzed: kārayeta vraṇa nimittam arūṭṭau anyathā vijñān sthavira sthavirān avalokya

original: Vin_1.163 / nānyatra kāye .. kṣurabhāram vā nakhachedaṃ bhajeta vāsimukhaṃ vā /
analyzed: na anyatra kāye kṣura bhāram vā nakha chedam bhajeta vā asi mukham vā

original: Vin_1.165 / bhajeta lekhaṃ malāpakṛṣṭyai na cīvareṇa keśaśmaśrv avatārayet* /
analyzed: bhajeta lekham mala apakṛṣṭyai na cīvareṇa keśa śmaśru avatārayet

original: Vin_1.170 / avatārayeta prasādādau jīrṇo glāno vātātapavarṣeṣu ca /
analyzed: avatārayeta prasāda ādau jīrṇaḥ glānaḥ vāta ātapa varṣeṣu ca

original: Vin_1.174 / nānadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇyaiṣā puruṣeṇāvītarāgā keśāṃ chedayet /
analyzed: na anadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇyā eṣā puruṣeṇa a vīta rāgā keśām chedayet

original: Vin_1.175 / saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān* [3b5] smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin* pūtikaḍevare sāram astīti /
analyzed: saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin pūti kaḍevare sāram asti iti

original: Vin_1.176 / matṛsaṃjñāṃ bhaginyā duhitur veti kalpakaṃ /
analyzed: matṛ saṃjñām bhaginyāḥ duhituḥ vā iti kalpakam

original: Vin_1.178 / pañcāṅgikam vā śaucaṃ na nagnaḥ snāyāt* /
analyzed: pañcāṅgikam vā śaucam na nagnaḥ snāyāt

original: Vin_1.179 / na bhikṣuṇī puruṣatīrthe na strītīrthe cūrṇena /
analyzed: na bhikṣuṇī puruṣa tīrthe na strī tīrthe cūrṇena

original: Vin_1.183 / na bhikṣuṇī yoṣiti cūrṇaṃ kṣipet* /

analyzed: na a pratichanna vaktrayā vṛtim bhajeta

original: Vin_1.189 / patrāṇy abhāve dattvo pūrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca pratigupte pradeśe snānaṃ /
analyzed: patrāṇi abhāve pūrataḥ pṛṣṭhatas ca pratigupte pradeśe snānam

original: Vin_1.197 / neṭṭanotgharṣeṇa kāyaṃ śodhayet* pādābhyām anyaṃ /
Vin_1.200 / na kiñcit kenacid āmuṣṭi celavarter bhikṣuṇy utgharṣet* /
analyzed: na kiñcid kenacid āmuṣṭi cela varteḥ bhikṣuṇī utgharṣet

original: Vin_1.203 / abhāve muhurtam u kuṭukena sthitvā snātraśāṭakena pocchanaṃ /
analyzed: abhāve muhurtam kuṭukena sthitvā snātra śāṭakena pocchanam

original: Vin_1.206 / bahiḥsaṃvṛttasyāntarviśālasya samudrākṛter vātā nasya mokṣo madhye /
analyzed: bahis saṃvṛttasya antar viśālasya samudra ākṛteḥ vātāḥ nasya mokṣaḥ madhye
dvāre kavāṭa argaḍa kaṭakāyām a paṭṭa samāyojannam
tapta jala sthāpana artham abhyantara pārśve kapotamā karaṇam
agnikaraṇa sthāne bhūmau iṣṭakā stāra dānam
jvalati agnau a klamāya praveśa pariharaṇam

original: Vin_1.219 / tṛṇo bhūmer āstaraṇamātrair autpattikenārdratvena temanena vā /
analyzed: tṛṇaḥ bhūmeḥ āstaraṇa mātraiḥ autpattikena ārdra tvena temanena vā
chidreṇa upanivartya sūtrakeṇa asya āsthāpanam upadhivārikeṇa gupte
an āśāya snapayat cīvarāṇām iṣṭakā avabaddha garta karaṇam
śiṣṭānām ati uṣṇa tāyām jalasya ārocanam

original: Vin_1.232 / madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānam ajñātam atraitgato nirjñānārthaṃ pṛcchet* /
analyzed: madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānam ajñātam nirjñāna artham pṛcchet
sārdham vihāri antevāsikaiḥ atra parikarma karaṇam

original: Vin_1.240 / pīṭhaśuktayoś caukṣatāṃ kṛtva nikṣepo yathāsthāne /
analyzed: pīṭha śuktayoḥ caukṣa tām nikṣepaḥ yathāsthāne

original: Vin_1.241 / sarvatraiṣa bhāṇḍe vidhiḥ sarvam upakaraṃ suguptakelā[y]itaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: sarvatra eṣa bhāṇḍe vidhiḥ sarvam upakaram su gupta kelāyitam kuryāt
anitvarā atra pūrvatra ca śraddhā abhisaṃhitā
na siṃha samaḥ sṛgāla samam uttiṣṭheta
paramaḥ duḥśīlā api ācārya upādhyāyān upatiṣṭheta
mātṛ ā pitṛ glānān ca āgārikam api

original: Vin_1.265 / na yatra kvacana pādau prākṣālayet* /

analyzed: upasthāpayet kaṭhillam mṛd mayam hasti pada budhna ka arṇikāvantam

original: Vin_1.271 / madhye saṃniveṣṭayā kadambapuṣpākārayā kharayā ca /
analyzed: madhye saṃniveṣṭayā kadamba puṣpa ākārayā kharayā ca

original: Vin_1.275 / pātranirmādanādi yatra pradeśe vihāre kuryāt tasyā mārjanam udakena pralepanam vā /
Vin_1.278 / na vidyate ratnārthatāyāṃ pralipter ākārasya niyamaḥ /
analyzed: na vidyate ratna artha tāyām pralipteḥ ākārasya niyamaḥ

original: Vin_1.281 / trīṇi pātrāṇi jeṣṭham madhyaṃ kanīyaḥ /
Vin_1.282 / śeṣeṇordhabhāgāntānantarād aṅguṣṭhodarāt pakvatanḍulaprasthasyordhaṃ vā tad dvayāṃ māgadhakasyodvāhi sasūpasavyañjanasyaitan nyāyyaṃ
analyzed: śeṣeṇa ūrdha bhāga anta anantarāt aṅguṣṭha udarāt pakva tanḍula prasthasya ūrdham vā tat māgadhakasya udvāhi sa sūpa sa vyañjanasya etat nyāyyam

original: Vin_1.283 / [4b6] na bhikṣuṇy ūrdha bhikṣukanīyaso dhārayeta /

analyzed: trapu maṇḍalakasya an ayātrā niṣāde dānam

original: Vin_1.293 / notthitaḥ pātraṃ karṣet prakṣipec choṣayed vā /
analyzed: na utthitaḥ pātram karṣet prakṣipet śoṣayet vā

original: Vin_1.297 / na cocaṃ na hastamukh[o]dakaṃ dadyāt* /
analyzed: na cocam na hasta mukha udakam dadyāt

original: Vin_1.307 / u[5a2]ttiṣṭhator vihāraparigaṇayor na khananena bhitteḥ /
Vin_1.312 / lambanam asya kāntārikayā vṛkṣe sādhu /

analyzed: kakṣayā asya nayana mālayanakam da tvā

original: Vin_1.320 / na tulyāvalambānām āsv ālayanakānāṃ niveśam upayuṃjīta /
analyzed: na tulya avalambānām āsu ālayanakānām niveśam upayuṃjīta
saṃkoca asaṃpattaye na mata dānam madhye
chidrasya etat asādhu guḍa jatu sittha trapu śīsaiḥ
sādhu paṭṭikā kīlikā thiggalikā magara dantikābhiḥ

original: Vin_1.333 / tailena ghṛṣṭirāsitthasādṛśyāl lohena kuruvindena vā /
analyzed: tailena ghṛṣṭiḥ āsittha sādṛśyāt lohena kuruvindena vā

original: Vin_1.335 / avaguṇṭhya bhūrjena mṛdānulipya pākasya madhyasya /
analyzed: avaguṇṭhya bhūrjena mṛdā anulipya pākasya madhyasya

original: Vin_1.336 / ghṛṣṭis tailena guḍamṛdamṛnma[5a5]yasya bhujyamā tve pākyatvaṃ māsaṣaṭkānte /
analyzed: ghṛṣṭiḥ tailena bhujyamā tve pākya tvam māsa ṣaṭka ante

original: Vin_1.338 / varṣāś cetad virūkṣaṇe mrakṣitatvena kāryāntarāle sya saṃyojyatvaṃ /
analyzed: varṣāḥ ca itat virūkṣaṇe mrakṣita tvena kārya antarāle sya saṃyojya tvam

original: Vin_1.344 / bhasmanaḥ pūrayitvā sādhu bhedanaṃ ghaṭabhedanakena /
analyzed: bhasmanaḥ pūrayitvā sādhu bhedanam ghaṭa bhedanakena

original: Vin_1.348 / piṇyākena gomayena vā liptābhyantareṇa upagataśoṣeṇa /
analyzed: piṇyākena gomayena vā lipta abhyantareṇa upagata śoṣeṇa
kṛta parikarmāyām bhūmau āstṛta tuṣāyām avakīrṇa rucira dhūma karaka piṇyāka ādi dravyāyām tasya adhas bilam

original: Vin_1.354 / sāmantakasya prāṇa[5b1]kānām anukampayā sammārjanaṃ sekaś ca /
Vin_1.355 / prarohasya parivyañjanam ajñāto varṣāgrasyopasaṃpadyaṅgīkaraṇaṃ vyājenāsya pratyavekṣaṇaṃ /
analyzed: prarohasya parivyañjanam ajñātaḥ varṣāgrasya upasaṃpadi aṅgīkaraṇam vyājena asya pratyavekṣaṇam

original: Vin_1.359 / darśanopavicāra enam avakāśane sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇābhimukhaṃ vragṛhītāñjaliṃ* /
analyzed: darśana upavicāre enam avakāśane sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇa abhimukham
vastu karma upasthāpaka parihāreṇa enam parīccheyuḥ

original: Vin_1.363 / daharam apy abhāve vṛddhataram āpṛcchet* /
Vin_1.365 / nānavalokya tajjātīyaṃ parikarmayet tena vātmānaṃ /
analyzed: na an avalokya tad jātīyam parikarmayet tena vā ātmānam

original: Vin_1.366 / nirdoṣam abhāve pravṛttaparyeṣanasya niḥśrayārhasyāniḥśritasya vāse /
analyzed: nirdoṣam abhāve pravṛtta paryeṣanasya niḥśraya arhasya a niḥśritasya vāse

original: Vin_1.369 / [5b3] viśramyākantuko dvitīye tritīye vāhni niḥśrayaṃ gṛhṇīt* /
analyzed: viśramya akantukaḥ dvitīye tritīye vā ahni niḥśrayam gṛhṇīt
nirdoṣam an āpṛṣṭau gatasya karma ādāne para tad āgatau

original: Vin_1.374 / nirjñāya vṛttajñānaparivārānugrāhakatvaṃ prasnādināsya grahaṇaṃ saṃvaravat* /
analyzed: nirjñāya vṛtta jñāna parivāra anugrāhaka tvam prasnādinā asya grahaṇam saṃvara vat
prapīḍya ubhābhyām pāṇibhyām ubhau pāda talau

original: Vin_1.378 / tatt[ai]vopādhyāy[e] niḥśritatvaṃ tasmād agrahaṇam asya tatra /
analyzed: tad tā eva upādhyāye niḥśrita tvam tasmāt agrahaṇam asya tatra

original: Vin_1.383 / trir divasena niḥśritam upasaṃkrāmet tadvihārasthaḥ /
analyzed: tris divasena niḥśritam upasaṃkrāmet tad vihāra sthaḥ
poṣadheḥ r dva tṛtīye r yojaneṣu
na niḥśritam avasādana arha na avasādayet

original: Vin_1.389 / anālāpo navavāda upasthānadharmāmiṣair asaṃbhogaḥ prārabdhakuśalapakṣasamucchedo niḥśrayapratipraśrambhaṇañ ca /
analyzed: an ālāpaḥ nava vādaḥ upasthāna dharma āmiṣaiḥ a saṃbhogaḥ prārabdha kuśala pakṣa samucchedaḥ niḥśraya pratipraśrambhaṇam ca

original: Vin_1.391 / kusītasya durvacaso nādṛtasya pāpamitrasya ca /
analyzed: kusītasya durvacasaḥ na ādṛtasya pāpa mitrasya ca

original: Vin_1.393 / anādṛtau bhikṣoḥ praguṇīkaraṇā[5b6]ya prayogo bhijñasya /

analyzed: sarvathā niṣkāśanam a karaṇīya tāyām layanāt

original: Vin_1.399 / pariśrāvaṇakuṇḍike datvā sāntarottarañ ca śrāmaṇerasya /
analyzed: pariśrāvaṇa kuṇḍike da tvā sa antara uttaram ca śrāmaṇerasya
na upabhogyasya ante vṛkṣasya kuḍyasya vā

original: Vin_1.409 / pramaṇam asya dvādaśakād aṅgulīnāṃ prabhṛtyāṣṭakāta) /

analyzed: ā catuṣka uttarāt abhāve bahu ślaṣmaṇaḥ
na ayukta tvam vijanasya layane kaṭhillakasya upare
parasparam asya a tīkṣṇa tāyai ghṛṣṭiḥ

original: Vin_1.419 / na tīkṣṇena dantaṃ jihvāṃ karṇañ cotghṛṣet* /
analyzed: na tīkṣṇena dantam jihvām karṇam ca utghṛṣet

original: Vin_1.422 / nāprakṣālya digdhaṃ mukhamalena pradeśam a[6a3]vaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ yavanaṃ chorayet* /
analyzed: na a prakṣālya digdham mukha malena pradeśam vā pāṃśunā danta jihvayoḥ yavanam chorayet

original: Vin_1.425 / uccārapraśrāvakheṭasiṃ*ghāṇakavāntam viriktam a[p]y anyac ca /
analyzed: uccāra praśrāva kheṭa siṃghāṇaka vāntam viriktam api anyat ca

original: Vin_1.426 / nirmādanasyāto pi saṃpattir ūṣāḍukagomayād api /
analyzed: nirmādanasya atas saṃpattiḥ ūṣa āḍuka gomayāt api
cetyam anantaram kāya karaṇīya anuṣṭhānāt vandeta

original: Vin_1.429 / ato nantaraṃ kālyam upasaṃkramya vandanaṃ /
Vin_1.438 / sāhyaṃ ced abhirucitaṃ tenaiva saha praveśaḥ /
analyzed: sāhyam ced abhirucitam tena eva saha praveśaḥ
ca ityādi vandanāyām ūṣa āḍuka udaka ahi upanayaḥ

original: Vin_1.454 / asammatam utthānakārakatvena grihītasammārjanīkaṃ dṛṣṭvālpotsukaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: asammatam utthāna kāraka tvena grihīta sammārjanīkam dṛṣṭvā alpa utsukam kuryāt

original: Vin_1.461 / śanaiḥ saṃ[6b1]prajānan* praviś[e]n niṣkrāmec cāsaṃgharṣayaṃ dvāraśākhe /
analyzed: śanais praviśet niṣkrāmet ca a saṃgharṣayam dvāra śākhe
avṛddhau kuśale na anyatra tat kara

original: Vin_1.478 / tadupasaṃhāraḥ vyutthāpanāyām āpatter ānulomikājīvitapariskārasaṃpattau codyogaḥ /

analyzed: sārdhanvihāri antevāsika upādhyāya ācārya samāna upādhyāya samāna ācārya ālaptaka sam laptaka saṃstutaka saṃpremakam glānam upatiṣṭhet

original: Vin_1.482 / [6b3] sā hy aśaktau niḥśritaṃ yena pravṛttiḥ /

analyzed: upasthāyakam asya abhāve dadīran na antāt

original: Vin_1.491 / yānakachatrāro[6b4]paṇādikārān enam udiśya kuryuḥ sāṃghikāt* /
Vin_1.493 / deyatvam ā[bhy]ām āttasya tenāmṛtyau sati vibhave /
Vin_1.495 / nārthyām asya dharmāñ cājñāṃ vilomayet* /
analyzed: na arthyām asya ca ājñām vilomayet

original: Vin_1.499 / sāṃghikād enam asau māraṇāśaṃkāyāṃ śayanāsanād utthāpya [6b5] pautgalike niveśayeta /
analyzed: sāṃghikāt enam asau māraṇa āśaṃkāyām śayana āsanāt utthāpya pautgalike niveśayeta
tad kārya tvam tad kṛta saṃkleśānām tad mṛta cīvarāṇām dhāvanasya
saṃghasya tad sthavira saṃnipāte pūrva gamaḥ syāt

original: Vin_1.509 / drutaś cet* syād āgamaya yāvat sthavirāgaccha[6b6]tītenaṃ brūyuḥ /
analyzed: drutaḥ ced syāt āgamaya yāvat brūyuḥ

original: Vin_1.510 / pāṇyudakadāne ca gatatve bhyavahārāyāsti cet* kālaḥ -
analyzed: pāṇi udaka dāne ca gata tve abhyavahārāya asti ced kālaḥ
asati atra upaveśe sya āsanam muñceran

original: Vin_1.513 / duḥprāvritatve durnivastatāyāṃ vā sauṣṭhavārtham anayor nimittam asmai kurvīt* /
analyzed: duṣprāvrita tve durnivasta tāyām vā sauṣṭhava artham anayoḥ nimittam asmai kurvīt

original: Vin_1.515 / asaṃpattau svayaṃ nainān* saṃlāpayen navakān* /
analyzed: asaṃpattau svayam na enān saṃlāpayet navakān

original: Vin_1.516 / yatreṣām vihārāraṇyayor vṛttis tat vṛttaṃ grāhayen niyuñjī /
analyzed: yatra eṣām vihāra araṇyayoḥ vṛttiḥ tat vṛttam grāhayet niyuñjī
āgantuka pratyavekṣya āvāsikānām ārocayet śayana āsana artham

original: Vin_1.518 / gamiko diksārthāvāsaśayanāsanaṃ sahāyakāBś ca glānyena pahāyitvena tolayitvā prakrāmet* /
analyzed: gamikaḥ diś sārtha āvāsa śayana āsanam sahāyaka abū ca glānyena pahāyi tvena tolayitvā prakrāmet

original: Vin_1.519 / sarva paścāt mā kasyacit kiñcit pramuṣitam ity apetya dūram utsārayet* /
analyzed: mā kasyacid kiñcid pramuṣitam iti apetya dūram utsārayet
an uddhatā an unnaḍatvai navakām pratisthāpayet

original: Vin_1.523 / varṣopagato nusaṃjñā ya vihāram apratisaṃskurvataḥ saṃskārayet* /

analyzed: parṣad gatān sarvaḥ kathā eṣitāyām ānulomika dharma upasaṃhāreṇa anugṛhṇīt

original: Vin_1.528 / akaraṇe niṣṭau vā dharmyām ebhyaḥ kathaṃ kṛtvedam asmākaṃ saṃvidyata iti brūyāt* /
analyzed: akaraṇe niṣṭau vā dharmyām ebhyaḥ katham kṛtvā idam asmākam saṃvidyate iti brūyāt
gamana ādi atra yathā ait kuryāt

original: Vin_1.540 / anuddhataḥ kule syād anunnaḍā[7a4]n avasthitaḥ /

analyzed: dāna dama saṃyama brahmacarya vāsa upoṣadha śaraṇa gamana śikṣā pada grahaṇeṣu enān niyuñjita
sarvatra āpatti mukha bhūte prasthāne smṛtaḥ pratipadyet
ehi svāgata pūrva priya ālāpi abhigate syāt

original: Vin_1.548 / gṛhī cet* dharmyām asmai kathaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: gṛhī ced dharmyām asmai katham kuryāt

original: Vin_1.549 / [7a5] anāgacchaty atra grāmāntikas saṃrañjanīyaṃ yathāśakti pravartayet* /
analyzed: an āgacchati atra grāma antikaḥ saṃrañjanīyam yathāśakti pravartayet
saṃmārga śayana āsana prajñapana pānīya sthāpana cāraṇaḥ bhakta niḥsargān navakaḥ kuryāt

original: Vin_1.552 / upagacched vilomāṃ parijanakriyāṃ na cet svaparopaghātāya /
analyzed: upagacchet vilomām parijana kriyām na ced sva para upaghātāya

original: Vin_1.553 / asmai cec chaktau samucchidyaināṃ dharmyām utpādya tayā saṃjñapayeta /
analyzed: asmai ced śaktau samucchidya enām dharmyām utpādya tayā saṃjñapayeta

original: Vin_1.554 / bhaṅge praroge vā tannidānaṃ parijanasya pratisaṃska[7a6]raṇaṃ /
analyzed: bhaṅge praroge vā tat nidānam parijanasya

original: Vin_1.557 / saṃghārāme parādhyāṃs tathā kuryād yathā svayaṃ grāhikayā grahaṇaṃ gaccheta /
analyzed: saṃgha ārāme parādhyān tathā kuryāt yathā svayam grāhikayā grahaṇam gaccheta

original: Vin_1.558 / agacchantam anārocya sahasā kasyacit kumāramitrāmatyabhaṭṭarājaputrapādamūlikān* grāhayitvā śuddhikāyāṃ parṣadi nihanyāt* /
analyzed: a gacchantam an ārocya sahasā kasyacid kumāra mitra amatya bhaṭṭa rājaputra pādamūlikān grāhayitvā śuddhikāyām parṣadi nihanyāt

original: Vin_1.560 / upasaṃpady anyasya tadyācanādau karmakartuḥ [7b1] atrācayas saṃghaḥ /
analyzed: upasaṃpadi anyasya tad yācana ādau karma kartuḥ saṃghaḥ

original: Vin_1.562 / śikṣamāṇātvaṃ nāma striyām aparaṃ parva /
analyzed: śikṣamāṇā tvam nāma striyām aparam parva

original: Vin_1.564 / śrāmaṇerikātvabhikṣuṇītvayor antarāle varṣadvayañ caraṇasya kālaḥ /

analyzed: tad ūna upasaṃpad kāla ādi ādikaḥ prarohasya
dvādaśa tvam varṣāṇām upasaṃpadi ūḍha tāyām ādiḥ
na a labdha brahmacarya upasthāna saṃvṛteḥ upasaṃpad
na asti asyāḥ prarohaṇa dharma tva iti ca
āntarāyikasya a praṣṇe pratijñāne syā asataḥ dāne

original: Vin_1.606 / na puruṣānukṛtitvaṃ striyā stryanukṛtitvaṃ ca puruṣasya vyañjanāntaraprakāraḥ /
analyzed: na puruṣa anukṛti tvam striyāḥ strī anukṛti tvam ca puruṣasya vyañjana antara prakāraḥ
ākṣipta tvam asya hasta chinna ādinā
ca an ābādhikānām glānena ca itareṣām
pitṛ vat pitṛ āśaya tve nujñāyām rājā
parigrahītroḥ anujñāna dhāraṇa ārocaneṣu pitṛ tvam
dūṣaka tvam a brahmacaryeṇa svādayatoḥ aparājitve

original: Vin_1.619 / arhatvaṃ pravrajy[o]pasaṃpador upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti /
analyzed: arha tvam pravrajyā upasaṃpadoḥ upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyām yoṣiti
pṛcchā prāyam praja vastu gatam samāptam ca pravraja vastu

original: Vin_2.8 / śikṣā pratyācakṣe buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ sūtraṃ vinayaṃ mātṛkām ācāryam upādhyāyam āgārikamāndhārayaśramaṇoddeśaṃ ṣaṇḍkapaṇḍakaṃ  #
analyzed: śikṣā pratyācakṣe buddham dharmam saṃgham sūtram vinayam mātṛkām ācāryam upādhyāyam āgārika māndhāraya śramaṇa uddeśam ṣaṇḍka paṇḍakam

original: steyasaṃvāsikaṃ nānāsaṃvāsikam asaṃvāsikaṃ tīrthikaṃ tīrthikāvakrāntagaṃ mātṛghātakaṃ
analyzed: steyasaṃvāsikam nānāsaṃvāsikam asaṃvāsikam tīrthikam tīrthika avakra anta gam mātṛ ghātakam
pitṛ ghātakam arha ghātakam saṃgha bhedakam tathāgatasya antike duṣṭa citta rudhira utpādakam

original: alaṃ me yusmadvidhaiḥ brahmacāritiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsena vāsabhogena ceti pratyākhyānavacanāni /
analyzed: alam me yusmadvidhaiḥ brahmacāritiḥ sārdham saṃvāsena vāsa bhogena ca iti pratyākhyāna vacanāni
praviṣṭa sparśa svi kṛtaḥ praśrāva karaṇasya
a saṃcetita naṣṭa prakṛti avarsthākām a praviṣṭa tve

original: Vin_2.19 / nāgupto divā pārśvaṃ dattvā middham avakramet* /
analyzed: na a guptaḥ divā pārśvam dattvā middham avakramet

original: Vin_2.21 / baddhadvāraparivṛtasthatvam ārakṣitatvaṃ bhikṣūṇā grathitatvam adhonivasanasya /
analyzed: baddha dvāra parivṛta stha tvam ārakṣita tvam bhikṣūṇā grathita tvam adhas nivasanasya

original: Vin_2.22 / na yatra striyā kāmyeta tatro[8a5]pasaṃkrāmeta /
Vin_2.23 / na yatrāmanuṣo sparśāyodyataḥ tatra nivaset* /

analyzed: nikṣipya śaucam kṛtvā bhojana caitya vandanam
maṇeḥ asya praviṣṭa tā tad antar

original: Vin_2.36 / pradeśasyāsyād aṣṭatvaṃ daṣṭatā śūnyatvaṃ klinnatā śaṭitatvaṃ khāditatā prāṇakair iti vikopitatā /

analyzed: na madhya channa tve gamyasya api apahrāsaḥ

original: Vin_2.38 / aprajñāne ca sandheḥ pāṭitasya madhyāsevyasya saṃhitasya /
analyzed: aprajñāne ca sandheḥ pāṭitasya madhya āsevyasya saṃhitasya

original: Vin_2.43 / anyayor api parakīyayoḥ paratra samāyojane /
Vin_2.49 / tad antyoktāvantaraṇam abhisaṃhitaṃ yenā[8b2]ntaritasya na sarveṇa sarvam asaṃbhāvanaṃ spṛṣṭeḥ /
analyzed: tat antya uktau antaraṇam abhisaṃhitam na sarveṇa sarvam a saṃbhāvanam spṛṣṭeḥ
anyena antarita tvam a spṛṣṭi praveśeṇa vyākhyātam

original: Vin_2.53 / kupitatvaṃ śikṣāyāḥ sevāṃ prati parasyābhyupagatau /
analyzed: kupita tvam śikṣāyāḥ sevām prati parasya abhyupagatau
sphoṭāt aṅga jātasya rasa a saṃvitau

original: Vin_2.61 / hastena hastaṃ pādena pādaṃ sandhinā sandhiṃ* vastinā vastim atyaghaṭṭane /
analyzed: hastena hastam pādena pādam sandhinā sandhim vastinā vastim ati aghaṭṭane

original: Vin_2.63 / dādudantaśailavastram apadhītikopakrāntāv indriyamātrasya ced avanāmaḥ /

analyzed: na prakṛtyā karmaṇya tvam apakrāma kṛt
na agra pṛṣṭhayoḥ yatayā ambhaḥ tatas nyatas niṣṭhāne

original: Vin_2.70 / na śiṣṭair api mārgair upakramiṣya iti /
analyzed: na śiṣṭaiḥ api mārgaiḥ upakramiṣye iti

original: Vin_2.73 / na mārge nyatvasaṃjñānaṃ vimatir vā /
analyzed: na mārge nya tva saṃjñānam vimatiḥ vā
kaṇṭhe ca akāmam ārtayā ca lambane

original: Vin_2.78 / na śūnyāḥ purastāt praśrāvaṃ kurvītraḥ /
Vin_2.79 / na yatra prāṇātyayāpātas tatrāraṇye prativaset /
analyzed: na yatra prāṇa atyaya āpātaḥ tatra araṇye prativaset

original: Vin_2.80 / na yatrāṅgajātādānabhayan tāṃ nagno nadīn taret* /
Vin_2.87 / nāpāvṛtadvāre gāre bhikṣuṇī samāpadyeta ca /
analyzed: na apāvṛta dvāre gāre bhikṣuṇī samāpadyeta ca

original: Vin_2.96 / bhavaty adhiṣṭhātur apātrāgatīye svāmitvaṃ asatvam āśayānubandhasyābhyavahārāya dāne /
analyzed: bhavati adhiṣṭhātuḥ apātrāgatīye svāmi tvam asatvam āśaya anubandhasya abhyavahārāya dāne

original: Vin_2.98 / nān abhiyoktṛsvatvam abhiprayuktānāṃ davadahādibhir ādānārthaṃ mṛgapakṣisarīsṛpā[ṇā]ṃ /
analyzed: abhiyoktṛ sva tvam abhiprayuktānām dava daha ādibhiḥ ādāna artham mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpāṇām
svabhāvakaḥ lika viśvāsa cittaiḥ param vijñāpya

original: Vin_2.106 / sthūlam asminn akāye mūlasya cet* /

analyzed: asvīkṛtau ca gopana nāśana varbha unsarga ādau viyojane

original: Vin_2.117 / na kīlān mokṣo nāvaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ /
Vin_2.120 / sthānottamātikrānti<<ḥ>> dravyo tu mena nimajjane /
Vin_2.121 / nayane sā matir yāsmin yaś cādvāre /
analyzed: nayane sā matiḥ yā asmin yaḥ ca advāre

original: Vin_2.122 / cyutir apakāśane pārśvādhārasya pārśvāntareṇa [9a4] sīmnaḥ /
analyzed: cyutiḥ apakāśane pārśvādhārasya pārśva antareṇa sīmnaḥ
tatra rūpam cāṭa sphoṭita pekhā varṇa antara sandhi vyavadhayaḥ
vivecanam āmuktā asya bhūmyāḥ a tad atikrāntaḥ śulkasya

original: Vin_2.129 / manuṣyasya saṃkete na cet tatsaṃpattiḥ /
Vin_2.134 / pūrvam anugacchad upaharator hāninivṛtyaprakramapraveśo kośair na tadāttasya /
analyzed: pūrvam anugacchat upaharatoḥ hāni nivṛti aprakrama praveśaḥ kośaiḥ na tad āttasya

original: Vin_2.139 / tarapuṭakātikramaḥ pratisrotaḥ niṣpattiḥ svakarmāntasya tadarthaṃ vyadhiketarasyātu chandena parakarmānteṣv ambhasaḥ /
analyzed: tara puṭaka atikramaḥ pratisrotas niṣpattiḥ sva karmāntasya tad artham chandena para karmānteṣu ambhasaḥ

original: Vin_2.148 / na mukte nyadīyātikrāmaṇaṃ na hāraḥ /
analyzed: na mukte nyadīya atikrāmaṇam na hāraḥ
na a saṃcetita atikrāmaṇa a saṃpatyai na pateta
na sa śulka karaṇīyaḥ unvoḍhim bhajet
na a viśvasanīye viśvasta tām bhajeta

original: Vin_2.169 / pṛyo sau manāpo gurur bhāvanīyaḥ pūjyaḥ praśasyaḥ pretāgrahaṇena /
Vin_2.170 / kuryāt pratikarmaṇā karma puṇyabuddhyā ca /
analyzed: kuryāt pratikarmaṇā karma puṇya buddhyā ca
an anumajje svāminaḥ pratisaṃsta rogāyām upanibandhanam
na ananujñātāt glānena tat bhaṣajyam pācet

original: Vin_2.178 // na saparigrham anujñā[t]o nyena kalpena svīkuryāt* /
analyzed: na sa parigrham anujñātaḥ nyena kalpena svīkuryāt
yuktam pātra cīvarasya sphuṭena api grahaṇam

original: Vin_2.183 / nāsatsaṃbhāvanā vā hy utsṛṣṭam ity amahājanapratyakṣam adhitiṣṭhet* /
analyzed: na asat saṃbhāvanā vā hi utsṛṣṭam iti a mahājana pratyakṣam adhitiṣṭhet
avamūrdhakam nipannāya uparidānam pāda antāt prabhṛti

original: Vin_2.188 / na svayaṃ kṣaṇvīta kṣāṇaye[d] vā /
Vin_2.189 / pratiśamanam eva dantakā[9b5]ṣṭho .. koṣāḍukagomayamṛdāṃ yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ dhāraṇam akāmaṃ saṃbaddhenāpahṛyamānasya bhikṣoḥ śrāmaṇerasya  #
analyzed: pratiśamanam eva koṣāḍuka gomaya mṛdām yathā sukha karaṇam dhāraṇam akāmam saṃbaddhena apahṛyamānasya bhikṣoḥ śrāmaṇerasya
yatra asya viṅśati parva tvam tat āśritya
na alpatvena asya nyūnatvena antargata tvam
vināśya apahṛtau tat avasthasya hāra vastu tvam

original: Vin_2.209 / prayogo vyaṃsanaṃ dyūtena cet* jitatvabhūtaṃ /
analyzed: prayogaḥ vyaṃsanam dyūtena ced jita tva bhūtam
cita kāyam iti a kaniṣṭha kṣepāṇām

original: Vin_2.222 / nihitanikṣepasya saha ced vyācanena pañcāc cātaḥ purastāc cet prayogāntaratvaṃ /
analyzed: nihita nikṣepasya saha ced vyācanena pañcāt ca atas purastāt ced prayoga antara tvam

original: Vin_2.223 / nāśanaṃ sthūrāṃ chedo māraṇañ ca /

analyzed: sthūla kṛtvam sīmā ākāśasya śulka bhaṃktau
nirdoṣa tvam ṛddhi nayane nya sīmnaḥ ca

original: Vin_2.232 / na prasajya bhañjanaṃ ca hāraḥ /
Vin_2.238 / ekatvañ cāpaścimād ato tra dravyasya /
Vin_2.245 / bhrātṛvat saṃgho na tadarthaṃ hāro na svīkāraḥ /
analyzed: bhrātṛ vat saṃghaḥ na tad artham hāraḥ na svīkāraḥ
na apakrameṇa ādāna niścaye vā śiṣṭaiḥ hṛtau tad ga tvam
na aṃśa svīkāra icchā anādāna abhiprāyaḥ
na tad gata karma anuṣṭhānam na tasya

original: Vin_2.250 / na sārdhamvihāritvaṃ antevāsitā ca hārā[10a5]nutthāne kāraṇaṃ /
analyzed: na sārdhamvihāri tvam antevāsi tā ca kāraṇam
na sthitam maryādā saṃcāraṇasya anena ākṣepaḥ

original: Vin_2.253 / samakṣānte py anābhāsitvaṃ hāraḥ vaśīkṛtatvaṃ phalāt grahe manuṣyasya /
Vin_2.255 / na hāre yad abhisaṃhitaṃ tatsaṃbandhād anābhisaṃhita(ṃ)
analyzed: na hāre yat abhisaṃhitam tad saṃbandhāt an abhisaṃhitam

original: Vin_2.256 / sthūlaṃ yo yat gṛhṇīte tasya tad iti vyavasthāyām anyahāre /
analyzed: sthūlam yaḥ yat gṛhṇīte tasya tat iti vyavasthāyām anya hāre

original: Vin_2.259 / grāsānupradānena nayatāśvam adhirūḍhena caivam eṣa hartavyam iti kāyaviprakāre /
analyzed: grāsa anupradānena nayatā aśvam adhirūḍhena ca evam eṣa hartavyam iti kāya viprakāre
mātṛ pitṛ bhratṛ bhaginī upādhyā ācārya sthūpa saṃgha ādau saṃkalpya

original: Vin_2.271 / nirāgraham iti svapratyavekṣitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhṇīyāt* /
analyzed: nirāgraham iti sva pratyavekṣitam kṛtvā gṛhṇīyāt

original: Vin_2.274 / nānuṣitas tatra vārṣike cīvarāṃśe vayateta /
analyzed: na an uṣitaḥ tatra vārṣike cīvara aṃśe vayateta

original: Vin_2.275 / na hartur dānapaticittena pratigrahe doṣaḥ /
analyzed: na hartuḥ dānapati cittena pratigrahe doṣaḥ
na āgama stainya caurāt a dhvaja baddhakāḥ gṛhṇīyat

original: Vin_2.281 / mūṣikāpahṛtasya ca svasyādāne nyabhikṣvarthasya tad arthaṃ /
analyzed: mūṣika apahṛtasya ca svasya ādāne nyabhikṣu arthasya tat artham
abhidrutasya lubdhakeḥ mṛgasya āśramam praviṣṭasya ādāne
na a vijñām asya an uktau mṛtyau pratyanīka tvam

original: Vin_2.288 / maraṇārthād enam anuṣṭhānād upasthāko vārayet* /
analyzed: maraṇa arthāt enam anuṣṭhānāt upasthākaḥ vārayet
na artha arthe parasya mṛtyum ākāṃkṣayet
a karaṇīya tvam cittam na a karaṇīya karaṇa anumodanasya
viṣa cūrṇa garta dāru naṣṭa prakṛti preṣaṇoḥ a skanda pattra kūṭa vetāḍa mantra prayogānām pātanasya
sthūlam abhisaṃhitasya mātṛ garbhayoḥ kukṣi marde

original: Vin_2.302 / adhivāsanāyāṃ tu tan nimittaṃ vadhapravṛtt[e]ḥ /
analyzed: adhivāsanāyām tu tat nimittam vadha pravṛtteḥ

original: Vin_2.303 / tvan nāmnā maraṇopakaraṇaṃ dadāmīti cokteḥ /
analyzed: tvat nāmnā maraṇa upakaraṇam dadāmi iti ca ukteḥ
anya ghāte vā tiraścaḥ nirmitasya api

original: Vin_2.305 / nānuktam avalokyena glānāya bhaiṣajyaṃ dadyāt* /
analyzed: na anuktam avalokyena glānāya bhaiṣajyam dadyāt

original: Vin_2.310 / abhāvo maraṇāya hitakāmatayā bhaiṣajyānupradāne hrāsasya /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ maraṇāya hita kāma tayā bhaiṣajya anupradāne hrāsasya

original: Vin_2.312 / bhajeta dūpaś cet pratyayo vyavakīrṇatāyāṃ gṛhasthair niyuktatāyāṃ samotkṣepe /
analyzed: bhajeta dūpaḥ ced pratyayaḥ vyavakīrṇa tāyām gṛhasthaiḥ niyukta tāyām sama utkṣepe

original: Vin_2.315 / na caṭitāṃ sphuṭitāṃ vā nārocya tatvam a[11a1]rpyayeta /
analyzed: na caṭitām sphuṭitām vā na ārocya
anuvātam ca pāṃsu ghaṭa bhasma karparam

original: Vin_2.324 / aśaktau prāpṇum āvāsaṃ samaṃ cen na kāle bhaktasya pānakasya vā /
analyzed: aśaktau prāpṇum āvāsam samam ced na kāle bhaktasya pānakasya vā
rāja kule yena muṣitaḥ tasya arpaṇe

original: Vin_2.340 // sthūlaṃ mṛtyur evaṃ me bhavatīti bruvāṇasyāprati(ya)
analyzed: sthūlam mṛtyuḥ evam me bhavati iti bruvāṇasya apratiya

original: tā tathātvasaṃpādane mṛyatām ity anusthānaiḥ glānasya /
analyzed: tā tathātva saṃpādane mṛyatām iti anusthānaiḥ glānasya
garta prakṣepaka vāṭayī una ādau pātane
prapāta utsarga udvandha ādau maraṇa arthe nuṣṭhāne

original: Vin_2.345 / na glānāya sahasā [11a4] śastrakaṃ rajum vā dadyāt* /
analyzed: na glānāya sahasā śastrakam rajum vā dadyāt

original: Vin_2.348 / prahārañ cāderapanodāya tatbhūtaḥ supratyavekṣitaṃ kṛtva le..yet* /
analyzed: prahāram ca ādeḥ apanodāya tad bhūtaḥ supratyavekṣitam
na alpa aṃśaḥ guru bhāra udyamam kuryāt
vinidhāya saṃjñām uttara manuṣya dharma yukta tā uktā tmanaḥ

original: Vin_2.355 / tatvaṃ paśyāmi mā paśyanti śabdan* śṛṇomi mama śreṇvanty upakramāmi mānupasaṃkrāmanti
analyzed: paśyāmi mā paśyanti śabdan śṛṇomi mama upakramāmi mā an upasaṃkrāmanti

original: sārdham ālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyam api samāpadye mayā sārdham ity ukte /
analyzed: sārdham ālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyam api samāpadye mayā sārdham iti ukte
anitya ādi saṃjñā pramāṇa ārūpya phala abhijñā ādikam uttaraḥ dharmaḥ
sthūla kṛtvam sva lakṣaṇa grāhakasya kleśa viskambhinaḥ śamatha nimittasya

original: Vin_2.360 / nānuktis tadva tv asya tadvad dharmakatvogtiḥ /
Vin_2.361 / parāvadeśatvam asty asāv ity upasandhāne svasya /

analyzed: uttara khyāpana chandena sa nāma artha abhidhāne sthūlam

original: Vin_2.367 / saṃsūcanena ca na bhūtottaratve sya jātatvaṃ //
analyzed: saṃsūcanena ca na bhūta uttara tve sya jāta tvam

original: Vin_2.368 / sthūlam arhantadantogracārhasi cīvarādikaṃ brāhma[ṇ]o vāhita āpadharmā ṣaḍgatasyendriyāṇi sudāntaguptarakṣitabhāvitānīty uktasya  #
analyzed: sthūlam cīvara ādikam brāhmaṇaḥ vā āhitaḥ āpadharmā ṣaḍgatasya indriyāṇi su dānta gupta rakṣita bhāvitāni iti uktasya

original: Vin_2.369 / yadi bhadanto rhan piṇḍa[11b2]pā[t]aṃ me gṛhāṇa praviśa gṛhām āsane niṣīda
analyzed: yadi bhadantaḥ rhan me gṛhāṇa praviśa āsane niṣīda

original: stodakaṃ gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ pratigṛhāṇa sūpikaṃ bhuṃ[k]ṣvānumodasva niṣkrāmeti tadvat saṃpādane //
analyzed: stodakam gṛhāṇa bhojanam pratigṛhāṇa sūpikam bhuṃkṣva anumodasva niṣkrāma iti tadvat saṃpādane
aviśeṣaḥ sukha vidyā bīja bhaiṣajya mīmāṃsā arthitānām
a nāḍī gatasya kṛta tvam vid

original: Vin_2.392 / na māpanārthatayāṃ raktacittatāyāṃ spṛṣṭir aprayogaḥ /
analyzed: na māpana artha tayām rakta citta tāyām spṛṣṭiḥ a prayogaḥ
anāpatti sahasā a tad artha pravṛttau ūru vastra para saṃsparśa kaṇḍūyanaiḥ
cyaviṣyamāṇa acyute samanantaram viṇha nāḍī gate

original: Vin_2.400 / tadva tvaṃ niṣprayogāyāṃ muktau svādane /
analyzed: tat vai tvam niṣprayogāyām muktau svādane
na pīḍa marda parimardānām ca aṅga jātasya

original: Vin_2.404 // vinīlikādau vighaṭiti asthiśaṅkalikayoḥ śira<<ḥ>>karṇanāsasu grivānta[11b6]re

analyzed: pārśva pṛṣṭha kroḍa valiṣu vāla antare hasta aṃsa bāhuṣu bāhu antare kaṭi uru pāda jaṃghāsu
pāda jaṅghā bāhu ūru aṅguli ādau ca striyaḥ grahaṇe
saha śayyāyām adhvanya vijña puruṣayā sārddha mūḍhaḥ

original: Vin_2.429 / ājñāne subhaṣita[12a3]durbhāśitayor arthasya trayo n.ye nyatra pratisevane methunasyeti pratibalatve maulasya /
analyzed: ājñāne arthasya trayaḥ nye nyatra pratisevane methunasya iti pratibala tve maulasya

original: Vin_2.431 / tadvat paṇḍikā paṇḍiko nirmitā ca /

analyzed: tad sukha anubhavana chande ced saṃrāga saṃprayuktena iti

original: Vin_2.443 / spṛśed aṃbhasyārtām uttāraṇāya bāhau keśeṣu vā mātṛduhitṛbhaginīsaṃjñām upasthāpya /
analyzed: spṛśet ambhasi ārtām uttāraṇāya bāhau keśeṣu vā mātṛ duhitṛ bhaginī saṃjñām upasthāpya
vālukā sthāne ceṣṭā lābha artham avāṅmukha avasthāpanam

original: Vin_2.447 / pratyavekṣaṇaṃ jīvati na veti paunaḥpunyena /
analyzed: pratyavekṣaṇam jīvati na vā iti paunaḥpunyena
nirdoṣaḥ nu kampayā śuddha cittasya strī pariṣvaṅgaḥ
ślakṣṇa uṣṇa mṛduka abhiprāya tve sthūlam
bhikṣā pāṃsula iḍḍuka ādeḥ strī indriye prakṣiptau sthūlam
duṣkṛtam pāda aṃśa ādinā strī ghaṭṭane

original: Vin_2.457 / anāpatti striyāsyai tattrayakaraṇe grahaṇe ca /
analyzed: anāpatti striyā asyai tad traya karaṇe grahaṇe ca

original: Vin_2.463 / yatra boddhuṃ bhavyatā sa vijñapane ntaḥ /
analyzed: yatra boddhum bhavya tā sa vijñapane
na tad gata artha ukte prayoga tvam

original: Vin_2.468 / sthūlaṃ chekāśīti [12b2]vāde pāpikasīti chekaṃ te pāpakaṃ vā vraṇamukham iti saṃvibhāgaṃ kurviti māṃ saṃvibhajasveti mayā sārdhaṃ  #
analyzed: sthūlam cheka aśīti chekam te pāpakam vā vraṇa mukham iti saṃvibhāgam kuru iti mām saṃvibhajasva iti mayā sārdham

original: Vin_2.470 / yavān dehi dehi bhagini mahyaṃ yatte bhagini paśyāmi tad dehi yat te
analyzed: yavān dehi dehi bhagini mahyam yat te bhagini paśyāmi tat dehi yat te

original: bhagini puratas tad dehi yat te bhagini mana-āpaṃ tad dehi priyaṃ te deyam ity aham
analyzed: bhagini puratas tat dehi yat te bhagini manaāpam tat dehi priyam te deyam iti aham

original: uktā kin te priyam ity ukte tvaṃ [12b3] me bhagini priyā /
analyzed: uktā kim te priyam iti ukte tvam me bhagini priyā

original: Vin_2.471 / dehi me bhagini pānīyaṃ khādyakaṃ yavāgūṃ bhojanaṃ tvam evaitad ity uktiṣu /
analyzed: dehi me bhagini pānīyam khādyakam yavāgūm bhojanam tvam eva etat iti uktiṣu

original: Vin_2.473 / cārikāṃ bhagini carasy ullāpayamānā puruṣān piṇḍapātaṃ /
analyzed: cārikām bhagini carasi ullāpayamānā puruṣān piṇḍapātam

original: Vin_2.475 / prakrityā ca dauṣṭhulyabhāṣiṇo duṣṭhulayā bhāṣaṇe /
analyzed: prakrityā ca dauṣṭhulya bhāṣiṇaḥ duṣṭhulayā bhāṣaṇe
tadvat tat varṇita anumodanā artham vacanam
tena methunena vā an upasaṃdhāne prayoga tvam

original: Vin_2.486 / anupanatopanateḥ sampatyeḥ gṛhītadauteyasya saṃprayojyato nivedi bhavatas tatretaratadukte pūrvatra pravedane /
analyzed: anupanata upanateḥ sampatyeḥ gṛhīta dauteyasya saṃprayojyataḥ nivedi bhavataḥ tatra itara tad ukte pūrvatra pravedane
na a kartṛ tve ntyasya nṛ tve na prayoga tvam

original: Vin_2.490 / na phalekyāt pratikartṛsamāpte vyāpārasya lopaḥ /
analyzed: na phala īkyāt pratikartṛ samāpte vyāpārasya lopaḥ

original: Vin_2.494 / vāktvaṃ lipihastam udroddeśaṃ saṃkete nimittānāṃ /
analyzed: vāc tvam lipi hastam udrā uddeśam saṃkete nimittānām
ca a sva tvena prāk catuṣṭāt
ca ghuṣṭa tvānām duḥkrita kṛt tvam trayasya asyām āryasya

original: Vin_2.499 / kasmād ayaṃ na pratitiṣṭhatīyaṃ na gacchati śvaśuragṛhān na nīyata iti coktīnāṃ /
analyzed: kasmāt ayam na pratitiṣṭhati iyam na gacchati śvaśura gṛhāt na nīyate iti ca uktīnām
sthūlam gardhā saṃnipata āsevana krīḍā upanata ātmanām sāṃcaritre

original: Vin_2.503 / bhāryām amukā striyaṃ krīṇīhīty uktau /
analyzed: bhāryām amukā striyam krīṇīhi iti uktau
na aduṣṭatāyāḥ sattvasya anyatra iti anākṣiptatvam
atantra tvam niyukta tva a niyukta tvayoḥ

original: Vin_2.513 / pratīṣṭā vaḥ yathoktakāre kāyena vā vācā vā /
analyzed: pratīṣṭāḥ vaḥ yathā ukta kāre kāyena vā vācā vā

original: Vin_2.516 / yācite nujñāte vā tena tadvidhenāśuddhe
analyzed: yācite nujñāte vā tena tadvidhena aśuddhe

original: Vin_2.517 vastuny adeśite āvasasya kāraṇe nte /
analyzed: vastuni a deśite āvasasya kāraṇe n te

original: Vin_2.521 / kṣudrajantvāśayavattvaṃ rājakulatīrthakāvasathasanniḥsṛtatvāc chedyavṛkṣatvam arvāgvyāmāntānantaryato bahirnadīprāgbhārodapānāvaṣṭabdhatvam  #
analyzed: kṣudra jantu āśayavat tvam rāja kula tīrthaka āvasatha sat niḥsṛta tvāt chedya vṛkṣa tvam arvāk vyāma anta ānantaryāt bahis nadī prāgbhāra udapāna avaṣṭabdha tvam
prāmaṇikaḥ hastaḥ dhyardhaḥ su gata vitastiḥ

original: Vin_2.526 / svapratyayena vā gaccheyu niyuktānāṃ vā bhikṣūṇām /
analyzed: sva pratyayena vā gaccheyuḥ niyuktānām vā bhikṣūṇām
kuṭikā vihāra saṃgha avaśeṣa gatā pṛcchā

original: Vin_2.535 / pārājayikādhyācaraṇasya bhikṣor dhvastasyāpy anaṅgam atra pakṣataḥ svatvaṃ mṛṣāvādena kasyacid vijñaptau /
analyzed: pārājayika adhyācaraṇasya bhikṣoḥ dhvastasya api anaṅgam atra pakṣataḥ sva tvam mṛṣāvādena kasyacid vijñaptau
R vācya antara pratiṣṭhena vākyena mṛṣā

original: Vin_2.542 / tathāgatasyāntike duṣṭacittarudhirotpādane saṃghabhede ca saṃsūcane sandhāya bhāṣitam ity api duṣkṛtaṃ /
analyzed: tathāgatasya antike duṣṭa citta rudhira utpādane saṃgha bhede ca saṃsūcane sandhāya bhāṣitam iti api duṣkṛtam
nivāraṇavat tvam jñapteḥ eka kṣaṇā tvam vākyasya
tasya a kṛta pravāsanīya codana smāraṇasya

original: Vin_2.551 / naiṣu na nājñapayeyur methakena karmaṇā ca /
analyzed: na eṣu na na ājñapayeyuḥ methakena karmaṇā ca

original: Vin_2.557 / svapravāsanasya kartari saṃghe mithyāśāyenaiṣāsyātra pravṛttir iti vaktṛtvasya mṛṣā /
Vin_2.558 / coditatve bhikṣuṇādhiśīlam avacanīyatvasyātra bhikṣubhir ātmanaḥ kṛteḥ /
analyzed: codita tve bhikṣuṇā adhiśīlam avacanīya tvasya atra bhikṣubhiḥ ātmanaḥ kṛteḥ

original: Vin_2.559 / nāpūrve horātre [13b3] nasty asya sattvaṃ /
analyzed: na apūrve horātre nasti asya sattvam
apeta tvam asya niryātita tve niryācita tve
sadbhāve sva tvasya anuvṛttasya daśa rātram

original: Vin_2.581 / [13b5] sambaddhe ca sānuvṛttau anyatrānadhiṣṭhitatadgotrāt prabhṛty anyatra /
Vin_2.583 / na pramīlya pratyāstaraṇaṃ gacchen na ced anyaiva pratiprāptir iti saṃsthā /
analyzed: na pramīlya pratyāstaraṇam gacchet na ced anyā eva pratiprāptiḥ iti saṃsthā

original: Vin_2.584 / vāse devam abhipretya gato kālasampattau tatra yācitvaitat* /
analyzed: vāse devam abhipretya kāla sampattau tatra yācitvā etat
a sampattau caturguṇaḥ uttarāsaṃge bahutara jāgaraṇena
na nadī anteḥ eta tve gantavyasya

original: Vin_2.590 / sabhikṣukasakapāṭakatvaṃ* sāhitam āvāsyavarṣattā devasya varṣāśaṅkitā
analyzed: sa bhikṣuka sa kapāṭaka tvam sa āhitam āvāsya varṣat tā devasya varṣā śaṅki tā

original: vā jalāntaritatvaṃ gantavyasyety asyābhāvenādattasamvṛttir aṇāstīrṇakaṭhinaḥ saṃghāṭīṃ*
analyzed: vā jala antarita tvam gantavyasya iti asya abhāvena adatta samvṛttiḥ aṇa āstīrṇa kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāṭīm

original: Vin_2.591 / anyādhiṣṭhānam utsṛjya cīvarasthānaprāptyasaṃbhave prati[14a1] / / vidhiḥ /
Vin_2.592 / dānam avipravāsasaṃvṛtteḥ saṃghāṭyā gurukatve jīrṇaṃ vādhikayoḥ /
analyzed: dānam a vipravāsa saṃvṛtteḥ saṃghāṭyāḥ guruka tve jīrṇam vā adhikayoḥ
sa upavicārāt tad sthānāt anyatra sthitasya aruṇa udgatau
na ekatve parigṛhītuḥ avāntaramaryādānām bhetṛ tvam

original: Vin_2.597 / avibhaktatāyāṃ ca dhanato dṛṣṭitaś ca /
analyzed: a vibhakta tāyām ca dhanataḥ dṛṣṭitaḥ ca

original: Vin_2.598 / śākhopa[14a2]śākhānām asaṃsaṃge pṛthak sthānatvaṃ sādhāraṇyamūlasya /
Vin_2.605 / kuḍyaparikṣipto grāme yāvat ṣaḍgavayuktena vaṃśaśakaṭena[14a3] sphuraṇam
analyzed: kuḍya parikṣiptaḥ grāme yāvat ṣaḍgava yuktena sphuraṇam

original: adhvanā vā kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane vāṭaparikṣipte jaiḍakarajāsaṃprakṛtihrīmatpuruṣapravicārabhūmyadhvanā vā /
analyzed: adhvanā vā kukkuṭasya utpātya nilayane vāṭa parikṣipte jaiḍaka rajā saṃprakṛti hrīmat puruṣa pravicāra bhūmi adhvanā vā

original: Vin_2.606 / parikhāparikṣipte dvādaśapadikayā niḥśrayaṇyā cchoritasaṃkārasthūlaloṣṭādhvano vā /
analyzed: parikhā parikṣipte dvādaśa padikayā niḥśrayaṇyā chorita saṃkāra sthūla loṣṭa adhvanaḥ vā

original: Vin_2.607 / tatsthāne trikaraṇīyaparisarpaṇātinā mana rajobhiś ca yāvatas tadagatasya saṃbhāvanaṃ /
analyzed: tad sthāne rajobhiḥ ca yāvataḥ tat agatasya saṃbhāvanam

original: Vin_2.609 / na sīmāntaraṃ pṛthaktvaṃ krośāntān madhyataḥ parasya /
analyzed: na sīmāntaram pṛthaktvam krośa antāt madhyataḥ parasya
na pāpa khaṇḍa tā upagatau adhiṣṭhanasya
na anya idam dharmakayoḥ dṛṣṭitaḥ ced anākṣepaḥ
na upavicāra tvam grāme syā bhavataḥ vihārasya

original: Vin_2.621 / pūrṇavadasatyāṃ pūrakapratyāsāṃ māṃ nyūnaṃ māṃ samasāmantakāt* /
analyzed: pūrṇa vat asatyām pūraka pratyāsām mām nyūnam mām samasām antakāt
dadyāt lūha tve paritta tāyām vā adhikāni

original: Vin_2.635 / na nyāyyam utpāṭayed atraiva parikarma kṛtvāropayiṣya ity anusampādya cittaṃ /
analyzed: na nyāyyam utpāṭayet atra eva parikarma kṛtvā āropayiṣye iti anusampādya cittam

original: Vin_2.637 / khaṇḍasaṃghāṭyāṃ nava prabhṛtyāṃ pañcāviṃ*śater yug*mavarjaṃ /
analyzed: khaṇḍa saṃghāṭyām nava prabhṛtyām pañcāviṃśateḥ yugma varjam
tri pañcakāni sva hastaiḥ jyeṣṭhāni ādhiṣṭhānikāni

original: Vin_2.645 / antarvāsaso dvipañcakam api dvicatuṣkañ ca /
analyzed: antarvāsasaḥ dvipañcakam api dvi catuṣkam ca
duṣkṛta kṛt tvam nyūna vat antare
a pratyāśa tvam a chādane ṛdha maṇḍalasya
niradhiṣṭhanānām ca mukha poca pariśrāva pratyāstaraṇa cilimilikā ādīnām pariskāra cīvarāṇām

original: Vin_2.656 / jñātir āsaptamābhyāṃ pitṛbhyām anyatareṇāpy ekapūrvajaḥ /
analyzed: jñātiḥ ā saptamābhyām pitṛbhyām anyatareṇa api eka pūrvajaḥ

original: Vin_2.657 / saṃjñānasya kartatvaṃ prādhānyena / / vṛṃde tat /

analyzed: adhiṣṭhita sva purāṇa dhāvana arha cīvara niṣadanānām kasya nirdhāvana rañjana ākoṭaneṣu vijñaptyā
pradeśasya api kṛtau karmaṇaḥ kṛta tvam
saṃjñāna pradhāna tāyām yathā arthe maulam
upamūla tvam ayathārtha tve saṃjñāna vat vimatiḥ

original: Vin_2.668 / anissaraṇam atrāgantukatvaṃ sadasatvarūpanirjñānārtham asya tena praśnaḥ /
jyamānam atirekaṃ pātracīva śikyasaritakāyabandhanaṃ saṃgha upanikṣepāya /
analyzed: jyamānam atirekam pātracīva śikya sarita kāya bandhanam saṃghaḥ upanikṣepāya

original: Vin_2.672 / tathopanikṣepa tasya yatheṣṭaṃ tadvikalair ādānaṃ /
analyzed: tathā upanikṣepa tasya yathā iṣṭam tad vikalaiḥ ādānam
na uccāra prasrāva syandanikā kardama ādi nāsita dhāvane sti apahrāsaḥ
duḥkṛtam ciliminikā gṛha coḍa aupadhānaka vikalpita niḥsṛṣṭa sāṃghikānām

original: Vin_2.675 / pratigṛhṇīyād bhikṣuṇī mahārhaṃ vāsaḥ parivarhaṇāya kuryād bhikṣuṇyā sārddhaṃ parivarttaṃ /
analyzed: pratigṛhṇīyāt bhikṣuṇī mahārham vāsaḥ parivarhaṇāya kuryāt bhikṣuṇyā sārddham parivartam

original: Vin_2.680 / cittaśraddham udbhāvya purataḥ sthāpayitva nira[15a3]pekṣaṇaṃ prakramaṇe
analyzed: citta śraddham udbhāvya puratas sthāpayitvā prakramaṇe

original: Vin_2.685 / anāpattis tāvat kālikacittena vismṛtya mūlyādāne
analyzed: anāpattiḥ tāvat kālika cittena vismṛtya mūlya ādāne
an ācchinna naṣṭa dagdha hṛtaḥ ḍha cīvarasya
sarvasya abhāve dhiṣṭheyasya vijñapana arha tvam

original: Vin_2.699 / paraṃ gṛhiṇo dvādaśahastakaḥ paḍakottaram antaraṃ saptadvikaṣāṭakaḥ /
analyzed: param gṛhiṇaḥ dvādaśa hastakaḥ paḍaka uttaram antaram sapta dvi kaṣāṭakaḥ
bhikṣoḥ jyeṣṭhe yathā ukta puṭe saṃghāṭī nivasane
atiriktasya atas pramāṇāt a vijñapya tvam

original: Vin_2.704 / pūrvakasya ca pūrvalabdhau uttaralabdhāv adhikasya deyatvaṃ /
Vin_2.710 / saṃkalpitam apravāritasya jñātaṃ tulyam asaṃkalpitena /
analyzed: saṃkalpitam a pravāritasya jñātam tulyam a saṃkalpitena

original: Vin_2.714 / preṣitam akalpikaṃ cīvaramūlyaṃ pratikṣipya paripraṣṇapūrvakam upadiṣṭaṃ vaiyāpṛtyakaram ādiṣṭaṃ dūtenokto vṛttā[15b2]ntātvākhyānapūrvakañ  #
analyzed: preṣitam akalpikam cīvara mūlyam pratikṣipya upadiṣṭam vaiyāpṛtya karam ādiṣṭam
na a śaktavat tāyām saṃpradhāreṇe codita tvam

original: Vin_2.720 / vṛttāyām evaṃ pratiniḥśriṣṭau prayacchata uktapratiniḥsargād abhyupetadātṛcittagrahaṇānuṣṭhānāt pratigṛhṇīyāt* /
analyzed: vṛttāyām evam pratiniḥśriṣṭau prayacchataḥ ukta pratiniḥsargāt abhyupeta dātṛ citta grahaṇa anuṣṭhānāt pratigṛhṇīyāt
manuṣya dve trayasya gṛhī tve ca

original: Vin_2.749 / alabdhasamvṛtteḥ saty anyatra svakām atyakte vāna krānte /
analyzed: alabdha samvṛtteḥ sati anyatra svakām atyakte krānte
ṣaṣ varṣa saṃgatau kṛta tāyām saṃstarasya
na anta gatau prayogasya anāpatti kṛtvam
sati voḍhari asati ca yojana trayāt ūrdham aiḍaka ūrṇā udvahane

original: Vin_2.761 / prayogasyārddhaṃ duṣkṛtam ṛddher anyena nabhasā haraṇe nirmite ca /
analyzed: prayogasya arddham duṣkṛtam ṛddheḥ anyena nabhasā haraṇe nirmite ca
nirdoṣam kholā pūla ālepyaka āyaṣkuñcaka loṭhaka murucikā avyartham tanmātrāṇām

original: Vin_2.764 / ṣaṭ caturaṅgulo hasto rdhacaturtha<<ḥ>> hastakaḥ puruṣaś ca caturhastakaṃ dhanus tat śatapañcakaṃ krośaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ catur aṅgulaḥ hastaḥ rdha caturthaḥ hastakaḥ puruṣaḥ ca catur hastakam dhanuḥ tat śata pañcakam krośaḥ

original: Vin_2.765 / tadantādi caraṇyasya na kāyabhāraṃ vaheta /
analyzed: tad anta ādi caraṇyasya na kāya bhāram vaheta
trapu sajja śīsa lohānām śrāmaṇerayoḥ ca

original: Vin_2.779 / [16a5] dānapateḥ svāmitvādhimokṣo vaiyyapṛtyakarasya svāmitvādhimokṣo vaiyāpṛtyākarasya svāmitvābhyupagamanamaidhiṣṭhānam iti kalpāḥ
analyzed: dānapateḥ svāmi tva adhimokṣaḥ vaiyyapṛtyakarasya svāmi tva adhimokṣaḥ vaiyāpṛtyakarasya svāmi tva abhyupagamanam aidhiṣṭhānam iti kalpāḥ
na a vidyamāna dharma artha pratyayāt anyatra ruḍhiḥ
tad kare ca arpaṇāya kārṣāpaṇa grahaṇam
anantaḥ kṛta tvam upaskāra anujñāne ratna svīkarasya

original: Vin_2.794 / svīkṛtasyāsyānyasya vā paribhogaś cet* [16b2] bhaiṣajyaśarāvakaparibhogeṇa
analyzed: svīkṛtasya asya anyasya vā paribhogaḥ ced bhaiṣajya śarāvaka paribhogeṇa
dvayam adhiṣṭhānikam āyasam mṛd mayam ca
maṇi muktā vaidūrya śaṅkha śilā pravāḍa rajata jātarūpa asmagarbham usāragalva lohitikā dakṣiṇāvarta prabhṛti ratnam
chinna bhinna khaṇḍa dagdha a pracarita pūrva an āhata a lakṣaṇa pratirūpakam etat
gṛhī tve parasya ajñāti tve maulī

original: Vin_2.808 / bandhakaṃ dviguṇam ādāya sākṣisamvatsaraṃ āsadivasasaṃghasthavirovārika gṛhītṛdhanalā[16b4]bhānāropya patre /
analyzed: bandhakam dviguṇam ādāya sākṣi samvatsaram patre

original: Vin_2.810 / anyena dadyāt sāṃghikaṃ saṃghabhaktopakrīṇate dhānyaṃ mūlyena /
analyzed: anyena dadyāt sāṃghikam saṃgha bhaktā upakrīṇate dhānyam mūlyena

original: Vin_2.819 / akaraṇaṃ parārthe py utsṛjya ratnatrayaṃ paṇāpaṇaḥ /

analyzed: saṃghena tad artham saṃgha karmikeṇa ūdhisya dānam
na a pṛṣṭvā vṛddha vṛddhām saṃgha artham udyacchet
yatra abhilikhita tā sampattim asya anutiṣṭhet
nissṛṣṭha tvam pravrajyā apekṣā artha tāyām niyamane

original: Vin_2.828 / nādhilobhaṃ kurvīt pariskāre tyadhyāvasānaṃ na patrād astadhāyet* /
analyzed: na adhi lobham kurvīt pariskāre na patrāt

original: Vin_2.836 / adoṣam ajñātā ca vṛddhipātrayoḥ jñāteḥ /

analyzed: śvas sya kariṣyat tāyām tena ārocanam

original: Vin_2.849 saṃghe sāmagrivelāyāṃ śvo 'ham āyusmanta unna pātraṃ cārayiṣyāmi yusmābhiḥ svakasvakāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā saṃghamadhye vataritavyam  #
analyzed: saṃghe sāmagri velāyām śvas ham āyusmantaḥ pātram cārayiṣyāmi svaka svakāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā saṃgha madhye vataritavyam

original: Vin_2.852 / sthavi[17a4]redaṃ svacchaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ paribhogakṣamaṃ sa ced ākāṃkṣasi gṛhāṇeti yathā guṇaṃ rucyā grahaṇaṃ ayācanaṃ gṛhitasyāntaritena
analyzed: svaccham parimaṇḍalam paribhoga kṣamam sa ced ākāṃkṣasi gṛhāṇa iti yathā guṇam rucyā grahaṇam a yācanam gṛhitasya antaritena
a dāna tvayoḥ vācoḥ na uttarasyām anya ajyā tāna ādhiṣṭhānika dvayoḥ āpannasya pravedanam
vinā mūlyena vijñaptyā anyena api vāpane

original: Vin_2.862 / bhūyas tāyāṃ vā durniyogataḥ sauṣṭhave vā /
analyzed: bhūyas tāyām vā durniyogataḥ sauṣṭhave vā

original: Vin_2.872 / samastayor vyastayor vā kāyavācor āchedārthaṃ pravṛttis tasya /
analyzed: samastayoḥ vyastayoḥ vā kāya vācoḥ ācheda artham pravṛttiḥ tasya
svatā yana bhūtasya atra avarodhaḥ āchedasya
anartha ahita kṛt pravṛtti vighnana arthena āpattiḥ

original: Vin_2.882 / [17b3] svasthānavat sabhayatāyām āraṇyakasyekatra cīvare gramaḥ /
analyzed: sva sthāna vat sabhaya tāyām āraṇyakasya ekatra cīvare gramaḥ
vipravaset atas saḥ antargṛha gatāt artha vaśena a ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ

original: Vin_2.886 / anaṅgam atrātivāhyatve ṣaḍrātrasya prakrāntau saṃkalpaḥ /
analyzed: anaṅgam atra ativāhya tve ṣaṣ rātrasya prakrāntau saṃkalpaḥ
dhāraṇe parasya ra pūrvasya parīṣṭaḥ duṣkṛtasya
utsṛjya antye tyaya vaśāt daśa ahe labhyamānasya

original: Vin_2.901 // pudgale nyatra saṃghe vā saṃkalpitasyānyena cīvarasya [18a1] jānatātmani pariṇāmato labdhau /
analyzed: pudgale saṃghe vā saṃkalpitasya anyena cīvarasya jānatā ātmani pariṇāmāt labdhau
anāpattiḥ alābhe paryeṣa vighasa khādaka tiryak ādeḥ

original: Vin_2.909 / kalpate yā cchayā pratinidhyantare sugatasya dānam /
analyzed: kalpate yā chayā pratinidhi antare sugatasya dānam

original: Vin_2.914 / ekasya dvayoḥ trayāṇāṃ vā saṃghādā bhavato lābhasyādāne /
analyzed: ekasya dvayoḥ trayāṇām vā saṃghādāḥ bhavataḥ lābhasya adāne
na sahasā eva nirāvāsa tā karaṇam vihārasya

original: Vin_2.921 / anudbhū[18a3]tāv atra kāle dānapater aparāṇi sāmantakavihāreṇa sārddham /
analyzed: atra kāle dānapateḥ aparāṇi sāmantakavihāreṇa sārddham

original: Vin_2.925 / na sthānāntarīyaṃ dravyaṃ sthānāntare dadyuḥ /
analyzed: na sthāna antarīyam dravyam sthāna antare dadyuḥ
dāna tve pi gṛhapateḥ niyateḥ abhaṅgaḥ

original: Vin_2.931 / nirdoṣam asampattau caityāntare tallābhasya pariṇamanam utsṛjya bodhidharmacakramahāprātihāryadevāvataraṇānām ebhyo 'nyatra /
analyzed: nirdoṣam asampattau caitya antare tad lābhasya pariṇamanam utsṛjya bodhi dharma cakra mahā prātihārya deva avataraṇānām ebhyaḥ nyatra

original: Vin_2.932 / vyatītaṃ divasam adhiṣṭhitasya sāptāhikasya bhikṣuṃ śrāyet /
analyzed: vyatītam divasam adhiṣṭhitasya sāptāhikasya bhikṣum śrāyet

original: Vin_2.936 / [18a5] atyaye 'hne kalpikasyābhyavahāryasya bhuktivad ity atra vyavasthā /
Vin_2.937 / yasyātrārthe kalpanaṃ taṃ pratyanāpattiḥ kalpitenāsyābhaṅgayoḥ sannihitam /
analyzed: yasya atra arthe kalpanam tam prati anāpattiḥ kalpitena āsyā bhaṅgayoḥ sannihitam

original: Vin_2.938 / saṃjñāya saṃghasannidhāv adharmasya dharmato dharmasya cādharmataḥ paridīpanaṃ sthūlātyayaḥ /
analyzed: saṃjñāya saṃgha sannidhau adharmasya dharmataḥ dharmasya ca adharmataḥ paridīpanam sthūlātyayaḥ

original: Vin_2.939 / kaccit sthā [a]tra pariśuddhā ityā[18b1]tṛtīyapariprasnāt poṣadhe śuddhasaṃjñasya tūṣṇīm bhāvenātināmanāyā duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: kaccit sthā atra pariśuddhā poṣadhe śuddha saṃjñasya tūṣṇīm bhāvena ati nāmanāyāḥ duṣkṛtam
ābhyām pārājika saṃgha avaśeṣābhyām ca anyasmin mṛṣāvāde
bhāṣa māntve pi saṃjñā lābhe sya utthānam
anyasya kṣatriya tā brāhmaṇya ādeḥ duṣkṛtam
bhikṣu tā ca asya duṣkṛtam anyathā
tadvat tvam adhikaraṇa antara tvena adhikaraṇasya saṃjñāne
arddha tvam karma phala gatasya a tattvena samudācāre
na paṇḍita kṛta uttarottara paripraṣṇa nirvnaye parivartanikā svādhyāyanikā paripṛcchanikā upavāsa dāna dakṣiṇā deśaneṣu

original: Vin_2.967 / samam anupasampannena hīnaṃ vā netrībhūtasyoccāraṇe dharmsyākṣarasyāpi /
analyzed: samam anupasampannena hīnam vā netrībhūtasya uccāraṇe
saṃmanyeran pāpayoḥ bhikṣu bhikṣuṇyoḥ kula pratisaṃvedakam

original: Vin_2.972 / śṛṇvantvāyuṣmanto kuleṣu kuladūṣakā āśrameṣv āśramadūṣakās tadyathā sampanne
analyzed: śṛṇvantu āyuṣmantaḥ kuleṣu kula dūṣakāḥ āśrameṣu āśrama dūṣakāḥ tat yathā sampanne

original: śālikṣetre 'śanirvicakrā nipated yāvad eva tasyaiva śāler utsādāya vināśāyānayena
analyzed: śāli kṣetre śaniḥ vicakrā nipatet yāvat eva tasya eva śāleḥ utsādāya vināśāya anayena

original: vyasanāya saṃpanne vā ikṣukṣetre mañjiṣṭhi[19a1]kā nāma rogajātir niyate[d] yāvad
analyzed: vyasanāya saṃpanne vā ikṣu kṣetre nāma roga jātiḥ niyatet yāvat

original: eva tasyaivekṣor utsādāya vināśāyānayena vyasanāya mā yūyam āyuṣmanto 'nena bhikṣunānayā
analyzed: eva tasya eva īkṣoḥ utsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ nena bhikṣunā anayā

original: bhikṣuṇyā śāsanaṃ pramiṇuta eṣa bhikṣur eṣā ca bhikṣuṇī dagdhena dhānā aprarohaṇadharmā
analyzed: bhikṣuṇyā śāsanam pramiṇute eṣa bhikṣuḥ eṣā ca bhikṣuṇī dagdhena dhānā a prarohaṇa dharmā

original: asmin dharmavinaye bhagavantaṃ paśyata sthavirasthavirāṃś ca bhikṣūn śniti kuleṣu
analyzed: asmin dharma vinaye bhagavantam paśyata sthavira sthavirān ca bhikṣūn śniti kuleṣu

original: Vin_2.982 / [19a3] sthairyeṇa ced artho jñaptipūrvakam arthaṃ kuryuḥ /
Vin_2.984 / pudgalabhikṣusaṃghābhaktalābhasya mithyāpariṇāmakatvena bhikṣor anyatrāpy anāmnā coktau /

analyzed: vinaya pratisaṃyukta bhāṣamāna avadhyāna bhūtāyām uktau

original: Vin_2.989 / prāka tataḥ saptāṣṭeṣu divaseṣv atas tasya maṇḍalakagandhapuṣpadīpadhūpabalidānatridaṇḍakaṃ
analyzed: tatas sapta aṣṭeṣu divaseṣu atas tasya maṇḍalaka gandha puṣpa dīpa dhūpa bali dāna tridaṇḍakam

original: bhāṣaṇadakṣiṇadeśanāṃ kṛtvā yā devatā 'smin vṛkṣe 'dhyuṣitā sā 'nyad bhavanaṃ samanveṣatvanena
analyzed: bhāṣaṇa dakṣiṇa deśanām kṛtvā yā devatā smin vṛkṣe dhī uṣitā sā ni at bhavanam samanveṣatu anena

original: vṛkṣeṇa stūpasya saṃghasyeti-karaṇīyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktā jānīhi vādena /
analyzed: vṛkṣeṇa stūpasya saṃghasya itikaraṇīyam bhaviṣyati iti uktā jānīhi vādena

original: Vin_2.990 / vikāraś ced agnimokṣarudhirasyandanaśākhākampanapatraśaṭanādir udṛśyeta pakṣe 'tra [19a5] dānamātsaryayoḥ saṃvarṇanivivarṇanaṃ
analyzed: vikāraḥ ced agni mokṣa rudhira syandana śākhā kampana pattra śaṭana ādiḥ pakṣe dāna mātsaryayoḥ
avaṣṭambhena api tṛṇa śāda pāṃsu prabhṛtibhiḥ

original: Vin_2.1003 / pratiprahāram asyātra bhedo na vaktutaḥ /
analyzed: pratiprahāram asya atra bhedaḥ na vaktutaḥ

original: Vin_2.1007 / sādhu syād yady ayaṃ chidyetety uktor niyuktiḥ /
analyzed: sādhu syāt yadi ayam chidyeta iti uktoḥ niyuktiḥ
tvac phalgu pāṇḍu patra puṣpita puṣpa pakva phalānām ardham ṛta tayā vyavahāraḥ
na an apetasya eṣām prakṛteḥ mūla bhūtasya
arddha jāta tayā uptasya a saṃjāta mūlasya bīja dhānayoḥ

original: Vin_2.1015 / chedane ca kuśāder āpadyavabadhena tenāsambhave mokṣaḥ /
analyzed: chedane ca kuśa ādeḥ āpadi avabadhena tena asaṃbhave mokṣaḥ

original: Vin_2.1018 / saṃsparśo 'gninā kṣatiḥ śastranakhaśūkhairmlānyutpāṭana utdalanabhiducchittir iti kalpāḥ /
analyzed: saṃsparśaḥ gninā kṣatiḥ śastra nakha śūkhaiḥ mlāni utpāṭanaḥ utdalana bhid ucchittiḥ iti kalpāḥ
na abīja tva gate kalpane pekṣa tvam

original: Vin_2.1021 / [19b4] samyamktvasaṃkhyām agninā kalpane phalānāṃ kalpane samudāyarūpasya tantrīkaraṇam /

analyzed: na ekatas pradeśāt samudāyasya sambhāvanā utthānam

original: Vin_2.1025 / nānabhikṣitaṃ śītena vāriṇā sāptāhikaṃ yāvaj jīvakam abhyavaharet /
analyzed: na an abhikṣitam śītena vāriṇā sāptāhikam yāvat jīvakam abhyavaharet

original: Vin_2.1030 / avadhyāne vā svagatenārthena saśrutaṃ kṣepe vā paravyapadeśena /
analyzed: avadhyāne vā svagatena arthena sa śrutam kṣepe vā para vyapadeśena

original: Vin_2.1034 / na svayam enaṃ dveṣyaḥ karmaṇi yujjīta /
analyzed: na svayam enam dveṣyaḥ karmaṇi yujjīta

original: Vin_2.1035 / [20a1] na na gaṇyeyuś codanatājñā tūṣṇīṃ bhāvaviheṭhakoktapudgalasamukhāvadhāyakaparavyapadeśakṣepakān /
Vin_2.1042 / tasmād vadhyadarśanaparipraśne viyapa tāvat pānīyaṃtāvat piba viśrāmya
analyzed: tasmāt vadhya darśana paripraśne viyapa tāvat pānīyam tāvat piba viśrāmya

original: tāvan na paśyāmi [20a2] na khaṃ vā paramārthataḥ sattvaṃ napaśyāmi vadhyaś cet yuktāv anāpattiḥ /
analyzed: tāvat na paśyāmi na kham vā paramārthataḥ sattvam na paśyāmi vadhyaḥ ced yuktau anāpattiḥ

original: Vin_2.1043 / na yatra sākṣitvena karaṇam āpatet tatrāvasthānaṃ bhajeta /
analyzed: na yatra sākṣi tvena karaṇam āpatet tatra avasthānam bhajeta
na a kṛta uvaghāta dvāra bandhaḥ sa ākṣepam dadyāt

original: Vin_2.1048 / tad atikra[20a3]māya vismṛtyāpi prasthānam antaś ca svapnasamāpatyādinā viparokṣībhāvaḥ /

analyzed: na avalokita bhikṣau na saṃkaṭa prāptasya

original: Vin_2.1054 / dvayor ekatra niṣāde paścād utthāyinaḥ karaṇīyavattā /
analyzed: dvayoḥ ekatra niṣāde paścāt utthāyinaḥ karaṇīyavat tā

original: Vin_2.1058 / eṣa vihāraḥ paśya cedaṃ śayanāsaṃ gṛhāṇa cāpāvaraṇīdānam ity avalokanāni /
analyzed: eṣa vihāraḥ paśya ca idam śaya nāsam gṛhāṇa ca apāvaraṇī dānam iti avalokanāni

original: Vin_2.1059 / saṃbhedās trayo vātena parivarttanaṃ vṛṣṭyā puṭāntaraprāpti[ḥ] dīpikābhiś ca /
analyzed: saṃbhedāḥ trayaḥ vātena parivartanam vṛṣṭyā puṭa antara prāptiḥ dīpikābhiḥ ca

original: Vin_2.1060 / śayanāsanatvaṃ sāṃghikatā tasya svayaṃniyuktakṛtatopanikṣepasyābhyavakāśa iti kartṛṇi /
analyzed: śayana āsana tvam sāṃghika tā tasya svayam niyukta kṛta tā upanikṣepasya abhyavakāśaḥ iti kartṛṇi

original: Vin_2.1063 / [20a5] etat tāvat kālam antaram anyenādhiṣṭhite /
analyzed: etat tāvat kālam antaram anyena adhiṣṭhite

original: Vin_2.1067 / piṇḍāya cet praviṣajyāpraviṣṭe vātavarṣam āgacched vihārasthāḥ praveśayeyuḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍāya ced praviṣa jyā praviṣṭe vāta varṣam āgacchet vihāra sthāḥ praveśayeyuḥ

original: Vin_2.1069 / naitad arthatāyām adoṣo hvāso vā /
analyzed: na etat artha tāyām adoṣaḥ hvāsaḥ vā

original: Vin_2.1070 / vismṛtya ced bahusamatikrāntādhvano gato vā smṛtiṃ labheta na bhūya evaṃ kariṣyāmīti cittam utpā[20b1]dayed vācaṃ ca bhāṣeta /
analyzed: vismṛtya ced bahu samatikrānta adhvanaḥ gataḥ vā smṛtim labheta na bhūyas evam kariṣyāmi iti cittam vācam ca bhāṣeta

original: Vin_2.1071 / pratipathitañ ced bhikṣum ārāgayedudhārāyainaṃ prārthayet /
analyzed: pratipathitam ced bhikṣum ārāgayet udhārāya enam prārthayet

original: Vin_2.1072 / kartṛtvaṃ prāptatāyām atra yena pratijñātaṃ prakramiṣannāvasād asaṃkaṭaprāpto 'bhisaṃkṣipet śayanāsanam /
analyzed: kartṛ tvam prāptatāyām atra yena pratijñātam asaṃkaṭa prāptaḥ bhisaṃkṣipet śayana āsanam

original: Vin_2.1075 / avalokanam anya eva kruvīta bhikṣoḥ /
Vin_2.1078 / sarvābhāve caturdiśaṃ [20b2] vyavalokyāpāvaraṇīṃ gopayitvā prakrāmet /
analyzed: sarva abhāve caturdiśam vyavalokya apāvaraṇīm gopayitvā prakrāmet

original: Vin_2.1079 / antaramārge ced bhikṣuṃ paśyet taṃ pradeśam asmai brūyāt /
analyzed: antara mārge ced bhikṣum paśyet tam pradeśam asmai brūyāt

original: Vin_2.1080 / dvāre ced antargṛhopanimantraṇāyāṃ badha āgacchet kuḍyasya mūle vṛkṣasya vā nidhāyādhvani praviśet /
analyzed: dvāre ced antargṛha upanimantraṇāyām badhaḥ āgacchet kuḍyasya mūle vṛkṣasya vā nidhāya adhvani praviśet

original: Vin_2.1085 / sthāpayeyuḥ gacchan vayam āneṣyāma iti bruvatsu /
analyzed: sthāpayeyuḥ gacchan vayam āneṣyāmaḥ iti bruvatsu
niḥśraya karaṇīyaiḥ taiḥ an ānītau ānayane

original: Vin_2.1092 / ekānte 'sau tiṣṭhet svakarma kurva[20b4]nn avadhānadānañ ca /
analyzed: ekānte sau tiṣṭhet sva karma avadhāna dānam ca

original: Vin_2.1098 / gṛhiṇā niṣādya praveśitasya dṛṣṭaḥ praveśyatvam /
analyzed: gṛhiṇā niṣādya praveśitasya dṛṣṭaḥ praveśya tvam

original: Vin_2.1105 / kuśalapakṣāpagacchaty ācāryopādhyāye na ca ced anyathā vṛddhiḥ kuśalapakṣasya pṛṣṭhato gacchet /
analyzed: kuśala pakṣa apagacchati ācārya upādhyāye na ca ced anyathā vṛddhiḥ kuśala pakṣasya pṛṣṭhatas gacchet
abhyavakāśa dharma śravaṇe vāta varṣa praveśanam śayana āsanasya

original: Vin_2.1110 [21a1] // svayam aśakto gurutayā vṛttānāṃ navakaiḥ saha parivṛttiḥ /
analyzed: svayam aśaktaḥ guru tayā vṛttānām navakaiḥ saha parivṛttiḥ

original: Vin_2.1112 / dadyur vihārāntare yācyamānaṃ śayanāsanaṃ vastrañ ca /
analyzed: dadyuḥ vihāra antare yācyamānam śayana āsanam vastram ca

original: Vin_2.1113 / na cet vṛṣṭir varṣāśaṃkitā vā /
analyzed: na ced vṛṣṭiḥ varṣā śaṃkitā vā

original: Vin_2.1114 / vātavarṣa n ced antarmārge syād vṛkṣasya mūle kuḍyasya vā sthalaṃ kuryuḥ /
analyzed: ced antar mārge syāt vṛkṣasya mūle kuḍyasya vā sthalam kuryuḥ

original: Vin_2.1117 / dagdhāv uḍhau ca sāṃ[21a2]ghikasyāpi niṣkāsanaṃ /
Vin_2.1119 / niṣkāṣitasya bhikṣum ārakṣāyai sthāpayeyur asamarthataraṃ /
Vin_2.1121 // kṛtaṃ saṃstaram antargṛhe ..c chorayeyur avalokya gṛhapatiṃ*
analyzed: kṛtam saṃstaram antargṛhe c śorayeyuḥ avalokya gṛhapatim

original: Vin_2.1123 / kṛtatvam asya śironte pādānte vā kṛtatve /
analyzed: kṛta tvam asya śiraḥ ante pāda ante vā kṛta tve
utsarge choryasya choraṇam a gatasya a karaṇīya tām

original: Vin_2.1129 / anyadā kālena kālaṃ pratyevekṣaṇaṃ parivartanañ ca /
analyzed: anyadā kālena kālam pratyeva īkṣaṇam parivartanam ca

original: Vin_2.1132 / avabadhya ra[21a4]jvā vṛkṣe valalambya caṃkrame(yu)
Vin_2.1134 / prāg gataṃ prāk prakramiṣyanty asmāt tulyatvaṃ sāhyopabhoge /
analyzed: prāk gatam prāk prakramiṣyanti asmāt tulya tvam sāhya upabhoge
tad patīnām ca asāṃghike valokya tvam
na ced tad saṃbādha saṃgha saṃkṣobha janma anupaśama praticikirṣaṇe

original: Vin_2.1148 / nidarśanam etad viheṭhanachandena bhikṣor viheṭhanānāṃ /
analyzed: nidarśanam etat viheṭhana chandena bhikṣoḥ viheṭhanānām
sāṃghika vihāra upariṣṭa talaka tvam kartṛ

original: Vin_2.1151 / na cet pāriṇāmikatvaṃ phalakatadvidhachada[na]tā vā /

analyzed: kīla pādaka tvam ḍa ca ākramaṇīyasya

original: Vin_2.1164 / na cet sarvatvena śailaḥ pakvaśailo dārumayo vā /
analyzed: na ced sarva tvena śailaḥ pakva śailaḥ dāru mayaḥ vā

original: Vin_2.1166 / kṛtaṃ paśyāmi niṣṭhitaṃ cety anuktasya [21b3]dānapatinā /
analyzed: kṛtam paśyāmi niṣṭhitam ca iti an uktasya
trayāt ūrdham iṣṭakā paryāya dāna saṃpādane
a datta tve vā khāta mūla pādasya

original: Vin_2.1175 // aparājitaṃ sūtraṃvinayamātṛkādharam a[21b4]nunaviṃ*śativarṣaṃ nāgaralapitam upanāmitakāyatve bhikṣuṇyā kṛtapratikriyāṃ bhikṣuṇyavavādakaṃ  #
analyzed: aparājitam sūtram vinaya mātṛkā dharam nāgara lapitam upanāmita kāya tve bhikṣuṇyā kṛta pratikriyām bhikṣuṇī avavādakam

original: Vin_2.1181 / samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pariśuddhasamaveto navadyo mā [21b5]vaḥ kaścid
analyzed: samagraḥ bhikṣuṇī saṃghaḥ pariśuddha samavetaḥ navadyaḥ mā kaścid

original: asaṃmata<<ḥ>> saṃghena pudgalo vavadate saṃghād va āgacchati pudgalo vavādako na
analyzed: a saṃmataḥ saṃghena pudgalaḥ vavadate saṃghāt vaḥ āgacchati pudgalaḥ vavādakaḥ na

original: vaḥ kaścid utsahate bhikṣur avavadituṃ saṃghād vo vavādānuśāsanī apramādena bhaginyaḥ /
analyzed: vaḥ kaścid utsahate bhikṣuḥ avavaditum saṃghāt vaḥ vavāda anuśāsanī apramādena bhaginyaḥ

original: Vin_2.1184 / ekenāpi vinā tassa mmatasya ca bhikṣuṇya[va]vādena pūrvaṃ sammata..syāsammatatvaṃ /
analyzed: ekena api vinā ca bhikṣuṇī avavādena pūrvam sammatasya a sammata tvam
muktvā sarva rātrikam dharma śravaṇam bhikṣuṇī avavāde

original: Vin_2.1189 / na ced apāvṛtadvāras tadā tatbhūtasyāgrato vihārasya varṣakaḥ /
analyzed: na ced apāvṛta dvāraḥ tadā tad bhūtasya agratas vihārasya varṣakaḥ

original: Vin_2.1190 / kuryād vaiśāradyāya dharmapraripṛcchāyāṃ bhikṣo bhikṣuṇyāmiṣopasaṃhāraṃ /
analyzed: kuryāt vaiśāradyāya dharma praripṛcchāyām bhikṣaḥ bhikṣuṇī āmiṣa upasaṃhāram

original: Vin_2.1193 / bhikṣor atathābhūtasyāmiṣakiñcitakahetor bhikṣuṇīr avavadatīti vivāde //
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ a tathābhūtasya āmiṣa kiñcitaka hetoḥ bhikṣuṇīḥ avavadati iti vivāde

original: Vin_2.1198 / na cet* mūṣitāyai saubhāṣiṇikasyopasaṃpadyamānāyai pari[22a3]vartakena vā //

analyzed: nyāyyam itaretara patheya vahanam bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnām
samudānīya glāna bhaiṣajya piṇḍa pādam ca

original: Vin_2.1212 / muktvo sabhayatāyāṃ mārgasyaikasārthapālam abhinnaprayāṇatāyām ekabhikṣuṇyāpi mārgātivāhane/
analyzed: sa bhaya tāyām mārgasya eka sārthapālam abhinna prayāṇa tāyām eka bhikṣuṇyā api mārga ativāhane

original: Vin_2.1216 // [22a5]sāntarāyatāyām ubhayakulasyocchṛjyā sambidhau yugapad ekanāvā tiryakpārasaṃtaraṇād anyatra /
analyzed: ubhaya kulasya ucchṛjyā sambidhau yugapad eka nāvā tiryak pāra saṃtaraṇāt anyatra
vaṅka vaṭa varta parihṛti karṇa yaṣṭi daṇḍa vaṃśa avabhaṅga karṇadhāra vaśāt ca tad artha ārūḍhau prasthāna antarāt
strī ekāki tā rahaḥ tvam apravṛtta jana pracāra tayā pradeśasya

original: Vin_2.1235 / kālaṃ jñātvā praviśeyuḥ na sā[t]rakālaṃ /

analyzed: kiliñja mātrasya upalepaḥ go piṭaga mātrasya iti karma
sāṃghika tā staupika tve ca asya
sāṃghikasya ca atat auddeśikasya nikṣipe ca anyatra pañcake

original: Vin_2.1260 / grahaṇe py anyasya svīkaraṇaṃ duḥbhikṣo [22b5]āvat saṃpattinimantraṇakānāṃ /
analyzed: grahaṇe pi anyasya svīkaraṇam saṃpatti nimantraṇakānām

original: Vin_2.1263 / a bhirucisaṃbhāvane dātur dvitrigrāsābhyavahārād ūrdhaṃ gṛhapate yaṃ bhikṣuḥ piṇḍakena vihanyate numodambā smai dadāmīty abhirocya
analyzed: a bhiruci saṃbhāvane dātuḥ dvi tri grāsa abhyavahārāt ūrdham gṛhapate yam bhikṣuḥ piṇḍakena vihanyate smai dadāmi iti abhirocya
anedaṃdharmakaḥ sa gṛhi svāmikaḥ sarva pāṣāṇḍikaḥ

original: Vin_2.1275 / ardhapañcamānāṃ pakvata[ṇḍu]lamāgadhakaprasthāparimāṇānāṃ [23a2] prasthānām utsṛjya vyañjanam ūrdhaṃ sahāpi sahāyapratyaṃśena
analyzed: ardhapañcamānām pakva taṇḍula māgadhaka prastha parimāṇānām prasthānām utsṛjya vyañjanam ūrdham saha api saha āya pratyaṃśena

original: Vin_2.1281 / grāhyāt prabhūtañ cet bhikṣuṃ saṃvibhajeta //
Vin_2.1284 / yāvatos tā[23a3]vato yasya kasyacid ālavaṇam abhyavahāryasyādāne tadvidhatvaṃ /
analyzed: yāvatoḥ yasya kasyacid ālavaṇam abhyavahāryasya ādāne tadvidha tvam

original: Vin_2.1288 / mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalakhādanīyebhyo nyapaiyāc ca kalpikam asaṃsṛṣ[ṭa]m akalpikenābhyavahāryam abhisaṃbhavanīyapradeśasthasya  #
analyzed: mūla gaṇḍa patra puṣpa phala khādanīyebhyaḥ nyapaiyāt ca kalpikam a saṃsṛṣṭam a kalpikena abhyavahāryam abhisaṃbhavanīya pradeśa sthasya

original: Vin_2.1294 / sthānasya kalā[c]ikayā ūrdham asaṃpādakatve yavāgvāḥ peyatvaṃ /
analyzed: sthānasya kalācikayā ūrdham a saṃpādaka tve yavāgvāḥ peya tvam

original: Vin_2.1297 / na bahiḥsīmān abhisaṃbhāvanīyapradeśān agratas[th]e niriktakaraṇasyot[th]ānaṃ? /
analyzed: na bahis sīmān abhisaṃbhāvanīya pradeśān agratasthe nirikta karaṇasya utthānam

original: Vin_2.1299 / akaraṇīyatvam akalpikasya saṃsṛṣṭasya vā tena /
analyzed: akaraṇīya tvam akalpikasya saṃsṛṣṭasya vā tena

original: Vin_2.1303 / gaccha tavaiva bhavatv iti vacanaṃ karaṇam* /
analyzed: gaccha tava eva bhavatu iti vacanam karaṇam

original: Vin_2.1312 // pratiniyatabhaktāvāsekebhyo nyair antaḥsīmasthair bhikṣubhiḥ saṃghabhūtair asahabhaktatāyāṃ /
analyzed: pratiniyata bhakta avāsekebhyaḥ nyaiḥ antaḥsīma sthaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ saṃgha bhūtaiḥ a sahabhakta tāyām

original: Vin_2.1319 / abhyavahār[e] sthitatatrāgantavyatānā ntaḥsīmāsthānām api pṛcchyāgatatvaṃ /
analyzed: abhyavahāre sthita tatra āgantavya tānām ntar sīmā sthānām api pṛcchya āgata tvam

original: Vin_2.1323 / na gamikāgantukaglānatadupasthāyakopadhivārikād anyo ya[23b3]vanopanvāhārād abhuktatāyāṃ ma?
Vin_2.1327 / pūrvabhakte pratigrāhitaṃ paścāt bhakte tatra yāmātikrāntam iti sannihitaṃ /
analyzed: pūrva bhakte pratigrāhitam paścāt bhakte tatra yāma atikrāntam iti sannihitam

original: Vin_2.1331 / so tra pāko ya āmasya /
Vin_2.1332 / tatvam amṛdūnāṃ prāk tribhāgot svinnatvāt* /

analyzed: na ainā kalpa karaṇam na pākaḥ
na janma āyatta nirmita tvam vāsasya anuṣita tvam

original: Vin_2.1347 / na yāvaj jīvikānām utgṛhītāntaḥpakvabhikṣupakveṣu tatpratiśedhe saṃśitatvaṃ kā[24a1]laṃ prati /
analyzed: na yāvat jīvikānām utgṛhīta antaḥpakva bhikṣu pakveṣu tad pratiśedhe saṃśita tvam prati

original: Vin_2.1352 / bahirasya gomayena mṛdā vā parighṛṣṭodakena sammārgo nirmādanaṃ /
analyzed: bahis asya gomayena mṛdā vā parighṛṣṭa udakena sammārgaḥ nirmādanam

original: Vin_2.1354 / nirmāditatvam āśayato dvitravadhikaṃ dāne visvanato pi pātrasya /
analyzed: nirmādita tvam āśayataḥ dāne pi pātrasya
tasya eva pradeśa parigodhe prakṣālya tvam

original: Vin_2.1360 / niḥsnehatāyai snigdhasya ca ghaṭāder gambhīra udake hrade nidhānaṃ /
analyzed: niḥsneha tāyai snigdhasya ca ghaṭa ādeḥ gambhīre udake hrade nidhānam
ā matsya kacchapa maṇḍūka śiśumāra vullakaiḥ nirleha ādhāraṇam

original: Vin_2.1363 / nirmādane niḥsnehitasyoṣāṭukena gomayena vā śuddhatvaṃ /
analyzed: nirmādane niḥsnehitasya uṣāṭukena gomayena vā śuddha tvam

original: Vin_2.1374 / na tatsaṃyuktadhārā spṛṣṭau na tasya spṛṣṭatā /
analyzed: na tad saṃyukta dhārā spṛṣṭau na tasya spṛṣṭa tā

original: Vin_2.1378 / na vaitarike nodgṛhītatvaṃ pratigrāhita vā /
analyzed: na vaitarike na udgṛhīta tvam vā
eka tvam sannihita pratigṛhīta utgṛhīteṣu tulyayoḥ saṃvareṇa abhinna dṛṣṭyoḥ

original: Vin_2.1384 / śrāmaṇeriya spṛṣṭavā gopanāt tadvad doṣakārī /
Vin_2.1386 / ardhatvaṃ nirapekṣotsṛṣṭasya sāpe[24b1]kṣatāyāṃ tasmān netad yāceta /
analyzed: ardha tvam nirapekṣa utsṛṣṭasya tasmāt na etat yāceta

original: Vin_2.1388 / nākalpikatvaṃ bhāganayane spṛṣṭau nītasya praveśane tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu /
analyzed: na akalpika tvam bhāga nayane spṛṣṭau nītasya praveśane tad rūpeṣu pratyayeṣu

original: Vin_2.1394 / sāṃghikauṣadhayoś codvalator ghaṭṭanāpanayanenāgninirvāpaṇena cīvarakarṇakādi[24b2]bhir vā tadānenetyādau prayatanaṃ /
analyzed: sāṃghika auṣadhayoḥ ca udvalatoḥ ghaṭṭana apanayanena agni nirvāpaṇena vā tadā anena ityādau prayatanam

original: Vin_2.1395 / kalpikam asampattau vidher nadīsaṃtāraṇārthaṃ netari ca saṃprāpaṇārtham udgṛhītam abhāve nyasya pathyadanaṃ /
analyzed: kalpikam a sampattau vidheḥ nadī saṃtāraṇa artham netari ca saṃprāpaṇa artham udgṛhītam abhāve nyasya pathi adanam

original: Vin_2.1398 / saṃpādanañ ca tata eva dānaparivartagrāhyasya /
analyzed: saṃpādanam ca tatas eva dāna parivarta grāhyasya

original: Vin_2.1400 / apratigrāhitasya ca pratigrāhakābhāve 'sya cānyasya vā [24b3] kṛtabhaktacchedasya /
analyzed: a pratigrāhitasya ca pratigrāhaka abhāve ca anyasya vā kṛta bhakta chedasya

original: Vin_2.1404 / bhojyatvaṃ phalānām akāle py akṛtakalpānām apy apratigrāhitānāṃ ca /
analyzed: bhojya tvam phalānām akāle pi a kṛta kalpānām api a pratigrāhitānām ca

original: Vin_2.1408 / svayaṃ ca pātanotpādyate sāhyatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: svayam ca pātanā utpādyate sāhya tvam ca

original: Vin_2.1410 / na karake pānīyaṃ pibet saṃbhave hastanirmādanapatrayoḥ /
analyzed: na karake pānīyam pibet saṃbhave hasta nirmādana patrayoḥ

original: Vin_2.1412 / nāsya sajalatāyām api tattvaṃ* bhajet* /
analyzed: na asya sa jala tāyām api tattvam bhajet
kāṣṭha mayam śaila mayam mṛd mayam iti

original: Vin_2.1420 / bhuñjīta tyaktam āśayato dātrānyapratigrāhakābhāve svayaṃ pratigṛhya /
analyzed: bhuñjīta tyaktam āśayataḥ dātrā anya pratigrāhaka abhāve svayam pratigṛhya

original: Vin_2.1421 / sammukhāntaḥsīmny atisaṃbhavanīye pradeśe vasthite nottānapāṇinā kāye
analyzed: sammukha antar sīmni atisaṃbhavanīye pradeśe vasthite na uttāna pāṇinā kāye
tad saṃbaddhe ca udgrahaṇa samarthataḥ a manuṣyāt api
tad saṃbaṃdhena ca utsṛṣṭasya pratīṣṭiḥ pratigrahaḥ
jaigupsya tāyām janapadasya upanikṣipa iti upadarśite maṇḍalake pi

original: Vin_2.1424 / gocaraḥ śākhāmarkaṭānāṃ na tatas tān pratyanabhisaṃbhavanīyatvaṃ bhūmeḥ /
analyzed: gocaraḥ śākhā markaṭānām na tatas tān prati anabhisaṃbhavanīya tvam bhūmeḥ

original: Vin_2.1425 / na phalānāṃ pañcapīṭhikotsaṃgapātrādhiṣṭhānaiḥ pratigrahapratīṣṭer anyāyyatvam* /
analyzed: na phalānām pañca pīṭhikā utsaṃga pātra adhiṣṭhānaiḥ pratigraha pratīṣṭeḥ anyāyya tvam
nyāhyam bhikṣoḥ cāraka tvam pratigrāhi tvasya

original: Vin_2.1429 / ghṛtatailamadhuphāṇitaghaṭāṃś cārayaṃs tṛṇapatraprabhṛtiś cīvarāṇi vyavadadhyāt* /
analyzed: ghṛta taila madhu phāṇita ghaṭān cārayan tṛṇa patra prabhṛtiḥ cīvarāṇi vyavadadhyāt
pṛthak ca ārye jyeṣṭha madhyama kanīyasām karaṇam

original: Vin_2.1434 / anekatve yāvatām āsanamuktvā pratigrahītuṃ śaktiḥ /
analyzed: aneka tve yāvatām āsanam uktvā pratigrahītum śaktiḥ

original: Vin_2.1435 / luṭhitasya śakyatāyāṃ svayam amuktvā sthānaṃ grahītum adhvaṃsaḥ pratigrāhasya /
analyzed: luṭhitasya śakya tāyām svayam a muktvā sthānam grahītum adhvaṃsaḥ pratigrāhasya

original: Vin_2.1444 / pratīṣṭhyad glāno nupasampannena bhojanam abhāva upasaṃpannasya /
analyzed: glānaḥ n upasampannena bhojanam abhāve upasaṃpannasya

original: Vin_2.1446 / kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyaṃ māṃsam* vallūrā [25a5] iti praṇītabhojanaṃ /
analyzed: kṣīram dadhi navanītam matsyam māṃsam vallūrāḥ iti praṇīta bhojanam

original: Vin_2.1447 / etat kartṛtvaṃ ajñātigṛhītā ca dātuḥ /
analyzed: etat kartṛ tvam ajñāti gṛhītā ca dātuḥ

original: Vin_2.1448 / svavijñaptyābhyavahṛtau vijñaptau kāritatve cāsyā duṣkṛtasya /
analyzed: sva vijñaptyā abhyavahṛtau vijñaptau kārita tve ca asyāḥ duṣkṛtasya

original: Vin_2.1450 / tasmāl labhamānasyāpi ced anyallūhaṃ praṇītam vā samaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vā vijñaptiḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt labhamānasya api ced anyat lūham praṇītam vā samam prakṛṣṭam vā vijñaptiḥ
yathā sukha pravāraṇa tvam bhikṣayā ādāya nirgatena tūṣṇīm

original: tiṣṭhataḥ pratikṣipto vā tat kiṃ* yācasa iti / prasnasya
analyzed: tiṣṭhataḥ pratikṣiptaḥ vā tat kim yācase iti
udakam sarppiḥ taila madhu phāṇita kṣīra dadhi navanīta śukta śuluka dadhimaṇḍa kāṃcika phala khādyaka ādeḥ upayojyasya

original: Vin_2.1459 / tadyathā [25b2] snānaṃ* pānaṃ* dantakāṣṭhavisarjanaṃ* hastapādaprakṣālanaṃ* /
analyzed: tat yathā snānam pānam dantakāṣṭha visarjanam hasta pāda prakṣālanam

original: Vin_2.1460 / upakārye sa upayogo ya upakaraṇeṣu /

analyzed: abhyavahārya pātra cīvara sthāna danta dhāvana agni prabhṛtīni śarīra upakaraṇāni
teṣām mṛd gomaya raṅga tṛṇa kāṣṭha prabhṛti

original: Vin_2.1463 / teṣu upayogas tadyathā nirmādanaṃ bhāvanaṃ* rañjanaṃ* sekaḥ sam*mārga upalepaḥ /
analyzed: teṣu upayogaḥ tat yathā nirmādanam bhāvanam rañjanam sekaḥ sammārgaḥ upalepaḥ
a kapalasakāt anyena roma vidhā ādinā snānam

original: Vin_2.1468 / tenāsya hi riktaprāṇakadhātāv udaka ity api prayogāḥ
analyzed: tena asya hi rikta prāṇaka dhātau udake iti api prayogāḥ
