original: Vin_2.1470 / dattapratyeṣṭyabhāṇḍottmākāśāvasthāpyākīryamāṇapavyajalapra-[25b4]tyeṣṭyapavitya asam* yamārthaya lahakaṇṭakaras tridaṇḍas tadākhyaḥ

analyzed: sthāna artham jalasya astṛteḥ pariśrāvaṇe dānam

original: Vin_2.1487 / ātyuhāyāṃ kalpikajalasya sam*[26a1]bhāvadāyāñ ca karakakuṇḍikābhyām etat tadvattvaṃ /
Vin_2.1489 / tadrūpaś cet pratyayaḥ kṣamayitvā kāryakaraṇe stitvam āstitvaṃ /
analyzed: tad rūpaḥ ced pratyayaḥ kṣamayitvā kārya karaṇe stitvam āstitvam

original: Vin_2.1490 / tasmāt tadvattvam atra dāne pratijñāte nyena /
analyzed: tasmāt tadvat tvam atra dāne pratijñāte

original: Vin_2.1491 / naitaj janapadacārikāyām viyuktau dānāpratijñāne saṃśrayet* /
analyzed: na etat janapada cārikāyām viyuktau dāna a pratijñāne saṃśrayet

original: Vin_2.1494 / na pramīlya gatasya sthāne tadvattvābhāve kāmajaḥ /
analyzed: na pramīlya gatasya sthāne tadvat tva abhāve kāma jaḥ
na ekena anekasya tadvat tva asaṃpattiḥ ā saṃghāt
na avighāta kṛt tvam śīghra srotasaḥ

original: Vin_2.1497 / krośamanu gacchato 'syāmanusroto 'nusaṃhitaṃ* pratyavekṣaṇāt tena pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: krośam anu gacchataḥ syām anusrotaḥ nu saṃhitam pratyavekṣaṇāt tena pravṛttiḥ

original: Vin_2.1498 / sambhedaś ced atrodakāntareṇa prāk tataḥ /
analyzed: sambhedaḥ ced atra udaka antareṇa prāk tatas
na ati kṛyā saṃkhyām atra ciratām kuryāta

original: Vin_2.1505 / tūlikayā sukaraṃ prāṇakānāṃ darśayanaṃ* ślakṣṇayā /

analyzed: ced pradīpe tad karaṇena asya pracchādanam

original: Vin_2.1510 / pañjaraṃ vaṃśavi[26a4]dalikānāṃ śuklavastrasya veṣṭim abhrapaṭalena vā tadākhyam /
Vin_2.1512 / ādyakṛtitvā karparaṃ vā ghaṭādeś chidritam /
Vin_2.1514 / achaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā bhadramukhādarśanapathe tiṣṭheti vadet* /
analyzed: a chaṭā śabdam kṛtvā bhadra mukha a darśana pathe tiṣṭha iti vadet

original: Vin_2.1515 / asthitāvajapadakena daṇḍena śanaiṣkumbhe kuṇḍake vā prakṣipya chidrāṇi kṛtvā mukhaṃ pidhāya niṣkāsanam /
Vin_2.1516 / [26a5] asaṃmattau paṭṭikayā loṭhikayā murucikayā vā rajupāśena vā natuke veṣṭitena grīvāyāṃ baddhvā /
analyzed: a saṃmattau paṭṭikayā loṭhikayā murucikayā vā raju pāśena vā veṣṭitena grīvāyām baddhvā
niṣpīḍanasya dvaye pi asmin upakara tvam
nirāvadya ālaṃbha pratyaya saṃgha pudgala pariśrāvaṇa prasravaṇa pratyayena pravṛttiḥ
bhāṇḍa gopakasya tad gataḥ sāṃghike vyāpāraḥ
na atra dāna grahaṇayoḥ na antarbhāvaḥ

original: Vin_2.1538 / nānena dānapatīnāṃ vihāre deyatvasya noktatā [26b3] navasya bhikṣave niddeyatvena /
analyzed: na anena dānapatīnām vihāre deya tvasya na ukta tā navasya bhikṣave niddeya tvena
na ākalpikaiḥ enat hasta cīvaraiḥ cārayet
kālena kālam udaka bhāṇḍānām antar śocanam

original: Vin_2.1555 / gambhīrāṇām uśīrakurvakena patravaibhaṅgukair natrakena vā yaṣṭyām upanibaddhena /
analyzed: gambhīrāṇām uśīrakurvakena patra vaibhaṅgukaiḥ natrakena vā yaṣṭyām upanibaddhena
na atas ramvṛ tvam āmiṣa upadehasya

original: Vin_2.1577 / utsṛjya jñātiṃ* pravrajāpekṣaṃ* glānañ ca /
analyzed: utsṛjya jñātim pravraja apekṣam glānam ca
an idaṃliṅga pravrajitasya a celakasya kāye kāya sambaddhe vā
utsṛjya pāpaga dṛṣṭi gatāt vivecana artha tām
utsṛjya rāja devī kumāra amatya bhaṭa vala agra naigama jānapada uktim

original: Vin_2.1591 / vinaite tatra rātrindivadvayaparipūrer ūrdham vāse /
analyzed: vinā ete tatra rātrindiva dvaya paripūreḥ ūrdham vāse

original: Vin_2.1601 / spṛṣṭir udyūthanaṃ prasthāya darśanārtham upavicārāntātikrame dṛṣṭir iti mūlāni /
analyzed: spṛṣṭiḥ udyūthanam prasthāya darśana artham upavicāra anta atikrame dṛṣṭiḥ iti mūlāni

original: Vin_2.1603 / na hastyaśvakukkuṭalāvakavartakastrīpuruṣayuddhādi kuryāt kārayen nirīkṣeta vā /
analyzed: na hasti aśva kukkuṭa lāvaka vartaka strī puruṣa yuddha ādi kuryāt kārayet nirīkṣeta vā

original: Vin_2.1605 / kāyatanniḥsṛṣṭasambaddhair yena [27b1]kenacid antataḥ pādāṅguṣṭhasarṣapatūlikabhiḥ prahṛtau /
analyzed: kāya tad niḥsṛṣṭa sambaddhaiḥ yena antatas pādāṅguṣṭha sarṣapa tūlikabhiḥ prahṛtau

original: Vin_2.1614 / na bhittau bhūmyāṃ vṛkṣe nyatra vā /
analyzed: na bhittau bhūmyām vṛkṣe nyatra vā
utsṛjya asparśa śrāmaṇya brahmacarya antarāya saṃgha saṃkṣobha aśaṅka vaśa tām

original: Vin_2.1622 // saṃ*cintya muktvā rogapratikṛyārtha tāṃ gṛhī dātṛbhaktachedasya kāraṇe /
analyzed: saṃcintya muktvā tām gṛhī dātṛ bhakta chedasya kāraṇe

original: Vin_2.1624 / śāstṛdharmasaṃghasabrahmacāriṇāṃ dharmyakaraṇīyārthatāpekṣā pātraraṃgakarmaṇoś ca samayādhiṣṭhānam* /
analyzed: śāstṛ dharma saṃgha sabrahmacāriṇām dharmya karaṇīya artha tā apekṣā pātra raṃga karmaṇoḥ ca samaya adhiṣṭhānam
krīḍāyām cara parayā candra sūrya alāta cakra ādi karaṇāt ca
a adhiṣṭḥita samayasya a glānya vaśa tā sthasya spṛṣṭau
prajvāla nirvāpaṇa spṛṣṭa a spṛṣṭa indhana samvavadhāna yukta niṣkarṣaṇa aṅgāra samāvartana niṣkarṣaṇeṣu
anyasya nyasya eti adhiṣṭhānam ardha adhiṣṭhānam
vṛttasya mata dānasya pratyuddhāra arthāyām vā api
na a candra sūrya ālokavati avavaraka deśe śayīta
tad gata tvam saṃbaddhasya tad dvāra pārśva upacārasya āgāra bhūtasya
pura antarasya ca tad gata dvārasya anantarasya ca

original: Vin_2.1645 / na sopacārāt parasya layanamātrāt pṛthagbhūtādhyāsitasya /
analyzed: na sa upacārāt parasya layana mātrāt pṛthak bhūta adhyāsitasya
ardha tvam vṛkṣa mūla kuḍya śuśira vūrta mūlānām

original: Vin_2.1648 / adhvano tra kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane ntaram abhūtatvaṃ /
analyzed: adhvanaḥ tra kukkuṭasya utpātya nilayane a bhūta tvam
sarvasya sa antara saṃcārasya niḥ anagāra antara tve chadanasya eka tvam
uddhṛta tvam ca niḥśrayaṇeḥ pura antare
hāsaḥ nagāra tve nyap ū tāt

original: Vin_2.1655 / [28a3]anupasaṃpannena sārdham agāre tritīyasyāṃ rātro svapne /
Vin_2.1657 / prāk duṣgṛtaṃ nirdoṣam adhvapariśrāntasya klāntau /
analyzed: prāk duṣgṛtam nirdoṣam adhva pariśrāntasya klāntau

original: Vin_2.1659 / akalpini ca bhikṣor karaṇīye tatsaṃpādakena sārdhaṃ* glānasya tadupasthāyinaś ca /
analyzed: akalpini ca bhikṣoḥ karaṇīye tad saṃpādakena sārdham glānasya tad upasthāyinaḥ ca

original: Vin_2.1660 / śrāmaṇereṇa ca tadvataḥ sannihitatāyāṃ tatrāvāse pāpabhikṣoḥ kṛtakurvattan nivāsaprayatnasya /
analyzed: śrāmaṇereṇa ca tadvataḥ sannihita tāyām tatra āvāse pāpa bhikṣoḥ nivāsa prayatnasya

original: Vin_2.1661 / upagato [28a4]paścimakālayor dvayor ādyayor māsayor vartamānasya /
Vin_2.1666 / middhopapātenādhvani śrāmaṇeram abhiplutaṃ* purataḥ kṛtvā gacchet* /
analyzed: middha upapātena adhvani śrāmaṇeram abhiplutam puratas kṛtvā gacchet

original: Vin_2.1667 / bubhukṣitaś cet sānukālaṃ dadyād asmai tadāhāram* /
analyzed: bubhukṣitaḥ ced sa anukālam dadyāt asmai tad āhāram

original: Vin_2.1669 // tathāham bhagavato dharmadeśitam ājānāmi yathā āntareyikadharmā uktā
analyzed: tathā aham bhagavataḥ dharma deśitam ājānāmi yathā āntareyika dharmā uktā

original: bhagavato pratiṣevyamāne lam antarāyāyetyādi pravṛttavacanatāvasarge jaigupsyamata
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pratiṣevyamāne lam antarāyāya ityādi pravṛtta vacanatā avasarge
tathā vidita prakṣiptasya a pratikṛ tāyām bhikṣoḥ
muktvā glāni a dṛś vivecana gatena arthena

original: Vin_2.1684 / jñapte caturthasya te karmaṇa iti pūrvatrottaratranāśanīyasya te ity
analyzed: jñapte caturthasya te karmaṇaḥ iti pūrvatra uttaratra nāśanīyasya te iti

original: upakramaṃ jñapti<<ḥ>> kṛtā ni<<ḥ>>sṛjedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prathamā karmavācanā
analyzed: upakramam jñaptiḥ kṛtā niḥsṛja idam evaṃrūpam pāpakam dṛṣṭi gatam prathamā karma vācanā

original: kṛtā dvitīyeti pratyetadantam asmai bhikṣuṇā śrāvayeyuḥ /
analyzed: kṛtā dvitīyā iti pratyetad antam asmai bhikṣuṇā śrāvayeyuḥ
gairikena valkalena iti an uparaktasya sva vāsasaḥ
antatas pātra vasyaka sthāvikā pāda coḍa kāya bandhanānām prāvaraṇa ādau paribhoge
na nikāya antarīyasya punar kalpanīya tvam
na mahā raṅga raktam prāvṛttim bhajeta

original: Vin_2.1696 / ekatve vṛddhāntād ārabhya yāvat saṃbhāvanām uparidānaṃ /
analyzed: ekatve vṛddhāntāt ārabhya yāvat saṃbhāvanām upari dānam

original: Vin_2.1698 / anvākrāmed upanimantritaḥ puṇyakāmena navamāchinnadaśāt parāhatyānityatāmanasikāreṇa /
analyzed: anvākrāmet upanimantritaḥ puṇya kāmena navama āchinna daśāt parāhatya anitya tā manasikāreṇa

original: Vin_2.1701 / śastram etat saṃgrāmāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍañ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ /
analyzed: śastram etat saṃgrāma avacaram bhāṇḍam ca gandharva avacaram

original: Vin_2.1704 / muktvā svīkārānā anugata dravyāvināśacittasya vihāratadupacāragataṃ /
analyzed: dravya avināśa cittasya vihāra tad upacāra gatam

original: Vin_2.1707 / nāsamuditacinnāya svāmy aham iti bruvate dadyāt* /
analyzed: na a samudita cinnāya svāmī aham iti bruvate dadyāt

original: Vin_2.1710 / ūrdham anāgatau yat bhūmau buddhasāṃghikayor labdhiṃ* tatropayuktiḥ /
analyzed: ūrdham anāgatau yat bhūmau buddha sāṃghikayoḥ labdhim tatra upayuktiḥ

original: Vin_2.1711 / ayogyatve krayanaṃ yogyasya tena sthāvarasya /
analyzed: ayogya tve krayanam yogyasya tena sthāvarasya

original: Vin_2.1712 / tadā cet svāmy āgacched anujñānam āyā..ya[29a2]n ichate dadyuḥ /
analyzed: tadā ced svāmī āgacchet anujñānam ichate dadyuḥ

original: Vin_2.1713 / vṛddhiñ cet mṛgayed etad eva na bahu manyase yad asmābhiḥ paripālitam iti brūyuḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhim ced mṛgayet etat eva na bahu manyase yat asmābhiḥ paripālitam iti brūyuḥ
vīṇā veṇu vallari mahatim utghoṣakānām satantrīka tve
ta tve śīli eka taḥ ṛ dhānām
kācamaṇi palāla māla kāṇḍa vīnika talam aḍu kapiñjanaka tulikā kāṇḍānām ardha tvam

original: Vin_2.1725 / gopayitvotrāse gṛhītvā vānuparodhe svasya sāṃghikam* [29a4]staupikañ ca hiraṇyasuvarṇam apakramaṇaṃ /
analyzed: gopayitvā utrāse gṛhītvā vā an uparodhe svasya sāṃghikam ca hiraṇya suvarṇam apakramaṇam

original: Vin_2.1731 / nirdoṣam amānuṣabhavane puṇyanirjātaṃ ced eṣāṃ ratnamayaṃ bhūmisopādānādi /
analyzed: nirdoṣam amānuṣa bhavane puṇya nirjātam ced eṣām ratna mayam bhūmi sa upādāna ādi

original: Vin_2.1732 / bhojane ca bhājanam asambhave nyasya /
Vin_2.1738 / niṣīded dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ ratnamaye siṃ*hāsane parāhatyānityatāmanasikāreṇa /
analyzed: niṣīdet dharma śravaṇa artham ratna maye siṃhāsane parāhatya anitya tā manasikāreṇa
niveśane ca āgārikīyāṇi iti saṃprekṣya tad prajñaptau
atra ca maṇi pratyupteṣu suvarṇa rūpya khaciteṣu

original: Vin_2.1742 [29b1]nākalpikatvam upasthāpitaśāstṛsaṃjñānām āgārikaśrāmaṇerābhāve buddhapra kṛter dharmyārthavaśatayā spṛṣṭau /
analyzed: upasthāpita śāstṛ saṃjñānām āgārika śrāmaṇeḥ abhāve buddha pra kṛteḥ dharmya artha vaśa tayā spṛṣṭau
trapu tāmra ritīkam sa jatu kāṣṭha śailamṛd danta śṛṅgebhyaḥ

original: Vin_2.1748 / cihnaṃ sāṃghikāyām madhye cakraṃ pārśvayor mṛgāv adhastād vihārasvā[29b2]mino nāma(ḥ) /
analyzed: cihnam sāṃghikāyām madhye cakram pārśvayoḥ mṛgau adhastāt
paiṅgalikāyām asthi saṃkalā śira kapālam vā
anāpattiḥ udaka pratyavekṣaṇa artha tāyām vraṇa valī palita darśane

original: Vin_2.1768 / anabhimato dātuḥ śironte pādānte vā /
analyzed: anabhimataḥ dātuḥ śiraḥ ante pāda ante vā

original: Vin_2.1771 / lambanaṃ mālādyāśūcyām atrāvatūsitāyāṃ kaṇṭake vā /
analyzed: lambanam mālā ādyāḥ śūcyām kaṇṭake vā
cakṣuṣyam sugandhi iti kāla anukālam ghrāṇam
sa śeṣam ced cīvara karṇake ṣ

original: Vin_2.1778 / na cet* stambhasya[29b5]śuṣire kuḍyasya vā nikṣepaḥ /
Vin_2.1784 / guryāt śāstṛguṇasaṃkīrtane tridaṇḍakadāne ca svaraguptiṃ* /

analyzed: na saṃcagghana saṃkrīḍana saṃkilikilāyana auddhatya drava kāya tāḍyāni kuryāt
na auddhatya abhiprāyaḥ kāya vācaḥ vikurvīta
na ūru vāhu matsya parivartakam parivartet
na hasti kruñcita aśva heṣita ṛṣabha garjita mayūra kokila rutāni kuryāt
na mukha śaṃkha ḍuḍḍuka bherī vādanam

original: Vin_2.1801 / śiṣṭād adhyardhato grīsmasya pūrvataś ca varṣāṇāṃ māsāt* /
analyzed: śiṣṭāt adhyardhataḥ grīsmasya pūrvataḥ ca varṣāṇām māsāt
anyadā pañcadaśāt a snāna divasāt arvāk snāne

original: Vin_2.1813 / tasmād utta[30a4]raṇaṃ saṃcetitayā mūrchitasekeṣv anāpattiḥ /
Vin_2.1815 / na saṃbhave parasyotsvāsakalpaṃ saṃśrayet snātaprāyaś cittikaṃ //
analyzed: na saṃbhave parasya utsvāsa kalpam saṃśrayet snāta prāyaḥ cittikam

original: Vin_2.1817 tadānyadā vā tannidānaṃ mṛtau duṣkṛta(kṛ)
analyzed: tadā anyadā vā tad nidānam mṛtau duṣkṛta kṛ

original: Vin_2.1818 // na tvam upasaṃpannaḥ parājayikam asyāpanna ityādyartha bhikṣvarthena kaukṛtyopasaṃhṛtau [30a5]bhikṣoḥ /
analyzed: na tvam upasaṃpannaḥ parājayikam asya āpannaḥ ityādi artha bhikṣu arthena kaukṛtya upasaṃhṛtau
aṅguli muṣṭi aratni skandha śīrṣa pārśva pṛṣṭha kaṭi ūru jaṅghā jānu pādāṅguṣṭha ādibhiḥ pratodanāt spṛṣṭau vikiraṇa cittena
tasmāt vraṇa maśa pilpa tilaka roma āvarta ādi darśanena āpattiḥ

original: Vin_2.1832 / kṣolasūpayū[30b2]ṣamaṇḍe ca satyam api taptatāyāṃ /

analyzed: tasmāt prahlādana chandena avatārāḥ dau anāpattiḥ
taraṇa śikṣāyām tiryañc āyatam vā vyāyāme

original: Vin_2.1839 // mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham ekasmin āgāre middhāvakrāntau [30b3]niśayāṃ /
analyzed: mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham ekasmin āgāre middha avakrāntau
hāsa prekṣayā api bhiṣaṇa chandena bhaya nimitta upasaṃhāra pūrvakam vijñapane

original: Vin_2.1844 / bhayaṃkarasyāmuko yam iti bhikṣoḥ pareṇāpy anutpattāv api bhayasya /
analyzed: bhayaṃkarasya amukaḥ yam iti bhikṣoḥ pareṇa api anutpattau api bhayasya

original: Vin_2.1846 / tad yathā pretapiśācakumbhāṇḍakaṭapūtanatvā[30b4]khyāpinām* kīṭanaṃ kīṭakīṭānām aṅgārikā nāṃ dagdhasthūṇānibhānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ /
analyzed: tat yathā kīṭanam kīṭa kīṭānām aṅgārikāḥ nām dagdha sthūṇā nibhānām rūpāṇām
siṃha vyāghra dvīpi koka paṭa raru bhraṣṭa urokā śabdānām
tat yathā deva nāga gandharva yakṣa kinnara mahā uraga tva khyāpinām
aguru candana kuṅkuma tamāla pattra gandhānām
paṭṭa paṭa prāvara aṃśuka dukūla koṭṭamvaka sparśāṇām
tasmāt saṃvejana artham naraka tiryak preta manuṣya kathā ādau anapattiḥ
kāya bandhana ādi śrāmaṇaka jīvita pariskāra nidhāne

original: Vin_2.1861 // dattasya bhikṣor nirdeyaṃ cīvarasya vinā tadanujñānaṃ paribhoge /
analyzed: dattasya bhikṣoḥ nirdeyam cīvarasya vinā tad anujñānam paribhoge

original: Vin_2.1862 / na ced asya tannidānaṃ prītes sambhāvanā /
analyzed: na ced asya tad nidānam prīteḥ sambhāvanā

original: Vin_2.1863 // dhvansanachandena bikṣor vinidhāyasaṃjñā saṃghāvaśeṣāpatanasya vijñaptau /
analyzed: dhvansana chandena bikṣoḥ vinidhāya saṃjñā saṃgha avaśeṣa āpatanasya vijñaptau

original: Vin_2.1869 / naṣṭañ cenam adhvano dhvany avatārayantīṃ* /
analyzed: naṣṭam ca inam adhvanaḥ dhvani avatārayantīm

original: Vin_2.1871 // grāmaghātakaiś coraiḥ śulkabhañjakair vā vaṇigbhiḥ /
analyzed: grāma ghātakaiḥ coraiḥ śulka bhañjakaiḥ vā vaṇigbhiḥ

original: Vin_2.1875 / nāsāv enaṃ pūrṇatāṃ na pṛcchet* /
analyzed: na asau enam pūrṇa tām na pṛcchet
muktvā catur aṅgula mātra kīlaka nikhananam nava karmikasya nakṣatra prayogena asannihita kalpa kārasya

original: Vin_2.1894 / tasmāt kārtsnyam eva sa nyūnānyatra vṛtāyāṃ /
analyzed: tasmāt kārtsnyam eva sa nyūna anyatra vṛtāyām
caṭitakānām ca pṛthivīparpaṭaka kūla kanthā tad lepānām
tasmāt gaṇana nyasana ādi abhiprāyasya anāpattiḥ

original: Vin_2.1905 / udyoja[31b2]nañ ca pariveṣaṇe tipattau kālasya /
Vin_2.1910 / vinā maryādāvyavasthāpanena pravāritavato nyathā paunaḥpuṇyenātyarthatayā cordham akṛtapravāraṇāca caturthamāsaparisamāpter ūrdhaṃ  #
analyzed: vinā maryādā vyavasthāpanena pravāritavataḥ nyathā paunaḥpuṇyena atyartha tayā ca ūrdham a kṛta pravāraṇāt ca caturtha māsa parisamāpteḥ ūrdham

original: Vin_2.1916 / purastād api yena na pravāritaḥ /
Vin_2.1920 / asyānte śikṣitasya mityākhyā dayamānāyām uddeśena vā bhikṣuṇā na śi[31b4]kṣiṣyāmīty etat kāraṇabhāvena nivedayiturajñatām utbhāvayato  #
analyzed: asya ante śikṣitasya miti ākhyā dayamānāyām uddeśena vā bhikṣuṇā na etat kāraṇa bhāvena nivedayituḥ ajña tām utbhāvayataḥ

original: Vin_2.1922 / bhikṣor adhikaraṇasaṃpradhāraṇasya bhikṣubhir upaśrutyartham utsṛjyopaśamanachandenāvadhāne /
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ adhikaraṇa saṃpradhāraṇasya bhikṣubhiḥ upaśruti artham utsṛjya upaśamana chandena avadhāne

original: Vin_2.1926 / arthāntara[31b5]vaśāyām upaśliṣṭau cetanād ūrdham padacchaṭotkāśanaśabdādibhiḥr acetayato na cet mugdhaḥ śamārthī vā niyatamātṛtāyāṃ  #
analyzed: upaśliṣṭau cetanāt ūrdham acetayataḥ na ced mugdhaḥ śama arthī vā niyata mātṛ tāyām

original: Vin_2.1928 / nopaśṛṇuyāta nainaṃ kurvantam anuparivātya tiṣṭhet* /
analyzed: na upaśṛṇuyāta na enam kurvantam anuparivātya tiṣṭhet
jñapti ādi karmaṇi saṃnipatitasya an avalokya bhikṣum prakrāntau
sthāna gamana śayana āsana vihāra grahaṇa bhāṣa tad viparyaya ādeḥ upanītasya artha āsya anādarāt vinā dharmya saṃjñapti dāne
na rājā arhan saṃgha sthavirāṇām ājñām kopayet
puṣpa phalānām madya gandha rasānām vā madayitṝṇām peyānām

original: Vin_2.1956 / abhāve tra bhikṣos tadvat bhikṣuṇī /

analyzed: sīmāntara stha utkṣipta anya pakṣāṇām ca

original: Vin_2.1964 / tanmukhikayā ca saṃghopanimantraṇenāsmad ānāgamanavaśāt pariveṣo 'tipātya ity apariprāpya dātari tṛtīyaprabhṛtau /
analyzed: tad mukhikayā ca saṃgha upanimantraṇena asmat ān āgamana vaśāt pariveṣaḥ tipātyaḥ iti a pariprāpya dātari tṛtīya prabhṛtau
antya aruṇasya etat atra an utgata tvam
na ced rāja devi kumāra amati antarāya vinayana vaśena
na an anuśrāvya rāja kulam praviśet

original: Vin_2.1978 / [32b2]vartamāne prātimokṣoddeśe nubhūtavatadvayasyāsaṃvignena manasā saṃprati mayā jñātam ayam apy atra dharmo vidyata ity asyoktau

analyzed: anya vyañjanena uddeśe sādhāraṇim prati duṣkṛtam
a satkṛtya prātimokṣa uddeśa śrutim upanayantam saṃvejayeyuḥ
na a pṛṣṭvā abhinna tām deśanām pratigṛhṇīyāt
uttareṣu api etat pañca pracheda upasaṃhitam

original: Vin_2.1992 / anyaś ca muktvā śiraḥ pādāntau /
analyzed: anyaḥ ca muktvā śiraḥ pāda antau
na ucca śayana mahā śayane niṣīdet nipadyet
ahastaḥ eṣa māṭanikā pradeśa varjyānām pramāṇam

original: Vin_2.2006 / pañca tūlāni śālmalamārkaṃ kāśamayaṃ vaukamaira[33a1]kañ ca /
analyzed: pañca tūlāni śālmala mārkam kāśa mayam ca

original: Vin_2.2007 / niṣadanasya pramāṇam asya dairghyasya hastatrayaṃ/
analyzed: niṣadanasya pramāṇam asya dairghyasya hasta trayam
vistārasya hasta dvayam ṣaṣ vā aṅgulayaḥ

original: Vin_2.2017 / tatpramāṇasyātat tanordhvam vā cīvarasya karaṇakāraṇe /
analyzed: tad pramāṇasya a tat tanā ūrdhvam vā cīvarasya karaṇa kāraṇe

original: Vin_2.2021 / svapratipādi[33a3]tasyāpariveṣeṇa svayaṃ grāmasthena pratigṛhya khādanīyabhojanīyasyābhyavahāre /
analyzed: svayam grāma sthena pratigṛhya khādanīya bhojanīyasya abhyavahāre

original: Vin_2.2025 / nāsannidhau nikṣeptur ādānaṃ nikṣiptasya tasmā(mmā)t* /

analyzed: bhikṣuṇī piṇḍa grahaṇam nāma prathamam pratideśanīyam

original: Vin_2.2026 / khādyakam iha dehi pānakaṃ bho[33a4]janaṃ bhūyo cetyādi tasmin* bhikṣvantare vā vyapadeśapravṛttabhikṣuṇyavasthānakartṛ /
Vin_2.2027 / na cet tanmukhikayā tatjñātinā vā nimantraṇakam /
analyzed: na ced tad mukhikayā tad jñātinā vā nimantraṇakam
utsṛjya gantri vyapadeśam adatta dāpanam ca

original: Vin_2.2029 / āgamayasva tāvad bhagini yāvad bhikṣavo bhuñjata ity anājñaptāyāṃ tasyāṃ bhikṣuṇā yena kena cid asahabhujā pitṛprabhṛtibhikṣunimantraṇaka[33a5]bhuktau
analyzed: āgamayasva tāvat bhagini yāvat bhikṣavaḥ bhuñjate iti an ājñaptāyām tasyām bhikṣuṇā yena kena cid a sahabhujā
upacāra prāpta ced sā vacanasya maulyāḥ

original: Vin_2.2036 / śrāddhasya vighātaś cedd asya dāne kula[33b1]śikṣāsamvṛtiṃ dadyuḥ /
analyzed: śrāddhasya vighātaḥ ced asya dāne dadyuḥ

original: Vin_2.2038 / dattaitadaś cittaṃ buddhvā niveśanagamanāsanaparibhogadharmadeśanāni kuryāt* /
analyzed: cittam buddhvā niveśana gamana āsana paribhoga dharma deśanāni kuryāt

original: Vin_2.2040 / dadyād asya yācamānebhyo bālebhyaḥ piṇḍapātrāt pūpikām asakalāṃ /
analyzed: dadyāt asya yācamānebhyaḥ bālebhyaḥ piṇḍa pātrāt pūpikām asakalām

original: Vin_2.2042 / dattāśikṣāsamvṛteḥ kulāt prāktaddānād animantritaś ca pratigṛhya khādanī[33b2]yabhojanīyayor utsṛjyakakaṭikāmūlakaharitakam avighāty  #
analyzed: datta a śikṣā samvṛteḥ kulāt prāk tad dānāt a nimantritaḥ ca pratigṛhya utsṛjyaka kaṭikā mūlaka haritakam avighāti
kula śikṣā bhaṅga pravṛttiḥ tṛtīyam pratideśanīyam
dadyuḥ asmai satya ārthika tve purobhaktikām

original: Vin_2.2051 / araṇye bahirārāmasya pratigṛhya khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyam cābhyavaharet* /
analyzed: araṇye bahis ārāmasya pratigṛhya khādanīyam bhojanīyam ca abhyavaharet

original: Vin_2.2054 / [33b4] tathā nivasanaṃ nivasīta yathā parimaṇḍalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ syāt* /
analyzed: tathā nivasanam nivasīta yathā parimaṇḍalam saṃsthitam syāt
na ca ati utkṛṣṭam na ati apakṛṣṭam

original: Vin_2.2060 / tathā cīvaraṃ prāvṛṇvīta yathā syādyaṃ trayaṃ syāt* /
analyzed: tathā cīvaram prāvṛṇvīta yathā syāt yam trayam syāt
su pratichannaḥ lpa śabdaḥ na utkṣipta cakṣuḥ yuga mātra darśīm

original: Vin_2.2090 / nānāgate khādanīye bhojanīye pā[34a2]tram upanāmayet* /

analyzed: na anāgate ālope mukha dvāram vṛṇvīt

original: Vin_2.2096 / na bhūyaskāmatayaudanena sūpikaṃ sūpikena caudanaṃ pratichādayeta /
analyzed: na bhūyaskāma tayā odanena sūpikam sūpikena ca odanam pratichādayeta

original: Vin_2.2100 / na sālopena mukhena vācaṃ [34a3] niścārayet* /

analyzed: na hasta pātra avaleha sandhūna saṃtolam
na avadhyāna prekṣi āntarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayet
na sa āmiṣeṇa pāṇinā udaka sthālakam pratigṛhṇīyāt
na sa āmiṣeṇa udakena āntarikam bhikṣum siñcet

original: Vin_2.2112 / naitad antargṛhe chorayed anavalokya gṛhapatiṃ /
analyzed: na etat antargṛhe chorayet an avalokya gṛhapatim

original: Vin_2.2114 / triḥ prakṣālya pātramārṣabhir gāthābhir abhimantrapātrodakaṃ dadyāt* /
analyzed: tris prakṣālya pātra mārṣabhiḥ gāthābhiḥ abhimantra pātra udakam dadyāt
na an āstīrṇe pṛthivī pradeśe pātram sthāpayeta

original: Vin_2.2118 / na prapātena prāgbhāreṇa na catuspathe /

analyzed: na anuśrota ūnena nadī āhārya hāriṇyāḥ pānīyam gṛhṇīyāt

original: Vin_2.2124 / na nīcatarāsane niṣaṇṇa uccatarake niṣaṇṇāya /
analyzed: na nīcatara āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ uccatarake niṣaṇṇāya

original: Vin_2.2126 / na pṛṣṭato gacchan* purato gacchane /

analyzed: na hasti aśva yāna sibikā mañja pādukā ārūḍhāya
na kholā mauli uṣṇīṣa veṣṭita mālā śirase
na chatra daṇḍa śastra khatga āyudha pāṇaye

original: Vin_2.2138 / na puruṣadaghnād ūrdhaṃ vṛkṣasyādhirohed anyatrāpadaḥ /
analyzed: na puruṣa daghnāt ūrdham vṛkṣasya adhirohet anyatra āpadaḥ
samāptaḥ ca vibhaṅgaḥ atha bhikṣuṇī vibhaṅgaḥ

original: Vin_2.2148 / paṃsaś cet tadānīm* tatra vijñāyamānan tayaitat(a) /
Vin_2.2152 / na bālam apy anyanna spṛśet* /
analyzed: na bālam api anyat na spṛśet
tad gata artha parijñāne vāci paripūrṇa kāri tvam

original: Vin_2.2157 / pratyupasthitaṃ sevāyāṃ raktan tasyāṃ pumāṃsaṃ tatprāpyatāyāṃ /
analyzed: pratyupasthitam sevāyām tasyām pumāṃsam tad prāpya tāyām

original: Vin_2.2158 / auddhatyasya raktena sārddhaṃ raktayā karaṇe sthūlaṃ /
analyzed: auddhatyasya raktena sārddham raktayā karaṇe sthūlam
bhikṣoḥ nivāraka tvasya a prati niḥsaṅge

original: Vin_2.2173 / nātaḥ paṇyena dāsyāḥ preṣaṇasya bahir bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na atas paṇyena dāsyāḥ preṣaṇasya bahis bhāvaḥ

original: Vin_2.2182 / na raktād araktāyāḥ [35a1] kiñcitkasvīkāre doṣa iti bhikṣuṇībodhane /
analyzed: na raktāt araktāyāḥ kiñcitka svīkāre doṣaḥ iti bhikṣuṇī bodhane
vitṛtīya tvam śikṣamāṇa tvam tṛtīyaḥ ṅgaḥ śrāmaṇerī

original: Vin_2.2191 / cīvared ekākinī jñātigṛhabhuktinimittaṃ durbhikṣe labdhāyāṃ jñātibhir
analyzed: cīvaret ekākinī jñāti gṛha bhukti nimittam durbhikṣe labdhāyām jñātibhiḥ

original: Vin_2.2208 / ratnapratyākhyānam idaṃ tulyatvam anyaśramaṇānāṃ tatra brahmacaryacariṣyatva(ṃ)
analyzed: ratna pratyākhyānam idam tulya tvam anya śramaṇānām tatra brahmacarya cariṣya tvam
kalaha bhaṇḍana vigraha vivādāt bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sārddham vicāraṇe
saṃgha bheda ādeḥ catuṣṭayā bhikṣuṇī gatāt

original: Vin_2.2222 / pratyarddhamāsam ārye hany anadhiṣṭhito vādhiṣṭhānikasya /
analyzed: pratyarddha māsam ārye hani anadhiṣṭhitaḥ vā ādhiṣṭhānikasya
anāpattiḥ cauram uṣitaka bhikṣuṇī artha tāyām
anya artham labdhasya cīvarasya āmiṣīkṛtya abhyavaharaṇa artham adhiṣṭhāne
cīvara śayana āsana varṣaka artham ca

original: Vin_2.2231 / bhikṣuṇī mahājanārthaṃ samādāpya svatra pariṇamanam* /
analyzed: bhikṣuṇī mahājana artham samādāpya svatra pariṇamanam
vacana svīkāra artham baddhasya arthasya mocane
pala śatika ādi viṃśati kārṣāpaṇa ādi mūlyasya vāsasaḥ su ākāreḥ
na sa śayyā āyāma mahataḥ putrasya varjya tvam
dadyuḥ parṣad anala parṣad upasthāpana saṃvṛtī
pūrṇa tāyām dvādaśa tvasya upasaṃpad varṣāṇām
upasaṃpādane dvādaśa varṣa tvāt arvāk pariṇītāyāḥ

original: Vin_2.2260 / sa cen me cīvaraṃ dadāsi tataḥ svopasaṃpādayāmīty upasaṃpatprekṣayā vacane /
analyzed: sa ced me cīvaram dadāsi tatas sva upasaṃpādayāmi iti upasaṃpad prekṣayā vacane
pravrājana ānukūlya saṃdarśanena saṃkṣepya gṛha vistaram a pravrājane
svayam sevye jatu loṭhakasya antarā dhāraṇe
na carma paṭtena pārśva bandhanam kurvīta
iti anaṅga sevā vidhi vyābādha vṛttam
ūna āpattiḥ sa dvitīya tāyām asya
gṛha svāminam an avalokya antargṛhe rātri atinamane

original: Vin_2.2309 / anāpattir anayā sārddham anekayāpi kṛtāvaraṇatāyāṃ vṛśyādinopasthitasmṛtir anāsvādane 'ṅgasaṃsparśasyācalamañ ce prākṛte saṃstare  #
analyzed: anāpattiḥ anayā sārddham anekayā api kṛta āvaraṇa tāyām vṛśya ādinā upasthita smṛtiḥ anāsvādane prākṛte saṃstare
kāraṇe bhikṣuṇyā sva aṅga udvartanasya śikṣamāṇayā
phaṇa kūrva tri ākhya pratiśīrṣakāṇām ca
yatra tatra tad abhiprāyeṇa svara vikāre
anāpattiḥ varṣake śayana āsana gupti artham

original: Vin_2.2330 / paribhujya dharmaśravaṇadānāvasthāyāgā[36b4]rikaśayanāsanam utsṛjyān avalokya gṛhiṇe prakramaṇe /
Vin_2.2333 / anāpatti[ḥ] loṭhakāṣṭhañ ca kasyārthe pratigupte pradeśe /
analyzed: anāpattiḥ loṭha kāṣṭham ca kasya arthe pratigupte pradeśe

original: Vin_2.2340 / anāpattiḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya ācāryasabrahmacāriṇām arthe pratigupte pradeśe /
analyzed: anāpattiḥ bhikṣu saṃghasya ācārya sabrahmacāriṇām arthe pratigupte pradeśe

original: Vin_2.2345 / k[ā]lānukālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
analyzed: kāla anukālam asya śocanam rañjanam ca
dāne śramaṇa cīvarasya agārikāyāḥ avaguṃṭhana artham
kula āvāsa lābha dharma mātsaryānām ca

original: Vin_2.2366 / na bhikṣoḥ purastād gocare caret /

analyzed: na asthira saṃkrameṇa bhikṣuṇā sārddham gacchet

original: Vin_2.2369 / niṣāda enāṃ sthitātināmane niṣaṇṇo nimuñcīta /

analyzed: akaraṇe valokya niṣaṇṇa tve sya bhajeta
anvarddha māsam a pratyanubhavane bhikṣubhyaḥ vavāda anuśāsanyāḥ
kaṭhina uddhāra artham adāpane prasrabdhau sāmagryāḥ
na gṛha vastu āpaṇa vastu vā
varṣa uṣita tvāt a caraṇe syāḥ

original: Vin_2.2390 / devakulādau tīrthyāśraye gatvā vādasya karaṇe /
analyzed: devakula ādau tīrthya āśraye gatvā vādasya karaṇe

original: Vin_2.2392 / dattvāsanaṃ prati sammodya pṛṣṭāgamābhiyogam avakāśaṃ kārayet /
analyzed: dattvā āsanam prati sammodya pṛṣṭa āgama abhiyogam avakāśam kārayet

original: Vin_2.2395 / anāpattiḥ glānye sphuṭatve ca nīlatṛṇaiḥ sarvasya /
analyzed: anāpattiḥ glānye sphuṭa tve ca nīlatṛṇaiḥ sarvasya
payasaḥ para kulataḥ vijñaptasya ātma artham abhyavahṛtau

original: / taddhinavanītaḥ sarpis tailaṃ madhuthāni tamāṃ samatsyavallūrāṇāñ ca /
analyzed: tat hi navanītaḥ sarpiḥ tailam madhuthāni tamām sa matsya vallūrāṇām ca
na atas nya labdhau nya vijñapane hrāsaḥ
an upasampatka pravrajitasya ca samāna atikrame

original: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsañ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
analyzed: dhāraṇam vipravāsam ca sparśam agneḥ nivārite

original: bhojanaṃ vījāghātañ ca deśe ca harite śuceḥ //
analyzed: bhojanam vīja āghātam ca deśe ca harite śuceḥ

original: utsargaṃ vṛkṣarohañc a śaikṣā uddeśayos saha /
analyzed: utsargam vṛkṣa rohan a śaikṣāḥ uddeśayoḥ saha
bhūmi praroha ghātābhyām ṛd sṛjya antam ca putra gam
anāśa āyata kāntārikā gatām tālikām ālaṃbya
prajñapanam khala mānakasya ādigdhyai pāṃsunā pādayoḥ

original: Vin_2.2413 / tadvṛttam utthāyaiva sekasanmā[38a2]rgasukumārī gomayākārṣīṃ prahāṇam /
analyzed: tad vṛttam utthāya eva gomaya akārṣīm prahāṇam
saṃgha sannipāta artham tisraḥ ghumāḥ tāvantaḥ prahārāḥ
karma dāna artham ca dhumātu ekā

original: Vin_2.2421 / tisraḥ parivṛttayor dvau prahāram ity aparam /
analyzed: tisraḥ parivṛttayoḥ dvau prahāram iti aparam
eka parivartaḥ prahāraḥ ca iti aparam

original: Vin_2.2429 / asaṃpattau gaṇḍīdānena saṃbodhanasya mahāsannipāte yamalaśaṃkhayor āpūrṇam /
analyzed: a saṃpattau gaṇḍī dānena saṃbodhanasya mahā sannipāte yamala śaṃkhayoḥ āpūrṇam

original: Vin_2.2433 / saṃbhāvini kāryasya kāle 'vaśiṣṭe yathāsukhaṃ karaṇaṃ dattatridaṇḍake /
analyzed: saṃbhāvini kāryasya kāle yathāsukham karaṇam datta tridaṇḍake
tad rūpaḥ ced pratyayaḥ kṛta kopana apāvaraṇī vyapadeśaḥ
iti poṣadha vastuni śamatha poṣadha gatam
śaila kuḍya stambha vṛkṣa prākāra prāgbhāra atimārga udapāna ādau pratidiśam saṃlakṣya

original: tatjñaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ parikīrttite sannidhau saṃghasya sthāvare cihne karmaṇaḥ [38a6] karaṇam /
analyzed: tatjñaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ parikīrttite sannidhau saṃghasya sthāvare cihne karmaṇaḥ karaṇam
na aprasrabdhe pūrve bandha antarasya rūḍhiḥ

original: Vin_2.2452 / yujyate dvayoḥ sīmnor ekena vacasā bandho mokṣo vā /
analyzed: yujyate dvayoḥ sīmnoḥ ekena vacasā bandhaḥ mokṣaḥ vā
kuḍyam karmaṇi abaddha sīmni āvāse sīmā
yatra vāśiva vahanī paribhraṣṭa udaka pātaḥ
kalpikam śikṣā dattakāt tad grahaṇam upasthāpita tad bhikṣu saṃjñasya
bhavati saṃvṛtaiḥ unmattakena api agra tvam
na gaṇa śata chanda ādi saṃgatyā karma karaṇam anyāyyam
na tulya prakramāṇām vacanīyānām a viyutya vacanam

original: Vin_2.2470 / yathākathaṃcid etad dānānām aśaktau saṃpādanam /
analyzed: yathā kathaṃcid etat dānānām aśaktau saṃpādanam

original: Vin_2.2472 / kathaṃcid apy aśaktau saṃghasya vā tatra gamanaṃ [38b3] tasya vā mañcenānayanam /
analyzed: kathaṃcid api aśaktau saṃghasya vā tatra gamanam tasya vā mañcena ānayanam
na antaritya anyat niḥśrayaṇī padakam ākrāmet
vaitarika tvena āsyanayoḥ garha tvam bhikṣoḥ ārocayet
asaṃprāptasya saṃgha madhyam kālakriyā māgārika ādi tva pratijñā tvena ānīta tvam

original: Vin_2.2489 / pareṇa pañcadaśyāṃ gṛhītatve bhikṣor muñcainaṃ bhikṣuṃ sabrahmacāryeṣasmākam iti brūyuḥ /
analyzed: pareṇa pañcadaśyām gṛhīta tve bhikṣoḥ muñca enam bhikṣum sabrahmacārī īṣā asmākam iti brūyuḥ

original: Vin_2.2490 / amuktāvasty asmākam anena sārddhaṃ kiñcid eva karaṇīya[38b5]m iti sādyaṃ /
analyzed: amuktau asti asmākam anena sārddham kiñcid eva iti sādyam

original: Vin_2.2492 / norddham asya mokṣāya na vyāyaccheyuḥ /
analyzed: na ūrddham asya mokṣāya na vyāyaccheyuḥ

original: Vin_2.2494 / pṛthagbhāvarucim abhinirūpya karmaṇaḥ kṛtau sthūlātyayaḥ /
Vin_2.2495 / na vicikitsitaṃ niścitaṃ vā kalpamānatve 'nutthiter doṣasya kartṛ /
analyzed: na vicikitsitam niścitam vā kalpamāna tve n utthiteḥ doṣasya kartṛ

original: Vin_2.2496 / kartṛśuddheḥ paryṣitaṃ bhāvato na kalpataḥ /
Vin_2.2498 / poṣadhaṃ kurvīran pañcadaśyām anvarddhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśena /
analyzed: poṣadham kurvīran pañcadaśyām anvarddha māsam prātimokṣa sūtra uddeśena
na pravāraṇe sya a saṃpanna tvam

original: Vin_2.2501 / bhāṣaṇenaiva nidānoddeśasyoccāraṇena saṃpādanīyatvaṃ jñapteś ca /

analyzed: an eka tvāt ekatra vasuni prajñapteḥ
sarvatra muktau anantya tve saṃgha avaśeṣaḥ
na aneka kṛyā phalena āpatti vyavadhānam

original: Vin_2.2543 / yogyatvaṃ sarvāṅgeṣu grahaṇagamane sevāyāṃ pratibalatvaṃ /

analyzed: anṛddhi dharmaka tvam a sparśane ṅge
anyava tvam nakha danta nirmāṃsa asthi romṇām

original: Vin_2.2554 / ardhatvam vāhyake pravrājite gṛhītvasyārūḍhidhvastayoś ca /
analyzed: ardha tvam vāhyake pravrājite gṛhītvasya ārūḍhi dhvastayoḥ ca
sa upasaṃpatkam adhvastam bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī tvam
dvāra kapāṭa śabda akaraṇa ākarṣaṇa upāyān ca

original: Vin_2.2575 / vātāyanañ ca vi tṛtīye ūrdham bahissamvṛtam antarviśālaṃ sādhu /
analyzed: vātāyanam ca vi tṛtīye ūrdham bahis samvṛtam antar viśālam sādhu
karaṇam maṇḍapasya uparyamāne pura antarasyāḥ vā
kīlanam lohakaṇṭakaiḥ a kampana artham asyāḥ

original: Vin_2.2581 / bahirvā ca prahāṇamaṇḍapasya layanapaṅkter vā /
analyzed: bahis vā ca prahāṇa maṇḍapasya layana paṅkteḥ vā
catur hastā sau samanta parikṣepeṇa sādhvī

original: Vin_2.2589 / mauñjaṃ sāṇaṃ vālvajaṃ paṭṭikā vetravaibhaṅgukam iti /
analyzed: mauñjam sāṇam vālvajam paṭṭikā vetra vaibhaṅgukam iti
arka kāśeraka būka śalmalīnām tūlam pūraṇam

original: Vin_2.2593 / ūrṇā śaṇaḥ karpyāso natukāni patravaibhaṅgukañ ca /
analyzed: ūrṇā śaṇaḥ karpyāsaḥ natukāni patra vaibhaṅgukam ca

original: Vin_2.2594 / kākapadakānā[39b5]m antaro ntare yathārtham avasthāpanāya dānam /
Vin_2.2598 / sanaiḥ aduḥkhanārthamāḍhakaṃ chitter veṣṭitāyāś ca natukaiḥ /

analyzed: kaṇḍusaka kṣepaḥ sūtrakena vadhvasya punar āntyaiḥ
sanniṣaṇṇa tāyām smṛti vimatyoḥ anantare dhiṣṭheta

original: Vin_2.2609 / svaṃ cedekamatadvantaṃ pañcadaśāṃ manyeta [prema]sapremakaprāguṇye prayatet* /
analyzed: svam ced ekam a tadvantam pañcadaśām manyeta prema sa premaka prāguṇye prayatet

original: Vin_2.2610 / ya āyusman idaṃ cedañ ca karoti kiṃ* tasya bhavati sāpattiko natvāyusmatedaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ āyusman idam ca idam ca karoti kim tasya bhavati sāpattikaḥ

original: cedaṃ ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam evaṃ [40a2] saty āyusmān* sāpattiko nāham āyusmann eko pi tu
analyzed: ca idam ca kṛtam kṛtam evam sati āyusmān sāpattikaḥ na aham āyusman ekaḥ tu

original: sarvasaṃgho nenārthenāṅgatāvattvam āyusmān svām āpattiṃ* yathādharmaṃ pratikuru kin
analyzed: sarva saṃghaḥ nena arthena aṅgatāvat tvam āyusmān svām āpattim yathādharmam pratikuru kin

original: te kariṣyati sarvasaṃgha iti prakrameṇa darśanapathe śiṣṭānām icchāyāṃ deśayet* /
analyzed: te kariṣyati sarva saṃghaḥ iti prakrameṇa darśana pathe śiṣṭānām icchāyām deśayet

original: Vin_2.2612 / sarve cet* pañcadaśyām āpattim* pratīyur vimatim vā svapratikriyārtham āvāsāntare kañcit prasthāpayeyuḥ pratigṛhī[40a3]tṛsaṃvatyartham
analyzed: sarve ced pañcadaśyām āpattim pratīyuḥ vimatim vā sva pratikriyā artham āvāsa antare kañcid prasthāpayeyuḥ

original: Vin_2.2614 / catuṣkato rvāgbhāve vihārakaraṇīyaṃ sthitam eva /
analyzed: catuṣkataḥ rvāc bhāve vihāra karaṇīyam sthitam eva
seka saṃmārga sukumārī gomaya kārṣā pradāna siṃhāsana āsana prajñapana pradīpa dharma śravaṇa dāneṣu kriteṣu uccatarake pradeśe sthitvā caturdiśam

original: Vin_2.2617 / darśana bhikṣuṇām aṅga tāvad āyusmanta[40a4]s tvaritatvaritam āgacchatām āryasaṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pravaraṇā vā pāñcadaśika iti vacanaṃ
analyzed: darśana bhikṣuṇām aṅga tāvat tvarita tvaritam āgacchatām ārya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pravaraṇāḥ vā pāñcadaśikaḥ iti vacanam

original: Vin_2.2624 / nāsatprātimokṣasūtroddeśake tadāsthāne jñātvā poṣadham āgamayet* /
analyzed: na asat prātimokṣa sūtra uddeśake tad āsthāne jñātvā poṣadham āgamayet
vastu karma lābha upasthāyaka parihāreṇa uddeśakam parīccheyuḥ
āgacchantam sūtradharam pratyudgaccheyuḥ chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ

original: Vin_2.2633 / trikam ardhayojanaṃ krośam ardhakro[40a6]śaṃ pariṣaṇḍām vā /
analyzed: trikam ardha yojanam krośam pariṣaṇḍām vā

original: Vin_2.2639 / śāstṛdharatvam eṣāṃ bhikṣum īrṣyantaṃ bodhayeyuḥ /
analyzed: śāstṛ dhara tvam eṣām bhikṣum īrṣyantam bodhayeyuḥ

original: Vin_2.2640 / nākṛtapoṣadhaḥ pravāraṇas taddine prajñāyamānasv ata(da)
analyzed: na akṛta poṣadhaḥ pravāraṇaḥ tad dine prajñāyamānasu atada

original: ḥ sthānāt prakrāmen na cet tadaiva tadvadhe prāptiḥ kalikṛtbhyo vimuktir anuprāptiḥ [40b1] sat*vṛttānā tat parāyanatvam vā /
analyzed: sthānāt prakrāmet na ced tadā eva tad vadhe prāptiḥ kali kṛtbhyaḥ vimuktiḥ anuprāptiḥ tat parāyana tvam vā
na kali kṛt bhikṣukam sadvṛtta bhikṣukāt gaccheta

original: Vin_2.2642 / nābhikṣukaṃ sabhikṣukād asahitaḥ śiṣṭair anyatrāpadaḥ kāyacittaprasrabdhivaśatā ta vā /
analyzed: na abhikṣukam sa bhikṣukāt asahitaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ anyatra āpadaḥ kāya citta prasrabdhi vaśa tā vā
na akṛt poṣadha pravāraṇam krāntau niḥśritam avasṛjeta

original: Vin_2.2644 / tat*rūpatāyāṃ pratyayasya sadvṛttoddeśavantam upadiśya vāsaṃ tatrāvatāre niyuñjīt* /
analyzed: tatrūpa tāyām pratyayasya sat vṛtta uddeśavantam upadiśya vāsam tatra avatāre niyuñjīt

original: Vin_2.2646 / kalpatāpaścād āgatānām arthe punaḥ karaṇam anayoḥ /
analyzed: kalpatā paścāt āgatānām arthe punar karaṇam anayoḥ

original: Vin_2.2647 / kāmo tra pravṛtto samyaktā cet* /

analyzed: antargateḥ caṃkramyeta indriyaiḥ abahirgatena mānsasena avilambitam

original: Vin_2.2673 / yaḥ kaści[t*] [40b5] nānādhīṣṭho na cet tanmukhikayā nirgatiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid na anādhīṣṭhaḥ na ced tad mukhikayā nirgatiḥ

original: Vin_2.2682 / āstaram atra dadyāt* vālukācchayikā vā /

analyzed: na etat a karaṇe glānasya doṣaḥ

original: Vin_2.2687 / nādhyeṣyamāṇo sya bhāṣaṇārthaṃ na pratīccheta /
analyzed: na adhyeṣyamāṇaḥ sya bhāṣaṇa artham na pratīccheta
kṣiriṇī ākāreṇa vā dharma śravaṇa saṃgatim prajñapayet prakṣīriṇyām

original: Vin_2.2696 / muhūrttaṃ sthaviro gregataṃ tūṣṇīm āga yyātra dharmaṃ bhāṣetānyam vādhīcched vada bhikṣo dharmaṃ
analyzed: muhūrttam sthaviraḥ gregatam tūṣṇīm āga yyā atra dharmam bhāṣeta anyam vā adhīcchet vada bhikṣo dharmam

original: Vin_2.2697 / bhāṣamāṇam avadhārya dharmaś ced utsāhayet* /
Vin_2.2699 / gṛhiṇām a[41a2]trāgatānāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt* /
Vin_2.2700 / tīrthyañ ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ sunigṛhītam adarśayat kopam ananusūyam* /
analyzed: tīrthyam ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānam su nigṛhītam adarśayat kopam ananusūyam

original: Vin_2.2701 / na parṣadam ādāya deśako gacchet* /

analyzed: divasasya gaṇanam saṃgha sthavireṇa sūtra prota vaṃśa śalākā saṃcāraṇena

original: Vin_2.2720 / vihārasvāmidevatārthañ ca gāthābhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ niyogasya vacanaṃ /
analyzed: vihāra svāmi devatā artham ca gāthā bhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇām niyogasya vacanam

original: Vin_2.2722 / adya śuklapakṣasya pratipad vihārasvāmino vihāradevatānāṃ cārthāya gāthāṃ bhā<<ṣa>>dhvam iti /
analyzed: adya śukla pakṣasya pratipad vihāra svāminaḥ vihāra devatānām ca arthāya gāthām bhāṣadhvam iti

original: Vin_2.2724 / evaṃ nāma dānapati śvo bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktenopanimantrayate taṃ bhadanta kalyā[41a5]ṇaiḥ manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti /
analyzed: evam nāma dānapati śvas bhikṣu saṃgham bhaktena upanimantrayate tam bhadanta manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti
ūna rātra pādanam ardha māsa avaśeṣa tāyām ṛtoḥ

original: Vin_2.2728 / nāvicāryānāgamyya poṣadhaṃ śūnyo yam ita sīmānaṃ badhnīyuḥ /
analyzed: na a vicārya an āgamya poṣadham śūnyaḥ yam ita sīmānam badhnīyuḥ
anaṅgam arūḍhaḥ jñāta tā baddha tvasya

original: Vin_2.2732 / na kalpate sīmnā sīmnaḥ parikṣepaḥ /

analyzed: kalpate maṇḍalaka bhikṣuṇī varṣakayoḥ daka āvarte ca
vyavatiṣṭhate sīmnyā catuṣṭayāt eka vṛkṣe na ekā maryādā

original: Vin_2.2741 / anuvṛddhir asya dhvasto punaḥ kṛto /

analyzed: sapta rātrāt a viccheda bhūtam nabhaḥ

original: Vin_2.2744 satvenaivātra na vyavahāraḥ kutaḥ saṃvardhatayā /
analyzed: satvena eva atra na vyavahāraḥ kutas saṃvardhatayā

original: Vin_2.2745 / nordhaṃ madhyato rdhatṛtīyayojanāntāt sīmno bandhasya rūḍhiḥ /
analyzed: na ūrdham madhyataḥ ṛdha tṛtīya yojana antāt sīmnaḥ bandhasya rūḍhiḥ
a vipravāsa saṃvṛteḥ a baddha sīma tāyām bhūmeḥ
stūpa gaha aṅgaṇa poṣadhā mukheṣu api poṣadhe saṃmṛjyatā

original: Vin_2.2752 / yasya kasyacid atas tadārocakatvena bhavanīyatvaṃ /
Vin_2.2753 / nainaṃ bahiḥsīmastho dadīta dāpayeta vā /
analyzed: na enam bahis sīma sthaḥ dadīta dāpayeta vā

original: Vin_2.2757 / nirdoṣaṃ bahiḥsīmnā nayā bhītyā nayanam* /
Vin_2.2758 / bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇanam upadhivārikeṇa poṣadhe śalākācāraṇe /
analyzed: bhikṣūṇām gaṇanam upadhivārikeṇa poṣadhe śalākā cāraṇe
supravṛttasya ardhva pade pyas khal antāyām uddeśaḥ

original: Vin_2.2769 / anayas sapratyapāyatāyāṃ prāsādikasthānalobhenāsamīpe grāmasya yodhvakaraṇam* /
analyzed: anayaḥ sa pratyapāya tāyām prāsādika sthāna lobhena asamīpe grāmasya

original: Vin_2.2770 / karaṇam anavasthāne sārthe sya gacchatbhiḥ /
Vin_2.2773 / [41b5] niravadyaṃ srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭisaṃbhāvanāyām ācārānuśrāvaṇam* /
analyzed: niravadyam srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭi saṃbhāvanāyām ācāra anuśrāvaṇam
uddeśya tad iyanta kāla uddeṣṭṝṇām tatva an upagṛhītiḥ atra adharmaḥ

original: Vin_3.6 / vihāraṃ kelāyeyuḥ daśāhārdhamāsena bhaviṣyat tāyāṃ /
analyzed: vihāram kelāyeyuḥ daśa aha ardha māsena

original: Vin_3.8 / pūrve hni śayanāsanasya pāta m* /
Vin_3.11 / so ktagandhaiś cāṅgerīpaṭalakagate śukle vāsasy upanikṣiptāḥ śalākā vṛddhānte
analyzed: sā u kta gandhaiḥ cāṅgerī paṭalaka gate śukle vāsasi upanikṣiptāḥ śalākāḥ vṛddha ante

original: niveśyā yañ cāyaṃ cāsminn āvāse kriyākāro yo yusmākam utsahate tena kriyākāreṇāsminn
analyzed: niveśyāḥ yam ca ayam ca asmin āvāse kriyākāraḥ yaḥ utsahate tena kriyākāreṇa asmin

original: āvāse varṣāvastuṃ sa śalākāṃ grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antarvarṣe saṃghamadhye raṇam
analyzed: āvāse varṣā vastum sa śalākām grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antar varṣe saṃgha madhye raṇam

original: utpā[42a2]dayitavyo yo vaḥ kasyacit kiñcij jānāti sa idānīṃ* vadanta yo ntarvarṣe
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ kasyacid kiñcid jānāti saḥ idānīm vadanta yaḥ ntar varṣe

original: saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati tasya saṃgha uttara upaparīkṣitavyaṃ matsyata iti bhikṣūn vedayeta /
analyzed: saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati tasya saṃghaḥ uttaraḥ upaparīkṣitavyam matsyataḥ iti bhikṣūn vedayeta

original: Vin_3.12 / grahaṇopaśamanaṃ prati saṃghaṃ jñapayed anyaḥ /
analyzed: grahaṇa upaśamanam prati saṃgham jñapayet anyaḥ

original: Vin_3.16 / naivāsikānā[42a3]m asy etad ante śanaiḥ sthāpanama /
Vin_3.17 / gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhir bhikṣubhir asminn āvāse śalākā gṛhīteti /
analyzed: gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ asmin āvāse śalākā gṛhītā iti

original: Vin_3.18 / anta tasya tattāḍakakuñjikena purataḥ sthitvā rocanopakramaṃ
analyzed: tasya tad tāḍaka kuñjikena puratas sthitvā rocana upakramam

original: sthavirāmuko vihāraḥ salābhaḥ sacīvariko gṛhāṇeti yathāguṇam* /
analyzed: sthavira āmukaḥ vihāraḥ sa lābhaḥ sa cīvarikaḥ gṛhāṇa iti yathāguṇam

original: Vin_3.19 / jñātvoddeśam astūpasaṃghārthe gatasya gantryā bhāgitvaṃ [42a4] vṛkṣamūlaharitasārdhalasthaṇḍileṣv api yathāvṛddhikoddeśaḥ /
analyzed: jñātvā uddeśam astu upasaṃgha arthe gatasya gantryāḥ bhāgi tvam vṛkṣa mūla harita sārdhala sthaṇḍileṣu api yathā vṛddhika uddeśaḥ

original: Vin_3.20 / dvādibhyo <<'>>saṃbhāvane layanasyāntato niṣyadanaprāmāṇye sya bhūmeḥ /
analyzed: dvi ādibhyaḥ saṃbhāvane layanasya antatas niṣyadana prāmāṇye sya bhūmeḥ
pātra kara koṣa āṭuka danta koṣṭha sthānasya apekṣaṇam
dvāra koṣṭhaka sopāna koṣṭhikā prāsāda upasthāna bhakta jentāka śālāḥ na uddiśeyuḥ

original: Vin_3.25 / [42a5] naitat tv āprāptyabhāve na dadīran* /
analyzed: na etat tu ā prāpti abhāve na dadīran

original: Vin_3.26 / nainam upasthāyakam vāsya karma kārayeran /
analyzed: na enam upasthāyakam vā asya karma kārayeran

original: Vin_3.27 / na kuṣṭhī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhuñjīta /
analyzed: na kuṣṭhī sāṃghikam śayana āsanam paribhuñjīta

original: Vin_3.29 / na sasave py atra sāṃghike tiṣṭhed āprāsādapuṣkiriṇīdvārakoṣṭhakapariṣaṇḍacaṃkramasthānavṛkṣāt* /
analyzed: na sa save pi atra sāṃghike tiṣṭhet ā prāsāda puṣkiriṇī dvāra koṣṭhaka pariṣaṇḍa caṃkrama sthāna vṛkṣāt

original: Vin_3.32 / [42a6] pātracīvarasthāpanārtham āraṇyakebhyaḥ sarvadā layanam uddiśeyuḥ /
Vin_3.33 / varṣopagamane syuḥ kecid āgantava iti vastu śayanāsanañ ca sthāpayeyuḥ /
analyzed: varṣa upagamane syuḥ kecid āgantavaḥ iti vastu śayana āsanam ca sthāpayeyuḥ
na eka ahasya arthe śayana āsanam gṛhṇīt

original: Vin_3.40 / pūrvāhṇe kvacit pāṭhasvādhyāyāvasthānacaṃkramāṇāṃ kvacid madhyāhne paratrānyatra cīvarasthāpanam āvāso paratra rātrāv ity asya yogaḥ
analyzed: pūrvāhṇe kvacid pāṭha svādhyāya avasthāna caṃkramāṇām kvacid madhyāhne paratra anyatra cīvara sthāpanam paratra rātrau iti asya yogaḥ
khaṇḍa phullam upagataḥ vāsa vastunaḥ pratisaṃskurvīta
tat yathā sāmantakasya api vihāra parigaṇayoḥ

original: Vin_3.48 / nordhvam enāṃ prakrāntatvād eṣām anuvarttayeran* /
analyzed: na ūrdhvam enām prakrānta tvāt eṣām anuvartayeran
na prakṛti stha arthe ghaṭṭam kurvīran

original: Vin_3.51 / ayam amutrartāv ahaurātre tadavayave vā bhaviṣyaty ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya
analyzed: ayam amutra ṛtau ahaurātre tad avayave vā bhaviṣyati ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya

original: bhaviṣyaty ayam upādhyāyasya sā[42b3]rdham vihāriṇo yam ayam antevāsina ālaptakāder
analyzed: bhaviṣyati ayam upādhyāyasya vihāriṇaḥ yam ayam antevāsinaḥ ālaptaka ādeḥ

original: Vin_3.56 / satve nekasya vṛddhapīṭhānām apy uddeśatvaṃ /
analyzed: sattve na ekasya vṛddha pīṭhānām api uddeśa tvam

original: Vin_3.58 / na sāṃghikam ava[42b4]naddhaṃ nāśanadharmaṇe śucinā śrāmaṇerāya śayanāsanaṃ kaścid dadyāt* /
analyzed: na sāṃghikam na aśana dharmaṇe śucinā śrāmaṇerāya śayana āsanam kaścid dadyāt

original: Vin_3.60 / dānam asyai vihārasyātra vāsasampattau paryante /
analyzed: dānam asyai vihārasya atra vāsa sampattau paryante
śayana āsanasya ca śiṣṭasya a praṇītasya

original: Vin_3.62 / na vaṣ kenacit sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam vinā pratyāstaraṇena paribhoktavyaṃ na kalpapratyāstaraṇena na malapratyāstaraṇeneti vedayeta
analyzed: na kenacid sāṃghikam śayanāsanam vinā pratyāstaraṇena paribhoktavyam na kalpa pratyāstaraṇena na mala pratyāstaraṇena iti vedayeta

original: Vin_3.64 / [42b5] samayam utkramya paribhuktāvāchindyād ārocya niḥśraye niḥśritasyānyasya saṃghe /
analyzed: samayam utkramya paribhuktau āchindyāt ārocya niḥśraye niḥśritasya anyasya saṃghe

original: Vin_3.65 / amukena dānapatināmukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇāmukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃgho varṣā upagamiṣyatīty ārocayet* /
analyzed: amukena dānapatinā amukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇa amukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃghaḥ varṣāḥ upagamiṣyati iti ārocayet
anunmādi tva prativinodi tvayoḥ kaukṛtyasya anyasya ca duḥkha daurmanasyasya
sukha saumanasyasya ca ūti ādi tva anurakṣi tvayoḥ
glāna upasthāyaka tvasya ca sabrahmacāriṣu bhūteḥ
pratyāśaṃsanena āvāsam gocaram ca piṇḍaka bhaiṣajya dātroḥ

original: Vin_3.69 / na yasminn abhikṣukatvam akapāṭakatvañ ca sahitam* /
analyzed: na yasmin a bhikṣuka tvam a kapāṭaka tvam ca sahitam
na vahis sīmni aruṇā udgamayet anadhiṣṭhitam
tat yathā nāma niryātana vihāra pratiṣṭhāpana śayana āsana dāna dhruva bhikṣā prajñapana caitya pratiṣṭhāpa yaṣṭi dhvaja āropaṇa pūjā karaṇa āla candana kuṅkuma seka
dāna pāṭhaka ukṛtya prativinodana dṛṣṭi gata pratinisarga pakṣa saṃpatti avasāraṇa parivāsa ādi catuṣka dāna āvarttana glāna praśvasaneṣu bhikṣoḥ
śiras veṣṭana rajaḥ haraṇa sīmantonnayana jaṭā apaharaṇa kuṇḍala bandhaneṣu gṛhi gṛhiṇyoḥ
saṃgha avaśeṣa gatam an upasaṃpannānām pūrvam

original: Vin_3.83 / laṅghayed etad bhaktabhaiṣajyopasthāyakābhāve śaktau tair vinā yāpayitum* /
analyzed: laṅghayet etat bhakta bhaiṣajya upasthāyaka abhāve śaktau taiḥ vinā yāpayitum

original: Vin_3.85 / anu lomikacittotpādanapāpikavāgniścāraṇayoḥ bhedāya parākramamāṇe saṃghasya /
Vin_3.86 / naitac chāntyai sasambhāvano na gacchet* /
analyzed: na etat śāntyai sa sambhāvanaḥ na gacchet

original: Vin_3.88 / na prati<<śūtā>> varṣāvāse [43a4] nāvāsasya sambandhanam* /
analyzed: na pratiśūtā varṣā vāse na āvāsasya sambandhanam

original: Vin_3.89 / na kurvīt* nāsty asyaikapoṣadhatāyām āvāsayor utthānam* /
analyzed: na kurvīt na asti asya eka poṣadha tāyām āvāsayoḥ utthānam
na anutpādita ādau piṭaka dhara kāli kṛt sa tvayoḥ a saṃśrita tvam
uṣita tvam an upagatasya sthāna amokṣe

original: Vin_3.101 / na nāvyutsṛjya prāptapṛthivīm upanibaddhām vā bhūmisthe sthire saṃjanato ntarāpayāyitvam* /
analyzed: na na a vyutsṛjya prāpta pṛthivīm upanibaddhām vā bhūmi sthe sthire saṃjanataḥ ntara apayāyi tvam

original: Vin_3.102 / dhvansas tad dṛśam abhiniḥsṛtyādharmapakṣasaṃkrāntāv aruṇodgatau [43a6] na saṃdigdhatāyām* /
analyzed: dhvansaḥ tat dṛśam abhiniḥsṛtya adharma pakṣa saṃkrāntau aruṇa udgatau na saṃdigdha tāyām
na antye dhiṣṭhānasya ṣaṣ ahe rūḍhiḥ
na atas ūrddham bahi vastavya tā

original: Vin_3.113 / anāśaṃkyam anākṣiptatvaṃ tīrthyasya dṛṣṭer vivecanārthaṃ jñāteḥ karaṇīyenāgamādhigamayor ātmanaḥ kāṃkṣāvinodanārthaṃ gamanāyaitatkṛteḥ
analyzed: anāśaṃkyam an ākṣipta tvam tīrthyasya dṛṣṭeḥ vivecana artham jñāteḥ karaṇīyena āgama adhigamayoḥ ātmanaḥ kāṃkṣā vinodana artham gamanāya etad kṛteḥ
anu kṣaipya tvam upagata tā sthasya

original: Vin_4.2 / śuddhi[43b2]m uktyor anena pratyavagatau sthūlātyayaḥ /

analyzed: dṛṣṭa sruta pariśaṅkābhiḥ varṣa uṣitaḥ saṃghaiḥ pravārayet

original: Vin_4.6 / yataḥ prabhṛti kelāyanam iyatbhiḥ divasaiḥ saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhaviṣyati yuṣmākam ārocitam bhavatv iti /
analyzed: yatas prabhṛti kelāyanam iyatbhiḥ divasaiḥ saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhaviṣyati yuṣmākam ārocitam bhavatu iti

original: Vin_4.9 / rāhānāṃ ci[43b3]traṇaṃ stūpānāṃ moccanamolanaṃ ca /
Vin_4.11 / adya sarvarātrikaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sāmagrī deyeti gocarārocya sūtravinayamātrakadharair adhiṣṭacaturdaśyāṃ  #
analyzed: adya sarva rātrikam dharma śravaṇam bhaviṣyati tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sāmagrī deyā iti gocara ārocya sūtra vinaya mātraka dharaiḥ adhiṣṭa caturdaśyām

original: Vin_4.12 / parasyāntaiḥ prākkarmato dhamyayā viniścayakathayā rātrer atināmanam* /
analyzed: parasya antaiḥ prāk karmataḥ dhamyayā viniścaya kathayā rātreḥ atināmanam

original: Vin_4.25 / sarvasaṃghena prativārite etat tvasya saṃghe nivedanam* /
analyzed: sarva saṃghena prativārite etat tu asya saṃghe nivedanam

original: / svakyena vastunā vastapravāraṇam ārabheta vacanato gṛhītvā ḥ [43b6] saṃghena labhyaṃ bhadantā evaṃ rūpeṇāpi vastunā varṣoṣitam
analyzed: svakyena vastunā ārabheta vacanataḥ gṛhītvā saṃghena labhyam bhadantāḥ evam rūpeṇa api vastunā varṣa uṣitam

original: Vin_4.32 / aśakyatāyām avasthātuṃ bhāgaprāptaṃ bhikṣum avalokayet
analyzed: aśakya tāyām avasthātum bhāga prāptam bhikṣum avalokayet

original: / na haiva vayam āyusmann ity arthaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipattitāḥ kaccid āyusman* vastu
analyzed: na ha eva vayam āyusman iti artham sanniṣaṇṇāḥ kaccit āyusman vastu

original: sthāpayen na putgalam ity api tu śīlaviśuddhyarthaṃ poṣadha ukto bhagavatā dharmathiśuddhyarthaṃ
analyzed: sthāpayet na putgalam iti api tu śīla viśuddhi artham poṣadhaḥ uktaḥ bhagavatā

original: Vin_4.37 / putgagalaṃ sthāpayen na na vastv iti vastu sthāpayet* putgalañ ceti
analyzed: sthāpayet na na vastu iti vastu sthāpayet putgalam ca iti

original: abhaṅgaḥ pratīṣṭaiḥ vyapalāpe sthāpanasya pratīṣṭatāyā sthāpitasya vā /
analyzed: abhaṅgaḥ pratīṣṭaiḥ vyapalāpe sthāpanasya pratīṣṭa tāyā sthāpitasya vā

original: Vin_4.38 / naivaṃvidhaṃ kiñcid astītivāde mṛṣātvam atra pūrvasyāsya vā /
analyzed: na evaṃvidham kiñcid asti iti vāde mṛṣātvam atra pūrvasya asya vā

original: Vin_4.39 / kalikṛtāñ cet bhikṣūṇām āganam upagatāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ dvitripoṣadhātikrāntiś cet pravārayeyuḥ /
analyzed: kali kṛtām ced bhikṣūṇām āganam upagatāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ dvi tri poṣadha atikrāntiḥ ced pravārayeyuḥ
a saṃpattau yat ca pāṇimaṇḍakāni saṃmanyeran

original: Vin_4.41 / vākyasvalpakena pratyutgamya pātracīvarapratiśamanaṃ layanam ālaṃkakūṭāgāroddeśaḥ /
analyzed: vākya su alpakena pratyutgamya pātra cīvara pratiśamanam layanam ālaṃka kūṭāgāra uddeśaḥ

original: nam ity eṣāṃ pralobhanāni prayuñjīran* asaṃpattāv ātmībhāvasya poṣadhaṃ kurvīran* maṇḍalakeṣu /
analyzed: nam iti eṣām pralobhanāni prayuñjīran a saṃpattau ātmībhāvasya poṣadham kurvīran maṇḍalakeṣu

original: Vin_4.44 / nanu yuṣmākam adya pravāraṇeti bruvāṇā[44a4]nām āgamayatāyuṣmantāgantukā yūyaṃ naivāsikā anenārtheneti prativadeyuḥ /
analyzed: nanu yuṣmākam adya pravāraṇā iti āgamayata āyuṣmant āgantukāḥ yūyam naivāsikāḥ anena arthena iti prativadeyuḥ
na a kṛta kṣamaṇaḥ sāntarasya pravārayet

original: Vin_4.57 / saṃjñapteḥ kṣamanīyasya purastād dāpanam abhijñāna /

analyzed: na aniṣṭau upāya paryeṣaṇam na āpadyet

original: Vin_5.2 / yathā trayam evam āstīrṇasya paraṃparabhojanam api nirdoṣaṃ gaṇabhojanaman āmantryagrāmapraveśaś cīvaravijñapanañ ca /
analyzed: yathā trayam evam āstīrṇasya paraṃpara bhojanam api nirdoṣam āmantrya grāma praveśaḥ cīvara vijñapanam ca
bhāginaḥ vyantya śrāmaṇeḥ abhūmi antara stha alābhe
tad tā prāpti vat adharma pakṣeṣu yātaḥ bhinneṣu

original: Vin_5.29 / tasmai dadīta jñapty ādhāvanasyūtirañjaneṣv asau pūrvaṃgamaḥ syāt* /
analyzed: tasmai dadīta jñaptī ādhāvana syūti rañjaneṣu asau pūrvaṃgamaḥ syāt

original: Vin_5.31 / niṣṭhitaṃ saṃpattau dvitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ sūcīpadakānāṃ dānam* /
analyzed: niṣṭhitam saṃpattau dvitrāṇām svayam sūcī padakānām dānam

original: Vin_5.32 / ādānasvayaṃkṛti tad anteṣv āstā[44b4]riṣyāmy āstṛṇomy āstṛtaṃ mayeti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ cittasyotpādanam* /
analyzed: ādāna svayaṃkṛti tat anteṣu āstṛṇomi āstṛtam mayā iti yathāsaṃkhyam cittasya utpādanam

original: Vin_5.34 / śvo ham āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyāmi yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇy uddhartavyāniīti sāmagryām ārocanam* /
analyzed: śvas ham āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyāmi yuṣmābhiḥ svaka svakāni cīvarāṇi uddhartavyāni iti sāmagryām ārocanam

original: Vin_5.36 / gandhapuṣpārcitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpita cāṃgeripaṭalakastham ekaṃ trivānekam ādāya vṛddhā[44b5]nte vasthitenāstṛtes sampādanaṃ pratipadiḥ
analyzed: gandha puṣpa arcitam cāṃgeri paṭalaka stham ekam ādāya vasthitena astṛteḥ sampādanam pratipadiḥ

original: Vin_5.40 / pratibhikṣum agrataḥ sthitvā āstṛtamiti nivedanam /
analyzed: prati bhikṣum agratas sthitvā āstṛtam iti nivedanam

original: Vin_5.41 / sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākamitītaraḥ /
analyzed: sādhu āstṛtam suṣṭhu āstṛtam lābhaḥ ca anuśaṃsaḥ ca saḥ smākam iti itaraḥ

original: Vin_5.44 / kālena kāla śoṣayed ātāpayet* sphoṭayet* /
Vin_5.51 / dvividha uddhāraḥ svayaṃ vivartīkṛtṛmaś ca /
Vin_5.52 / svayam vivṛttiḥ prāpto sīmāntarasya kaṭhinena /

analyzed: abhāve cīvarakaraṇa abhiprayeṇa anusyūteḥ tat eva

original: Vin_5.62 / traye kariṣyamāṇasyaitat saṃsthānam āśāsamucchede prārabdhanaṣṭau niṣṭhāna iti /
analyzed: traye kariṣyamāṇasya etat saṃsthānam āśā samucchede prārabdha naṣṭau niṣṭhāne iti

original: Vin_5.64 / na karmaṇo nyaṅ kāram anu[45a2]ttiṣṭheyuḥ /
Vin_5.68 / āśruter asminn ananubhūtevan taṃ pratyanuvṛttir anuśaṃse /
Vin_5.71 / nānuddhṛte sarveṣāṃ tātkālikaṃ lābhaṃ bhājayet* /
analyzed: na an uddhṛte sarveṣām tātkālikam lābham bhājayet
dharma vādinām sa tat yāḥ tāraḥ

original: Vin_5.79 / kṛte py atretarair eṣām āvāse lābhe rhatvam* /
analyzed: kṛte pi atra itaraiḥ eṣām āvāse lābhe rha tvam
na utkṣiptakānām prakṛtisthaka āvāse sya utthānam

original: Vin_5.82 / bhavati chandadānavaśāt sahitena karaṇīyasya śiṣṭaiḥ kṛtau kṛtatvam* /
analyzed: bhavati chanda dāna vaśāt sahitena karaṇīyasya śiṣṭaiḥ kṛtau kṛta tvam

original: Vin_5.84 / tasmād a[45a4]datvā cchandaṃ svapnasamāpatyoḥ saṃniṣaṇṇe syānutthānam āstārasyoddhṛteś ca prāk śruvaṇāt* /
analyzed: tasmāt chandam svapna samā patyoḥ saṃniṣaṇṇe syāt an utthānam āstārasya uddhṛteḥ ca prāk śruvaṇāt
uṣita tvam eka sīma tāyām tatra āvāsa antara uṣitānām āstāre
tad sthāna tvam āstāra kāle syām asya

original: Vin_5.87 / yat tad āstṛtya pṛthak sīmakaraṇe cāsya sthānam* /
analyzed: yat tat āstṛtya pṛthak sīmakaraṇe ca asya sthānam
na anutthānaka tvāt a pūraka tvam
vināsā aṃghāṭyā grāma praveśa ādi ā śṛṅgāṭake niṣādāt
na a śastra lūnam vāsaḥ paribhuñjīta

original: Vin_6.5 / kūsulakasaṃghakṣike ca yat tadvidhe bhikṣuṇī /
analyzed: kūsulaka saṃghakṣike ca yat tadvidhe bhikṣuṇī
na etat vihāsa ruta udgatim āgamayet

original: Vin_6.10 / āsevakānām atra dānaṃ saṃbhavaś cet /
Vin_6.13 / tatkṣaṇād evāśucimrakṣaṇaṃ sampattau śayanāsanaṃ śocayeta /
analyzed: tad kṣaṇāt eva aśuci mrakṣaṇam sampattau śayana āsanam śocayeta

original: Vin_6.14 / nainaṃ sāṃghikam akhaṭamaṃcapīṭhamapratyāstṛtamatenāniṣādāt saṃvaraṇaṃ vā dattāntarddhānam upabhuñjīta /
analyzed: na enam sāṃghikam akhaṭam aṃca pīṭham a pratyāstṛta matena a niṣādāt saṃvaraṇam vā datta antarddhānam upabhuñjīta

original: Vin_6.15 / sarvañ ca citram abhūyo vinaṣṭaṃ /
Vin_6.17 / dhāraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇasya yena ekapuṭaṃ nyāyyam /
analyzed: dhāraṇam pratyāstaraṇasya yena eka puṭam nyāyyam

original: Vin_6.25 / kalpate kośeyamūrṇakaṃ śānakaṃ [45b3] kṣaumakañ ca /
analyzed: kalpate kośeyam ūrṇakam śānakam kṣaumakam ca
R keśa luñcana parṇa śāṭya ajina sa antara uttara yāpana tiriṭa aṅga nāḍī sarva nīla pravāraṇa dīrgha daśa phaṇa daśa kañcuka uṣṇīṣa śiroveṣṭana kutapoṣṭaka

original: Vin_6.34 / pañcānāṃ labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adyalābho bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam ity ārocanaṃ saṃghe /
analyzed: pañcānām labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adya lābhaḥ bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam iti ārocanam saṃghe
na anarhaḥ prakrāntāyām tad lābha kriyā praviṣṭeḥ

original: Vin_6.54 / naikatvam arddhasya suvarutā ca labdher anarhapraveśe kāraṇaṃ /
analyzed: na eka tvam arddhasya suvaru tā ca labdheḥ anarha praveśe kāraṇam
anarhaḥ saṃgha lābhasya adharma pakṣeṣu patitaḥ bhinneṣu

original: Vin_6.56 / uṣitatvaṃ bahutaram uṣitasya tatkālake lābhe hānāyāsyāvṛttau mṛtyau ca /
analyzed: uṣita tvam bahutaram uṣitasya tad kālake lābhe mṛtyau ca
karma sīmnā saṃghasya a paricchede paricchedaḥ
eka ārṣa gāthā dhāraṇam tattve paryantaḥ

original: Vin_6.66 / asannidhau vā nivṛtte nimittāc cetasi /

analyzed: na anyasya pravrajitāt sabrahmacāriṇaḥ tad īśi tvam

original: Vin_6.70 / na jñaptyādhiṣṭhite prāptasya pūrvacarameṇa vā /
analyzed: na jñaptyā adhiṣṭhite prāptasya pūrva carameṇa vā

original: Vin_6.71 / kasyacit tataḥ saṃghavṛddhanavakayoḥ dānaṃ tad ākhyaṃ /
analyzed: kasyacid tatas saṃgha vṛddha navakayoḥ dānam tat ākhyam
yatra adhiṣṭheyasya gata tā tad sīmā antargatānām adhiṣṭhatṛ tvam

original: Vin_6.74 / sīmāntarikāt sthalagne kāye nyatra vā yātāmā[46a3]krāntis tāvad gatānāṃ /
analyzed: sīmāntarikāt stha lagne kāye nyatra vā tāvat gatānām
preṣitasya a pratikṣiptasya saṃpradānena tadīya tvam

original: Vin_6.83 / antargṛhasthatve pātracīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānaṃ tasyaiśitvam /
analyzed: antargṛha stha tve pātra cīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānam tasya aiśitvam
asattve na uddeśa tvāt pṛṣṭau gatavataḥ
tad deya parimāṇasya tad gāmi tvam mṛta pariskārasya

original: Vin_6.92 / yat tena sā[46a5]rddham avasthitaṃ tasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā vā na tasyaiva /
analyzed: yat tena avasthitam tasya deya tvam grāhya tā vā na tasya eva

original: Vin_6.94 / ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya  #
analyzed: ratnāḥ dīpi tvam saṃbhāvane yāvadbhyaḥ etat tāvatsu nāvā karmikasya viniyogaḥ samam sa glāna upasthāya krātva tad gāmi tvam pariskāra ṣaṭkasya

original: Vin_6.97 / prakrāntatāyāṃ glānasya mṛtyau [46a6] tādarthye deyatvaṃ /
Vin_6.101 / hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /
analyzed: glānasya ukta uktena dāne yathā uktena dāne yathā uktam kārya tvam

original: Vin_6.104 / niryātya gṛhiṇi mṛte putradārasya yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ /
analyzed: niryātya gṛhiṇi mṛte putra dārasya yathā sukha karaṇam
hasti aśva uṣṭa khara vesara sannāhānām rājñi niryātanam
traye hiraṇya suvarṇa anya kṛta akṛtānām

original: Vin_6.108 / sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /
analyzed: sa c ced anyat etat tad aṃśa tvena arthi rikta tve na ced evam eva buddhe muktānām

original: Vin_6.118 / yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā
analyzed: yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepa bhājanam bhojanāni kṣetra gṛha āpaṇa śayana āsana āya paskāra loha nāpita kulāla takṣā
ca varu oḍa bhāṇḍa dāsī dāsa karmakara pauruṣa ya go mahiṣī aja eḍaka bhaiṣajya buddha śāstra pustakānām
śāṭaka paṭaka prāvara kopya nat pulā taila kutupa kara kuṇḍikāni a pustaka lekhya varṇakānām dvitīyasya
tṛtīyasya pañca tila vrīhim udga māṣa avara dhānya anna pānānām
apakarṣe dve sārdhe vā aṅguṣṭha ūtārānā

original: Vin_6.131 / caturasrakaṃ kṛtabandhārthaṃ sūtrakāvakāśārthaṃ chidraṃ tadākhyam(a) /
analyzed: caturasrakam kṛta bandha artham sūtraka avakāśa artham chidram tat ākhyama
kāka cañcuka ākāram kukkuṭa pakṣaka ākāram vā

original: Vin_6.137 / na kamanamṛṣṭena citropacitreṇa vā daṇḍena /
analyzed: na kamana mṛṣṭena citra upacitreṇa vā daṇḍena
na anyām rīti tāmra kaṃsa momayā itas

original: Vin_6.148 / [46b6] dhārayed asyāgṛhakaṃ nāḍikaṃ muṣṭikaṃ vā /
analyzed: dhārayet asya āgṛhakam nāḍikam muṣṭikam vā
na etat alajji śrāmaṇerayoḥ adhīnam kurvīt
madhu sittha mrakṣite sūcī śāstrakāṇām sthāpanam

original: Vin_6.151 / pāśakasyānapagamāya cīvare dānaṃ valakaṃ dattvā /
analyzed: pāśakasya an apagamāya cīvare dānam valakam dattvā

original: Vin_6.153 / na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /
analyzed: na rajakena raktam a raktam vā vastram śocayet
na asya āstare na kāṣṭha bhittake
śoṣaṇam sādhu tāyai saṃguvi araṅgasya chāyā ātape

original: Vin_6.172 / tasmād apanīya kuṇḍālake tanmātramollakasya dānaṃ /
analyzed: tasmāt apanīya kuṇḍālake tad mātram ollakasya dānam

original: Vin_6.179 / anekapārśvakatāpair aṅgasya saṃparivarttanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: aneka pārśvaka tāpaiḥ aṅgasya saṃparivarttanam punar punar

original: Vin_6.180 / navaraṅgasya naveṣv eva sādhu dānam /
Vin_6.186 / na medhyāṃ caṃkrame vā raṅgakarma kuryuḥ /
analyzed: na medhyām caṃkrame vā raṅga karma kuryuḥ

original: Vin_6.192 / prastute ced vātavarṣāgamaḥ karaṇaṃ prāsāde /
analyzed: prastute ced vāta varṣa āgamaḥ karaṇam prāsāde

original: Vin_6.193 / praliptes tatra pradeśe kṛte karaṇaṃ /

analyzed: na asaṃpanna kalpa ākoṭita pratyākoṭita cīvara paribhukti bhajet

original: / avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
analyzed: avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyatara tvam hastam ardhena bhagasya
paṭṭikayā a khothikayā aṅkuñcakena muñcikayā vā
nānā ābharaṇa kalāpakāt duṇḍhubhakā vaidehakāsu varṇa sūtram ca

original: Vin_6.197 / na guruṇā sati parākrame bhāreṇākramet /
analyzed: na guruṇā sati parākrame bhāreṇa ākramet
na uccāra praśrāva karaṇam śuci parikarmaṇeṣu uttarā saṃgha prāvṛttim bhajet
na piṇḍapāta caryā bhojana caitya abhivandana sāmīcīkaraṇam saṃgha sannipāta avavāda dharma śravaṇa anubhavanāt anyasyām vyāpṛtau sāṃghāṭyāḥ

original: Vin_6.204 / nānayaine kasya kasya cin niyuñjīt* /
analyzed: na anayā ene kasya kasya cit niyuñjīt

original: Vin_6.207 / tadabhūtyai tatra pradeśe vastrasyāsyāṃ dānaṃ /
analyzed: tad abhūtyai tatra pradeśe vastrasya asyām dānam

original: Vin_6.210 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
analyzed: kālena kālam asya śocanam rañjanam ca

original: Vin_6.215 / lagnasya kaṣāyodakena kṣodamiśreṇa gate ma[47b2]yitvā mandamandam apanayanaṃ pūyaśoṇitasya ca /
analyzed: lagnasya kaṣāya udakena kṣoda miśreṇa gate mandamandam apanayanam pūya śoṇitasya ca

original: Vin_6.216 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ rañjanañ ca /
analyzed: kālena kālam asya śocanam śoṣaṇam rañjanam ca

original: Vin_6.218 / na yatra kvacana cīvarāṇi sthāpayet /
Vin_6.223 / nidarśanam vihāre parigaṇe py etat /

analyzed: tri adhyarha hastakasya dvi guṇīkṛtya sevanam

original: Vin_6.235 / dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
analyzed: dharmyayā vā kathayā adhvani gacchet āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena

original: Vin_6.238 / yasya tad pānīyaṃ tam uddiśya /
Vin_6.242 / tatpramāṇamadhyardhaṃ śatam upādāya hastānām āśatāt /
analyzed: tad pramāṇam adhyardham śatam upādāya hastānām

original: Vin_6.244 / na vinaitayā durlabhākūpapānīye deśe cāgārikāṃ caret /
analyzed: na vinā etayā durlabhā kūpa pānīye deśe ca āgārikām caret

original: Vin_6.245 / prasphoṭitacīvaro dhvagaḥ [47b5] snātavāṃ prakṣālitapāṇipādo vā gṛhītapānīyaḥ poccito pānakes tricīvaraṃ prāvṛtya śānteryāpatho  #
analyzed: prasphoṭita cīvaraḥ dhvagaḥ snātavān prakṣālita pāṇi pādaḥ vā gṛhīta pānīyaḥ tri cīvaram prāvṛtya

original: Vin_6.248 / prāsādikaḥ susaṃvṛter yaḥ saprabhavenāsya pratiśāmanam /

analyzed: na ajñāyamāna pratiśāmayet sa tīrthyam api

original: Vin_6.250 / pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya
analyzed: dvāram na deyam mṛgayate nivāryaḥ gṛhṇānaḥ iti

original: pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi
analyzed: pratīcchyā avi upekṣitavatā upahṛtau viśvāsa vastu tām ca upanītena mama eva ayam sahāyaḥ ityādi
abhijñāna saṃśrayaṇam aviditasya apareṇa viśeṣa gatau upāyaḥ

original: Vin_6.254 / nāśane yācitasyāśucinā 'saṃpatto śocādinā cittagrahaṇasya mūlyadānaḥ /
analyzed: na aśane yācitasya aśucinā citta grahaṇasya mūlya dānaḥ

original: Vin_6.264 / niḥśrayagrahaṇe sa ced enan niyuñjīta /
analyzed: niḥśraya grahaṇe sa ced enat niyuñjīta

original: Vin_6.265 / vṛddhaś cet śayanāsanasyāsya dāne tadvārikam /
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ ced śayana āsanasya asya dāne tad vārikam

original: Vin_6.267 / pariṣaṇḍādānam antasya cīvare dhvasto pratividhānaṃ ārāpadakais tatsaṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: pariṣaṇḍa ādānam antasya cīvare pratividhānam ārāpadakaiḥ tad saṃgrahaḥ

original: Vin_6.268 / parivāsyābhyavakāśe vṛkṣādy upari saptāṣṭānyahāni pañcāṣātīty aparaṃ śocayitvā śavacīvaraṃ bhuñjīt* /
analyzed: parivāsya abhyavakāśe vṛkṣa ādi upari sapta aṣṭāni ahāni aparam śocayitvā śava cīvaram bhuñjīt

original: Vin_6.269 / pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
analyzed: pravedite smaśanikaḥ ham iti upanimantritaḥ praveśam vihāra kulayoḥ paribhogam ca anutsṛṣṭa svīkārasya śmaśanikaḥ bhajet

original: Vin_6.273 / ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /
analyzed: ūrṇām saṇam karpāsam natukam pattra mañjarīm ca
na hasti aśva go bāla ādika mayam
sarvatra a kamala mṛṣṭa tvam daṇḍe
caitye maṇi vāla vyavjanasya utpannasya dānam

original: Vin_6.293 / mo[48a5]canaṃ cedyā[..]d asyauṣṭaṃ tāvato niṣkrayatvam /
Vin_6.295 / vṛkṣe niryātitasyālaṅkāraś cet tasyaivotsave laṃkaraṇopasthāpanam /
analyzed: vṛkṣe niryātitasya alaṅkāraḥ ced tasya eva utsave laṃkaraṇa upasthāpanam

original: Vin_6.297 / na cet stambhe ca navakarmaṇe /
analyzed: na ced stambhe ca nava karmaṇe
jentāka śālāyām jentākasya sneha lābhasya vā
sneha lābhasya maṇḍala vāṭe sthāpana śālāyoḥ
sthāpanām asyām cāturdiśa sāṃghika tvena iti ayam

original: Vin_6.312 / cakrasya darśanārthaṃ karaṇaṃ gharmavātavarṣopadraveṇāspṛṣṭyai kūpagārasya dvāravanta /
analyzed: cakrasya darśana artham karaṇam gharma vāta varṣa upadraveṇa aspṛṣṭyai kūpa gārasya

original: Vin_6.316 / nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
analyzed: na an uddiśya dvayam śāstṛ pūjāyām datte bhikṣuṇīnām sāṃghike praveśaḥ

original: Vin_6.317 / pṛthagāsāmatre kasyāṃ cakro śrūyaṇe sthūlātyayaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak āsām atre kasyām sthūla atyayaḥ

original: Vin_6.322 / tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /
analyzed: tasya eva atra sannipāta gatam anuṣṭheyam saṃgha sthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam

original: Vin_6.325 / niścitya punar abhūtiṃ* varddhanasya pātanam /

analyzed: na a datta mūlyam param paribhuñjīt

original: Vin_6.331 / [48b3] datte kasyacid avibhakte vaṅgān mṛtau tadvargyagāmitvaṃ tadaṃśasya /
Vin_6.332 / arhati nirvāṇāśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vastraṃ śatarasaṃbhojanaṃ pañcasūtaṃ kūṭāgāram /
analyzed: arhati nirvāṇa āśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavām śata sāhasram vastram śata rasam bhojanam pañca sūtam kūṭāgāram
pātra vipātraka kaṃsikā vindula ākuñcikā śastraka sūcī nakha chedanaka kaṭacchu aṅgāra sthāpana kuṭṭhārī pacanikā sarakānām ayaḥ bhāṇḍebhyaḥ bhājayitavya tā
mṛd bhāṇḍebhyaḥ pātra vipātraka pacanikā ghaṭikā karaka kuṇḍaka kuṇḍikā pānīya sthālakānām

original: Vin_6.343 / maṃcasya ratnamayāde[48b5]r ayomayāt tasya parivartyā /
Vin_6.344 / na kāṣṭhamayasya raṃgasya paṃcakād anyasya /
analyzed: na kāṣṭha mayasya raṃgasya paṃcakāt anyasya

original: Vin_6.351 / yogaṃ bhaktā chādanena pitror udvahet /
Vin_6.352 / na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
analyzed: na ced lābhasya pātra cīvarāt atirekaḥ

original: Vin_6.359 / nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] / /
analyzed: na a sāṃghāṭyām chinna adhiṣṭhāna niyamaḥ na a sattve tad rūpāṇām pratyayānām
yā grāma antargṛhayoḥ anayā upaveśaḥ praveśaḥ ca
na romavidham tri cīvara tvena adhitiṣṭhet

original: Vin_6.367 / anyeṣāñ ca laghūnāṃ paṭapravārāṇāṃ nikaṭaromaprabhṛtīnāṃ /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca laghūnām paṭa pravārāṇām nikaṭa roma prabhṛtīnām

original: Vin_6.369 / na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
analyzed: na lomasya viheṭhe sya anyathā prāvṛtim bhajet

original: Vin_6.373 / na nityam ekayaiva dhārayā caṃkramaṇaṃ /
analyzed: na nityam ekayā eva dhārayā caṃkramaṇam

original: Vin_6.376 / aśakyatve gomayamradā tatraiva caṃ[49a3]krame lepanaṃ /
Vin_6.380 / nāsya śaiklye sadaśāpāśātāyāṃ vā doṣaḥ /
Vin_6.382 / adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāya tattvena anujñātā cīvara dhāraṇam dhārayet uparām vikalpa anekam api
na deśa antara stha tāyām vikalpasya dhvaṃsaḥ

original: Vin_6.396 / gandhaiḥ parliguddhasya vāsasaḥ śocayitvā paribhogaḥ /

analyzed: na dhāvana raṅgana pātra karma kāṣṭha pāṭana ādi karma

original: Vin_6.401 / samyaktvaṃ saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyayacāyanikṣeptre dānam
analyzed: samyak tvam saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyaya cāya nikṣeptre dānam
na sā a nikṣepte manaḥ nunmattakā tad jñāti tad gṛhāt dātum pratigṛhṇīt

original: Vin_6.405 / grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
analyzed: grahaṇam punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtteḥ nyasya bhakta arthasya uddeśa upajīvyasya vā bhājya tvam svīkārāya
na chinna varṣa tvena ṛta tvam
sva saṃkhyā aṃśa tvam asmin avaṣṭambhānām
vitṛtīya aṃśa tvam śrāmaṇera śrāmaṇerikayoḥ lābhe
pudgalaśas bhikṣuṇīnām aṃśa hara tā na saṃghaśas

original: Vin_6.416 / nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
analyzed: na anavachinnam bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnām bhuktava tve tatra apraveśaḥ
na āsana udaka piṇḍapāteṣu jyeṣṭha tvam

original: Vin_6.418 / āsanasya vṛddhānte bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sanniṣāde muktiḥ /
analyzed: āsanasya vṛddha ante bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sat niṣāde muktiḥ

original: Vin_6.419 / karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau  #
analyzed: karaṇam sa bhikṣu tāyām aśaktau teṣām bhikṣuṇyā sāmānyam cārayiṣyati iti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthita pādau

original: Vin_6.420 / yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
analyzed: yathāsaṃbhāvanam iti avalokya parṣadam prabhūtyā ilpa tve bhaktasya tad ākhyāna pūrvakam

original: Vin_6.422 / na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
analyzed: na ca an udghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānte ādau gṛhṇīt
na tri cīvara dāne bhikṣum pravartayet

original: Vin_6.426 / pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: pratidādyate iti atas nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt
sa pṛccha kṣudrākā ādi cīvara vastu gatam

original: Vin_7.2 / pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
analyzed: pūrveṇa puṇḍakacchaḥ nāma dāvaḥ puratas puṇḍavardhanasya

original: Vin_7.11 / sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
analyzed: sapta padāni antatas gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahu puṭau api
na akalpikasya kalpika mātra artha tāyām tad yoga vaśam grahaṇam ā anta tā
na tiryañc vadhi ūka tvasya akalpika tvam

original: Vin_7.26 / piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
analyzed: piṇḍībhavat jane ca janapade kholām pūlām ca

original: Vin_7.27 / na mānyasya sannidhāv upānatpravṛttim bhajeta /
analyzed: na mānyasya sannidhau upānah pravṛttim bhajeta

original: Vin_7.28 / na siṃ*havyāghradvīpihastyājāneyāṅgasya kiñcit kāye vasthitatvaṃ /
analyzed: na siṃha vyāghra dvīpi hasti ājāneya aṅgasya kiñcid kāye vasthita tvam

original: Vin_7.29 / kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān<<ṇ>>ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
analyzed: kakṣa hasti khaṭuṃkāḥ ca tad anya caṇḍa mṛga anṇām api ebhiḥ ākṣepaḥ

original: Vin_7.31 / udāa rdreṇa natukenaināṃ virajībhāvāya [50a1] / / pocchayet* /

analyzed: dhārayet tad artham ārām vaddhram ca

original: Vin_7.37 / na kāṣṭhapādukāyārohed anyatrāntargṛhad aśucikuṭeś ca /
analyzed: na kāṣṭha pādukāya ārohet anyatra antar gṛhat aśuci kuṭeḥ ca
na vaṃśa pattra muṃja sīrī darbhāṇām

original: Vin_7.42 / atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe /
analyzed: atra api atra tad rūpeṣu api pratyayeṣu pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe

original: Vin_7.46 / vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
analyzed: vāte niṣadya ā nipadya ca sarvam arśaḥsu etat iti asya upayogaḥ
aneka upari sthena ca ekena api

original: Vin_7.52 / [50a3] snāyvasthidantamāṃsavaṃsānām api tasyākalpikatvaṃ* yasya carmaṇaḥ /
Vin_7.56 / na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
analyzed: na na abhijñā āstaraṇe kṛtvā sa vidhānam agādham ambhaḥ vagāhet
sarvam coca moca kola aśvottha udumbara puruṣaka mṛddhīka kharjūra pānānām

original: Vin_8.5 / tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
analyzed: tadvat śukta śuluka dadhimaṇḍa udaśvit maṇḍakāni daka bhinnāni paṭṭa pariśrutāni svacchāni mukha darśīni śara kāṇḍa varṇāni

original: Vin_8.6 / ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /

analyzed: bhakticchinnakasya atra ca a kālikā bhakṣaṇe ca

original: Vin_8.13 / atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
analyzed: a tattvāt tad dravyasya kālikam ced an upasaṃpannena marddhanam pariśrāvaṇam ca paṭena
anitivṛttau eṣā utivṛttau yatas sā iti ekaḥ

original: Vin_8.18 / tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ /

analyzed: sarveṣām guḍa khaṇḍa śakara ādīnām phāṇita tvena ākṣepaḥ

original: Vin_8.28 / svasthatāyām āsāṃ glānyānimittaṃ pācate dānam /
analyzed: svastha tāyām āsām glānya animittam pācate dānam
abhāve glāna koṣṭhikāyām kaṣāya añjanayoḥ ca
tat yathā mustam vacā haridrā ārdrakam ativiṣā

original: Vin_8.32 / candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /

analyzed: puṣpāni vāsaka nimba dhātakī nāgānām padma kesaram ca
tat yathā tila palāśa svarjikā yavaśūka vāsakānām

original: Vin_8.43 / tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
analyzed: tat yathā saindhavam sauvarcalam viṭam sāmudram romakam
tat yathā āmra nimba koṣāmba śirīṣa jambūnām

original: Vin_8.46 / yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
analyzed: yāvat āptam dānam snātvā punarasam sparṣam sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāya dānam

original: Vin_8.49 / tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
analyzed: tad ākhyam punar uccāra prasrāvau stanya yāna yāyinām vatsakānām viṣe tau upakārau
kāñcana pītaśāla aśvattha udumbara nyagrodhānām sā

original: Vin_8.58 / jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt /
analyzed: jara kuca uccāra yavāḥ ced akāla upayojya tāyām yāca kṛta bhaiṣajyasya tad artham sphareyuḥ na anyāt paribhuñjīt
paṭṭa pariśrutā ca dabakṣārī na anyat
paṭṭa pariśruteḥ ced rasakaḥ na anyat

original: Vin_8.62 / sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sadbhāvaḥ tad adya ācārasya tasmāt pūrva kalpena tad sāhye pravṛttiḥ

original: Vin_8.63 / [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam /
Vin_8.64 / sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
analyzed: sampadyate prakṣālanena śakta taṇḍuleṣu pravṛtta avasthānasya sva mātra saṃkhya tā guḍasya
an utthānam adhitiṣṭhate sānnihityasya adhitiṣṭhet glāni a nimitta paribhoga artham
rakṣyo pratigrāhita sannihita samparkaḥ tasmāt nirmādya hastau
na udgṛhīta sannihita a pratigrāhita anta ruṣita pakva bhikṣu pakveṣu adhiṣṭhānasya rūḍhiḥ
sannihita tvam rasa accha tā parivṛttau
dhārayet āvā adhikaḥ kacchapuṭam bhaiṣajya nidhānāya

original: Vin_8.84 / svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
analyzed: sva saṃbhavatām tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtam vā nidhānam

original: Vin_8.85 / śoṣaṇataḥ kālena kālaṃ nihitasya pautyānupagatiḥ /
Vin_8.88 / [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /

analyzed: ārdra mṛttikayā tāpana kāle tad avaṣṭambhaḥ

original: Vin_8.103 / kalpikasya pūrvaṃ tāpanaṃ paścāt paribhogikasya /

analyzed: sthūlam atra anyathā aśakya tāyām vyutthāpanasya

original: Vin_8.106 / maṇer loha[51a5]sya vātra nāḍīkasādhvī nāyasaḥ /
analyzed: maṇeḥ vā atra nāḍīka sādhvī na ayasaḥ
na etat anyat cira āvedhāt mukhe bhajet

original: Vin_8.113 / na rātrir abhyavahāre vicikitsāyām apratirūpā /

analyzed: anāśaṃkyam atra apratigrāhita sannihitayoḥ akalpika tvam

original: Vin_8.115 / pānaṃ vicikitsāyai dhūpavartteḥ [51a6] netrikayāsya sampattiḥ /
analyzed: pānam vicikitsāyai dhūpa vartteḥ netrikayā asya sampattiḥ

original: Vin_8.117 / dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
analyzed: dvādaśa aṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣāḥ vā

original: Vin_8.118 / sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
analyzed: sthavikāyām nidhānam mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā

original: Vin_8.119 / nāgadantake cīvaravaṃśe vā tasyā sthāpanam /
analyzed: nāga dantake cīvara vaṃśe vā tasyāḥ sthāpanam

original: Vin_8.129 / apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
analyzed: apeta tāyām paligodhasya sthita tve ca manojñasya puratas khādya bhojyasya mokṣaḥ
na uddiśya kṛtam jñātvā māṃsam bhuñjīt
na eka khura sṛgāla mrkaṭaka ākeṭaka kāka gṛdh
dhrava lākā bhaṣa kālikā ulūka tad anya kuṇapa khādaka pakṣi vaka jāntuka upaladdhā gaṇḍūpaka kṛmīṇām
pratikṣipta maya tām eti māṃsam pratigrāhayantam pṛcchet

original: Vin_8.145 / prakṣiptabharjitayavasyāsya bhūmau nihitasya sukte tvopagatiḥ /
analyzed: prakṣipta bharjita yavasya asya bhūmau nihitasya tvā upagatiḥ

original: Vin_8.152 / rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
analyzed: rakṣyaḥ saṃsargaḥ tasmāt ūne vigata vega tāyām ca
tathā virasīkaraṇena akāla pāne ca āmiṣeṇa

original: Vin_8.154 / prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
analyzed: prāsādikam ca sādhu tasmāt śukla natrakena sūtīkaraṇam
apānam glānena madyasya kuśa agreṇa api

original: Vin_8.157 / cikitsārthatāṃ muktve[51b5]ty aprakṛtisāvadye sarvatra śeṣaḥ /
Vin_8.158 / na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
analyzed: na laśunam palāṇḍum gṛñjanakam vā paribhuñjīta

original: Vin_8.160 / nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt /
analyzed: na upayuñjanaḥ paratas ca sapta aham laśune palāṇḍau tri rātram eka rātram gṛñjana vihāram paribhuñjīt
vāhya vaka vāyasoḥ adhiṣṭhitam kalpika tvena
adhitiṣṭhet na vṛkṣa mūla hasti śāla tīrthika āvasatha rāja kula vastu bhikṣuṇī
ntaḥ sannihitāḥ caturthe saṃmaṃkalpika śālām vāc bhāvaka vacana udāhārataḥ

original: Vin_8.191 / nānye kasyaikasya yānāyāvihārasya kṛtyakaraṇam aprāsādikam /
analyzed: na anye kasya ekasya yānāyā vihārasya kṛtya karaṇam a prāsādikam

original: Vin_8.203 / tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
analyzed: tat yathā drākṣya dāḍima kharjūra akṣoṣṭau vātāmaḥ ca tad ākhyam
tat yathā vinmam mṛṇālikā veṭṭa śālūkam padma karkaṭikā

original: Vin_8.205 / na rājyam upārdham vāsya pratīccheta /
analyzed: na rājyam upārdham vā asya pratīccheta

original: Vin_8.214 / nāprajñāyamānāya vyayo bhayānyatare gaṇanāṃ mṛgayet /
analyzed: na a prajñāyamānāya vyayaḥ bhaya anyatarasmin gaṇanām mṛgayet

original: Vin_8.217 / yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
analyzed: yatas na agatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpa kāram āpanam

original: Vin_8.218 / deyatvaṃ bhaktasya karaṇaṃ ceta karmaṇaḥ /

analyzed: go mahiṣī aja eḍaka hasti aśva uṣṭra gardabha āma dhānya bhājanam ca na stūpasya eṣām akalpanam
dhārayet kalā vikāla vaṇa pātalikām ca

original: Vin_8.221 / nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet /
analyzed: nābhyām anupāna paṭṭakāt ca anyat kaṃsa bhājanam pudgalaḥ dhārayet

original: Vin_8.223 / grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
analyzed: grahaṇam rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām api anyānām samāna vyañjanānām
āsakta kaṇṭha cīvaraka tvam eṣām veṣaḥ

original: Vin_8.236 / nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
analyzed: na apārśva nihita tām prāk āvāt piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet
anāśaṃkyam atra loha bhāṇḍa ādhāraṇe ca asādhāraṇa tvam
akalpika tvam ca glānāyāḥ cela ābharaṇasya
na āviśa bharāvakeṇa piṇḍāya kulam praviśet
na dharma vaṇijī apajīvi tām kalpayet

original: Vin_8.245 / [52b3] śocanam asaṃbhave jalasya dadhyādimaṇḍena pādayoḥ /
Vin_8.253 / adhiṣṭhāpakānām apahartṛtve vā karaṇam uddeśaḥ /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāpakānām apahartṛ tve vā karaṇam uddeśaḥ

original: Vin_8.255 / yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vṛddhikayā niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahā sannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ
