original: Vin_8.256 / niṣadeyuḥ dvitrāvarjāṃ yatheṣṭam atra bhikṣuṇyāḥ /

analyzed: smṛtim upasthāpya avikṣipta cittaḥ piṇḍapātam gṛhṇīyāt

original: Vin_8.269 / na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam /
analyzed: na yena mantrita tatas nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre sti ayukta tvam

original: Vin_8.271 / tad antargatavad anyopanimantraṇe niṣaṇṇasyānujñātaṃ tenānyadattam /
analyzed: tat antargata vat anya upanimantraṇe niṣaṇṇasya anujñātam tena anya dattam
abhipretena arthena śabda prayoge vyavasthāna prasiddhena

original: Vin_8.273 / nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
analyzed: na antam visarjayet dṛṣṭi śīla sampannābhyām ā antasya anyatra yathāsaṃkhyam dānam atiriktasya ca alopāt yātrā kāriṇaḥ grahaṇam

original: Vin_8.275 / māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam
analyzed: mātā pitṛ glāna putra hya apekṣa kukṣīmatībhyaḥ vineyākām kṣā piṇḍapātam spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaḥ ca tatas karaṇam
na an avaśite bhakti artham upanikṣiptāt dadīt

original: Vin_8.280 / na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /
analyzed: na nimantraṇake śraddha deya tvena pātra adhiṣṭhāne sya ucchiṣṭā śilām yathā sukha karaṇam
tsya māṃsa apūpa kṣīra dadhi navanīta matsya vat lūrāṇām

original: Vin_8.294 / nāpareṇa sārddham ekatra bhājane bhuñjīt* /
analyzed: na apareṇa sārddham ekatra bhājane bhuñjīt

original: Vin_8.297 / śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
analyzed: śrāmaṇere ca sārddham para vat ayoge kalpa kārakānām piṇḍīkṛtya dānam
rakṣatvam anayā iṣ pratigraha dhvasta ena pratigrāhita saṃpṛkteḥ ca

original: Vin_8.307 / nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet /
analyzed: na idam itas vā dehi iti bhojana artham upaviṣṭa pariveṣṭāram bodhayet

original: Vin_8.309 / tadyathā mandāgnau pakvasyāmasya dīpatāgnau glānasaṃjñām /
analyzed: tat yathā manda agnau pakvasya āmasya dīpa tā agnau glāna saṃjñām
svatra upasthāpya bhuñjīt bhaiṣajya saṃjñām āhāre
samudāgama sādṛśya pariṇata pratyarthika tva nisyanda pratītya
na tad bhukti artham vādyamāna tve
atyaye kālasya dvi tra yoga arthayoḥ
dakṣiṇā deśana dharma deśanayoḥ nimantraṇakam bhuktvā karaṇam

original: Vin_8.329 / akṛte ced gamanapratyayaḥ parivāradānaṃ bhikṣūṇām /
analyzed: a kṛte ced gamana pratyayaḥ parivāra dānam bhikṣūṇām
nanda upanandayoḥ dakṣiṇā deśane nāma grahaṇam

original: Vin_8.333 / nigileṣva [53b1]nāḍikokāloṅgarān dvitrānādau chorayitvā mukhaṃ nirmādya /
Vin_8.335 / tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt mukham akāle pravāritaḥ ca udgāra ārāme nirmādayet anyaḥ

original: Vin_8.338 / naitat chandaṃ vā sthāvirasya purataṣkuryāt /
analyzed: na etat chandam vā sthāvirasya purataṣkuryāt
pātram asya hasti pada budhnam sādhārakasya
kṣodaka vāluka chāyikānām dhāraṇam makṣikāṇām pratividheḥ

original: Vin_8.348 / adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
analyzed: a durgandhībhāva prāṇaka asaṃbhavāya kālena kālam śocanam śoṣaṇam ca
avighāta artham koṇa stambha pārśve vihārasya

original: Vin_8.372 / na tatpratibaddhakāryād anyena tatsamīpe tiṣṭhet /
analyzed: na tad pratibaddha kāryāt anyena tad samīpe tiṣṭhet
na a prajñapte pradeśe prasrāvam kuryāt

original: Vin_8.386 / sāmantake duḥkhanaṃ cet pātravaibhaṅgukānāṃ dānam* /
analyzed: sāmantake duḥkhanam ced pātra vaibhaṅgukānām dānam
rakṣyaḥ bhūmi nāśaḥ tasmāt aṣkarya karasya
kālena kālam a durgandha tāyai śocanam

original: Vin_8.403 / nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
analyzed: nirdoṣam śūte kukṣeḥ prāc antāt poccana mātram kṛtvā āsanam na atas
sati udake na a vānte niṣīdet
abhāve ekasya agrahītu bhikṣu saṃghena niyogaḥ bhikṣoḥ
māna āsya vartaṇam dvayoḥ sa āme tayoḥ
sa pūrva saṃvṛti dvaya parṣad anala parṣad upasthāna saṃvṛti dāne ntaḥ saṃghasya

original: Vin_9.28 / kalpikam aśaktau karmakārikāyānitīritaṃ tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam vacanam* /
analyzed: kalpikam aśaktau karma kārikāyāḥ an iti īritam tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam vacanam

original: Vin_9.29 / yasmāt tūṣṇīm ity ataḥ prāk* /

analyzed: na āsat niṣāda sthasya pūraka tvam

original: Vin_9.31 / na yasya kriyateḥ [54a5] tasmād asatvaṃ pūrakatvasya chandapariśuddhir vidheḥ /
analyzed: na yasya tasmāt a sattvam pūraka tvasya chanda pariśuddhiḥ vidheḥ
na anupasaṃpatka dhvasta ānantarya kṛt pāpa dṛṣṭi bhūmye ntara stha nānā saṃvāsikānām

original: Vin_9.45 / vartamānasya nāto nyaibhiḥ saśrutaṃ kuryuḥ /
analyzed: vartamānasya na atas sa śrutam kuryuḥ
annaḥ pṛcchā artham jñapti prabhṛtau ca upadyamānam

original: Vin_9.53 / tatsīmāntargatasyārhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandato vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭatvaṃ
analyzed: tad sīmā antargatasya arhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandataḥ vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭa tvam

original: pratikroṣantā ca yasya tatkarma tato nyasya pratikūlaṃ cet dharmaṃ vācyutasyeryāpathāt*
analyzed: pratikroṣantā ca yasya tat karma tatas nyasya pratikūlam ced dharmam vā acyutasya īryāpathāt
saṃyatasya vā ca utsṛjya anabhijña sāntarāt vyagra tvam
mṛṣāvāda prahva tvam a saṃyatiḥ vācā

original: Vin_9.56 / aprakṛtisthatvam atra cānyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīyakṛtau ca /
analyzed: a prakṛti stha tvam atra ca anyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīya kṛtau ca
cyutiḥ īryāpathāt viprakramaṇa cittena pravṛttasya asya utsṛṣṭiḥ
saṃmanyeran sādhutara vahutara kāriṇam saṃmatam apasārya

original: Vin_9.64 / na niyamya kālaṃ paunaḥpunye nyatra vā /
analyzed: na niyamya kālam paunaḥpunye nyatra vā

original: Vin_9.65 / dadhyur anyatra yāvad arthaṃ parihāraṃ /
Vin_9.67 / yasya pūraṇe narhatva śalākācāraṇe pi tasya /
analyzed: yasya pūraṇe śalākā cāraṇe pi tasya

original: Vin_9.68 / saṃghabhede sya rūḍhir anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇāṃ /
analyzed: saṃgha bhede sya rūḍhiḥ anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇām
kriyamāṇa tāyām prakrāntau apūrṇasya parvaṇaḥ vigupita tvam

original: Vin_9.74 / punaś cet taccikīrṣādhikopanam vā ca /
analyzed: punar ced tad cikīrṣā adhikopanam vā ca

original: Vin_9.76 / punar bhadantājñaptiṃ* kariṣyāmy anuśrāvaṇañ ceti /
analyzed: punar bhadanta ājñaptim kariṣyāmi anuśrāvaṇam ca iti
tris vācanā sva artha anirikta maṃtra uktiḥ

original: Vin_9.79 / niṣaṇṇo syotkuṭukikayā purato nirikteś ca /
analyzed: niṣaṇṇaḥ sya utkuṭukikayā puratas nirikteḥ ca

original: Vin_9.82 / masūrikādau striyāḥ [54b6] vṛddhānte nanyatantratāyāṃ saṃghe sthitasya parārthe sapraṇatam* /
analyzed: masūrikā ādau striyāḥ vṛddha ante saṃghe sthitasya para arthe sa praṇatam
antara mārge samanuṣiṣṭa tāyām rahasi iti ekam

original: Vin_9.87 / pātrabhaiṣajyaṃ vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
analyzed: pātra bhaiṣajyam vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā

original: Vin_9.90 / rohanty asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpa utsarge dhiṣṭhānañ ca nānutsṛṣṭe pūrvatra /
analyzed: rohanti asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpaḥ utsarge dhiṣṭhānam ca na an utsṛṣṭe pūrvatra
ca eka adhiṣṭhānam tad āśaya upasaṃpatti pūrvakam
sāmīcyā tadarha tveḥ vacanīya tāyāḥ svārtha āmantrasya

original: Vin_9.97 / ādau [55a2] ca triḥpragṛhītāṃ jalitvaṃ tādarthye divasārocane ca /
analyzed: ādau ca tris pragṛhītām jali tvam tādarthye divasa ārocane ca

original: Vin_9.98 / aupayikam ity ante svārthaṃ vijñaptena vacanaṃ pudgalaś cet /
analyzed: aupayikam iti ante sva artham vijñaptena vacanam pudgalaḥ ced

original: Vin_9.100 / chandadveṣamohabhayagativirahitasya śaktasya kṛtākṛtasmaraṇe saṃmatir utsāhya /
analyzed: chanda dveṣa moha bhaya gati virahitasya śaktasya kṛta akṛta smaraṇe saṃmatiḥ utsāhya
gaṇḍī ākoṭana pṛṣṭa vācikā samanuyogābhyām sat niṣādakena bodhanam
saṃmatasya tad kārya artha tāyām etat tvam
na a pratikṛta ājñapana jaṣkarma pratyanubhavet

original: Vin_10.3 / na sīmāntarasthasya kasmiṃś cid aṅgatvam /
analyzed: na sīmāntara sthasya kasmin cit aṅga tvam

original: Vin_10.5 / ubhayasthatvam ekasminn e[55a4]katra pāde parasmin paratra /
analyzed: ubhaya stha tvam ekasmin pāde parasmin paratra
na a karmaṇā tad karaṇīyasya utthānam
kṛta tvam yat bhūyas kṛta tve vākyasya anuttarasya
na a kīrti tve nimittānām bandhe

original: Vin_10.19 / na hāsyabhāvena kasyacit sthūlam arūḍhibuddhyā bhedotkṣepayoḥ /
analyzed: na hāsya bhāvena kasyacid sthūlam a rūḍhi buddhyā bheda utkṣepayoḥ

original: Vin_10.21 / nānyeṣāṃ nānāsaṃvāsikebhyo barhāṇāṃ pūraṇe gaṇena jñaptivācanayoḥ /
analyzed: na anyeṣām nānā saṃvāsikebhyaḥ barhāṇām pūraṇe gaṇena jñapti vācanayoḥ
na asaṃpannatve rhaḥ sva saṃghena pratyanubhavasya

original: Vin_10.23 / saṃpannatvaṃ [55a6] jñaptiśrutāv asya nāvidhir bhavyarūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam /
analyzed: saṃpanna tvam jñapti śrutau asya na a vidhiḥ bhavya rūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam
vidhi tvam mevaka jñapana pūrvaka tve sya

original: Vin_10.33 / na bhikṣubhikṣuṇītvayor anyakarmavastupratijñapite codakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyaṃ praṇidhikaraṇam /
analyzed: na bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī tvayoḥ anya karma vastu pratijñapite ca udakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyam praṇidhi karaṇam

original: Vin_10.35 / anaṅgam adarśane vyāghātitvāt sattvasya pratijñānam /
analyzed: anaṅgam adarśane vyāghāti tvāt sattvasya pratijñānam
saṃpatya asvayam an utthāne ca udakasya utthāpanam
rāja kula yukta kula jñāti pudgala pratisaraṇa tām a pratisartṛ tām saṃghasya a bibhrataḥ
akurvāṇasya asya āgārika tīrthika dhvaja dhāraṇa tīrthya sevā anācāra caraṇa anya śikṣaṇañ

original: ca bhikṣuśikṣāyām utkacaprakacasya saṃghe roma pātayato niḥsaraṇaṃ pravarttayataḥ
analyzed: ca bhikṣu śikṣāyām utkaca prakacasya saṃghe roma pātayataḥ niḥsaraṇam pravarttayataḥ

original: samīcīm upadarśayato viramato nimittād avasāraṇaṃ yācite /
analyzed: samīcīm upadarśayataḥ viramataḥ nimittāt avasāraṇam yācite
nigarhaṇam abhīkṣṇa saṃgha avaśeṣa āpattikasya a pratikṛtya
adāna akaraṇayoḥ ca tad artham saṃnipāta avakāśayoḥ

original: Vin_10.48 / tatkṣama[55b4]ṇakam atra karmaṇaḥ sthāne 'vasāraṇaṃ prati pratītāyām[ā]pattāvapratikṛtāyām
analyzed: atra karmaṇaḥ sthāne vasā āraṇam prati pratītāyām āpattau apratikṛtāyām

original: apratikāryāyāṃ saṃvareṇādṛṣṭim udbhāvayantam anicchantaṃ pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum anutsṛjantaṃ
analyzed: a pratikāryāyām saṃvareṇa adṛṣṭim udbhāvayantam an icchantam pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum an utsṛjantam

original: Vin_10.49 / ihaivainām āpattiṃ pratikurvīthā ayam eva tv āsaṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati ity evaṃ brūyyuḥ /
analyzed: iha eva enām āpattim pratikurvīthāḥ ayam eva tu ā saṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati iti evam brūyyuḥ

original: Vin_10.60 / sannihite tatrāsrame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyanta dharmaṃ pratide[śa]yāmi iti /
analyzed: sannihite tatra a srame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpannaḥ u sātmyam pratideśanīyanta dharmam pratideśayāmi iti
vadante tra udyuktasya a saṃpanna praya tve karma
duṣkāravat tva mūḍha kṛtasya pratyāpattau saṃjñāyamānasya tena
nāma gotra upasaṃhitam āpatti tvāt kīrttanam
iyat kāla praticchanna tayā vā saṃgha avaśeṣāyām

original: Vin_10.85 / kriyamāntāyām anayos tatsaṃghāvaśeṣāpadane dhvaṃsaḥ kṛtādānayoḥ /
Vin_10.88 / tasmād arūḍhasyāsya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpyatā prathamaṃ ca /
analyzed: tasmāt arūḍhasya asya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpya tā prathamam ca
avarodhya tā ca atiriktasya tad praticchāda kālasya
tarjanam ca atra jñapti prathama vācana antarāle

original: Vin_10.102 / nāsāṃ manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ /
analyzed: na āsām manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ
adharma pakṣasya aiti bhinna tāyām itareṇa
apāśrayeṇa asya vastavya tā sa premakasya

original: Vin_10.110 / vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇapraṇidhinā dhvaste[56a5]na ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam /
analyzed: vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇa praṇidhinā ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam

original: Vin_10.118 / anivṛttau kaler upaśāntyai prayatnād utkṣepaḥ /

analyzed: nimittasya api kaleḥ upasaṃhāriṇā utkṣepya tā
a vandanā arha saṃvṛtim atra utkṣiptasya bhikṣuṇyāḥ kuryuḥ

original: Vin_10.124 / udbhavo 'nyasya praṇidhiḥ nimitte tadarthābhisandhināny aprakṛtau /

analyzed: sthūlam jñāta mahā puṇya sūtra vinaya mātṛkā dhara bahu śruta pakṣam anivārāṇām pratisaṃharaṇam

original: Vin_10.132 / pātrasasvākhyātāraṃ prati bhikṣor abhūtena pārājaikena /
analyzed: pātra sa su ākhyātāram prati bhikṣoḥ a bhūtena

original: Vin_10.136 / na nikubjitayā tasya [56b2] gṛhān gacchet /
Vin_10.141 / yat karma karaṇaṃ tadgatānāṃ nikubjitatvam /
analyzed: yat karma karaṇam tad gatānām nikubjita tvam
an uttānam asya asva pakṣa kulam prati utkṣiptakāt

original: Vin_10.150 / śuddhir ekasya purato deśanena saṃghāvaśeṣato hrīmataḥ /
analyzed: śuddhiḥ ekasya puratas deśanena saṃgha avaśeṣataḥ hrīmataḥ

original: kṛtaṃ ne vā kiṃ* vā kīdṛśyaṃ ceti smartum anupasaṃpa katotkṣiptayoś cānutthānaṃ pratichādasya /
analyzed: vā kim vā ca iti smartum ca an utthānam pratichādasya
bhraṣṭasya āvahārika saṃjña tāyām āpatteḥ asya a parājayāt
na ajñāta tvena sraddhita tve vā
tad avasthā tvam pratyāgata avacaraṇa bhūmeḥ

original: Vin_11.13 / śodhite vastuni sāṣānuṣṭhānam anirjñāne pratichādakālasyāsaṃvya ānany ūnatvasya saṃśrayaṇaṃ /
analyzed: śodhite vastuni a nirjñāne pratichāda kālasya a saṃvye ānani ūna tvasya saṃśrayaṇam
saṃcintya śukre visṛṣṭa samutthām aparimāṇām iti

original: Vin_11.18 / yāvatīṣv abhiprāyas tāvat kīmitvam atrātrānuṣṭhiteḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīṣu abhiprāyaḥ tāvat kīmitvam atra atra anuṣṭhiteḥ

original: Vin_11.19 / aparimāna ity anirjñāne sya saṃśrayasaṃbahulāḥ parimānavatya iti prābhūtye /
analyzed: aparimāne iti a nirjñāne sya saṃśraya saṃbahulāḥ parimānavatyaḥ iti prābhūtye

original: Vin_11.23 / carato paraprāksampannapraticikīrṣotpattau pṛ[tha]g* dānam ekaṃ caraṇaṃ /

analyzed: na asya pratichanna tāyām māna āsye saṃbhavaḥ
na ānantye ha se ha rātrasya pratichāda utthānam
na abhāve ṅgasya udbhāvanāya ātma cittānām pratichādaḥ
tad artha vaśa tayā api kṛtau
anutsṛṣṭa tvam pratichāda cittasya tad citta tāna dos ṣamāpattyāḥ parājitasya aprakṛtau
pārivāsika māna āsya cāribhyām abhivādana vandana pratyutthāna aṃjali sāmīcī karmaṇām prakṛtisthāt bhikṣoḥ asvīkaraṇam

original: Vin_12.2 / yasyābhyāmakaraṇam itarair api tatra tadgatasya /
analyzed: yasya ābhyāma karaṇam itaraiḥ api tatra tad gatasya

original: Vin_12.3 / yad aparihāṇikāto nyathānena sārddham acaṃkra[57a3]maṇam /
analyzed: yat aparihāṇikā atas nyathā anena sārddham
pravrājana upasaṃpādana niḥśraya dāna śramaṇa uddeśa upasthāpanānām akaraṇam

original: Vin_12.12 / anuddeśaḥ poṣadhe prātimokṣasya saty anyatroddeṣṭari /
analyzed: an uddeśaḥ poṣadhe prātimokṣasya sati anyatra uddeṣṭari
a karaṇam savacanīya tā sa kīla tvayoḥ
asthāpanam avavāda poṣadha pravāraṇa ājñapti vācanānām

original: Vin_12.21 / [57a5] vratasya niḥsāraḥ pravartito bhavatīti manasikaraṇaṃ /
analyzed: vratasya niḥsāraḥ pravartitaḥ bhavati iti manasikaraṇam
kālyam utthāya dvāra mokṣaḥ dīpa sthālaka uddharaṇa vihāra seka saṃmārga sukumāri gomaya kārṣya anupradānāni

original: Vin_12.33 / kṛte bhaktakṛtye śayanāsanasya channe gopanam* /
analyzed: kṛte bhakta kṛtye śayana āsanasya channe gopanam

original: Vin_12.39 / na ced anyasya bhikṣor adhyeṣaṇaṃ /

analyzed: pāda śocanam bhikṣūṇām caikālikam kāla anurūpeṇa ambunā

original: / prāg* dvāramokṣyād vihārādau ca paryuṣitavac caritapattau /
analyzed: prāk dvāramokṣyāt vihāra ādau ca paryuṣita vat carita pattau
tathā tarjita nigarhita prathā sita pratisaṃkṛta utkṣiptāḥ
an arta tvam ca tadātva nimitta lābhe

original: / arūḍair aprakṛtistheṣu paripāsamānāpy aśikṣācaraṇānāṃ / [end of R om.]
analyzed: arūḍaiḥ a prakṛti stheṣu a śikṣā caraṇānām

original: Vin_12.50 / na yatryānye triḥprabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tadākhyacaraṇās tatra taccaret* /
analyzed: na tris prabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tad ākhya caraṇāḥ tatra tat caret
na anyatra prathama āvaraṇena an udgama yad enām

original: Vin_12.54 / pratyahaṃ na cec ciraṃ caritavyatvaṃ /
Vin_12.57 / [57b4] kalahakārakāgamanañ ca śrutvā bhayañ cedataḥ pratini[ḥ]sṛjetāṃ saṃghasannidhau pudgale vā /
analyzed: kalahakāraka āgamanam ca śrutvā bhayam ced atas pratiniḥsṛjetām saṃgha sannidhau pudgale vā

original: Vin_12.59 / chedas tadahorātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham ekachadane parivāsikamānāsyacāriṇoḥ śayyāyāṃ bahi[ḥ]sīmni ca /
analyzed: chedaḥ tad ahar rātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham eka chadane parivāsika māna āsya cāriṇoḥ śayyāyām bahis sīmni ca

original: Vin_12.61 / nāsannidhau tatsīmni śrāvyāṇām asyotthānaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tadaharā[57b5]gatau sīmāntare gamanam* /
analyzed: na asannidhau tad sīmni śrāvyāṇām asya utthānam nirdoṣam sīmāntare gamanam

original: Vin_12.62 / na parivāsikena sārdham ekachadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt* /
analyzed: na parivāsikena sārdham eka chadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt

original: Vin_12.63 / na tīrthyupanivāsasthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ //
analyzed: na tīrthi upanivāsa sthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ
arūḍhiḥ avasita pravāraṇa uktau pravāraṇa āsthāpanasya

original: Vin_13.7 / āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ glānas tvam aprayojyama ity āyusmaṃ bhūteti glāno sāv ananuyojyā iti prativadeyuḥ /
analyzed: āgamaya tvam āyuṣman glānaḥ tvam aprayojyamaḥ iti āyusman bhūta iti glānaḥ u sau ananuyojyāḥ iti prativadeyuḥ

original: Vin_13.8 / anavagatasvarūpatāyāṃ kṛtasya kartur vā codanasya /
analyzed: anavagata svarūpa tāyām kṛtasya kartuḥ vā codanasya

original: Vin_13.16 / savacanīyaṃ tv āyuṣman karomi na tvaṃ yo smādāvāsādanavalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitaṃ vacanāyeti /
analyzed: savacanīyam tu āyuṣman karomi na tvam sma ādāvāsāt an avalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitam vacanāya iti

original: Vin_13.21 / karaṇam asyatra sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena [58a2] sārdham upasāraṇaṃ /
analyzed: karaṇam sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena sārdham upasāraṇam

original: Vin_13.23 / vakṣyāmy atrāmutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ceṣṭam ity āropya cāmattiṃ* darśayitvāparādham utsṛjanena /
analyzed: vakṣyāmi atra amutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ca iṣṭam iti āropya ca āmattim darśayitvā aparādham utsṛjanena

original: Vin_13.24 / śīladṛṣṭyā cārājīva vipatyā sarvasyāsya codanādeḥ kriyāyāṃ ruḍhiḥ samūlakaṃ /
analyzed: śīla dṛṣṭyā vipatyā sarvasya asya codana ādeḥ kriyāyām ruḍhiḥ samūlakam

original: Vin_13.27 / kriyānimittānāṃ parasaṃlāpa[58a3]sya sānuśrāvaṇasyeti trividhaṃ śrutaṃ /
analyzed: kriyā nimittānām sa anuśrāvaṇasya iti trividham śrutam

original: Vin_13.31 / nāpoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛtatve vā strītve sthāpakasyai[ka]tarasya puṃstve sthāpitatvaṃ sthāpitatā /
analyzed: na apoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛta tve vā strī tve sthāpakasya ekatarasya puṃstve sthāpita tvam sthāpita tā

original: Vin_14.1 // na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum akā[58a4]maṃ codayed unmoṭayed vā codayatvaṃ /
analyzed: na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum codayet unmoṭayet vā

original: Vin_14.2 / na yatra prativirodhas tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta /
analyzed: na yatra prativirodhaḥ tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta

original: Vin_14.5 / antaritasyānayor vihārasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā ca /
analyzed: antaritasya anayoḥ vihārasya deya tvam grāhya tā ca

original: Vin_14.6 / dharme vinaye caitadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśo jñātvā saṃghasāmagrīn na vidyate /
analyzed: dharme vinaye ca etadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśaḥ jñātvā saṃgha sāmagrīn na vidyate

original: Vin_14.7 / tasmān na tad anyānāṃ saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇo rūḍhin na paraspareṇāvyagratvam* /
analyzed: tasmāt na tat anyānām saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇaḥ rūḍhin na paraspareṇa avyagra tvam

original: Vin_14.8 / [58a5] kaliparāyaṇatva eṣā tadvipakṣasya cāvandyatvam idaṃ dharmabhiḥ /

analyzed: pratyutthāna āsana upanimantraṇa saṃlapana ālapana saṃmodana vyavalokana ālokanānām api a karaṇam
vacanena anyatra sa sūtam iti aparam

original: Vin_14.13 / mṛddhadvā vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā sma ity ātmānam* [58a6] pratijānīdhve /
analyzed: mṛddhadvāḥ vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā smaḥ iti ātmānam pratijānīdhve

original: Vin_14.14 / yeṣāṃ cedaṃ vṛttam iyaṃ vārtā kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā yenaitad anujñātam etad api vo na prāpadyata iti prativadeyur anyatra /
analyzed: yeṣām ca idam vṛttam iyam vārtā kāruṇikaḥ vaḥ śāstā yena etat anujñātam etat api vaḥ na prāpadyate iti prativadeyuḥ anyatra

original: Vin_14.17 / nāpi sāritāām eṣāṃ sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrīlābhenotthāpanaṃ /
analyzed: na api eṣām sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrī lābhena utthāpanam
na vinā poṣadhena prakṛti stha tā prāptiḥ
tasya eva ca atra kālasya nimitta tvam

original: Vin_14.24 / karmaṇaḥ kṛtāvadharmavādibhir antaḥsīmni pṛthak tadbhedo tadacittena /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ kṛtau adharma vādibhiḥ antar sīmni pṛthak tad acittena
dharma vādi kṛtatā saṃghasya kṛta tvam

original: Vin_14.28 / sthalasthair atra sanni ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodyatvaṃ /
analyzed: sthala sthaiḥ atra ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodya tvam
acodya tvam pakṣa aparapakṣa vyavasthitasya bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya
ubhaya sannipāte ca a vibhajya a pratipātitasya saṃghe vaibhājyasya
saṃgha parimāṇa tā ced tatra teṣām

original: Vin_14.39 / tat tatā yadīyasyotsaṃghe pratipādanaṃ [58b3] dvayoś ced ubhayatra /
analyzed: tat tatā yadīyasya utsaṃghe pratipādanam dvayoḥ ced ubhayatra
karma bheda vastu gate pṛcchā māṇavike

original: Vin_15.1 / jñapanato vā pṛthagbhāvasya dharmāt saṃghabhedaḥ /
analyzed: jñapanataḥ vā pṛthagbhāvasya dharmāt saṃgha bhedaḥ

original: Vin_15.3 / arūḍhir asyāsaṃghaparimāṇatve bhidyamānānām asatve cānyeṣām antaḥsīmni saṃghaparisānānām adharmadharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatāv  #
analyzed: arūḍhiḥ asya a saṃgha parimāṇa tve bhidyamānānām asatve ca anyeṣām antar sīmni saṃgha parisānānām adharma dharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatau

original: Vin_16.2 / padārthatathātve vipratipattir varjanaṃ sāpattikā sāmagryadānaṃ karmāṇi /
Vin_16.4 / anena ca śuddhidāne ca dvitīyanimittasya /
analyzed: anena ca śuddhi dāne ca dvitīya nimittasya
tritīya nimittasya pratikaraṇe nivāraṇa niyukta tva ādānena ca

original: Vin_16.7 / sabhyai svayam aśaktau vivaditroḥ saṃpra[58b5]tipādanam* /

analyzed: kuśalasya adhikaraṇa vṛtte dhī ācāre ca

original: Vin_16.25 / samantṛtvaṃ vargasya svato saktau vyūḍhakeṣu /
analyzed: sa mantṛ tvam vargasya saktau vyūḍhakeṣu
pratyāgate mūla saṃghe na adhikaraṇa saṃcāraka saṃmatiḥ

original: Vin_16.28 / tena sasthavire saprātimokṣe nyatra saṃgha upanikṣepaḥ /
analyzed: tena sa sthavire sa prātimokṣe nyatra saṃghaḥ upanikṣepaḥ

original: Vin_16.34 / varjayed asau tataḥ svīkaraṇaṃ kasyacit* /

analyzed: eka āsana niṣadana eka caṅkrama caṅkramaṇa ālāpa saṃlāpāḥ ca

original: Vin_16.37 / anupadhūta idaṃ vadet teṣāṃ ca [59a2] āyuṣmanta alābhānālābhādurlabho
na sulabhā ye yūyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā kalahajātā viharata bhaṇḍanajātā
analyzed: na sulabhāḥ ye yūyam su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajyā kalaha jātāḥ viharata bhaṇḍana jātā

original: vikṛhītā vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalaho mā bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho mā vivādaḥ //
analyzed: vikṛhītāḥ vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalahaḥ mā bhaṇḍanam vigrahaḥ mā vivādaḥ

original: nāsti dvayor yudhyato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājayaḥ /
analyzed: na asti dvayoḥ yudhyataḥ jayaḥ ekasya jayaḥ ekasya parājayaḥ

original: nāsti dvayor dhāvato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājaya [59a3] iti /
analyzed: na asti dvayoḥ dhāvataḥ jayaḥ ekasya jayaḥ ekasya parājayaḥ iti

original: Vin_16.38 / bahutaramatena saṃsthānam ity aparaḥ saṃpratipādanaprakāraḥ /

analyzed: dharma viniścitā avaśya saṃbhavaḥ na vṛtti viniścitau
vivaditṛ gata tvāt tad gatāyāḥ pratyavagateḥ

original: Vin_16.41 / kharamarthipratyarthikair gṛhītatve pragāḍham* ca vyāḍhatve teṣāṃ bhedāśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇaṃ /
analyzed: khara marthi pratyarthikaiḥ gṛhīta tve pragāḍham ca vyāḍha tve teṣām bheda āśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇam
śalākā grahaṇena atra matasya gṛhītavya tā

original: Vin_16.50 / tathā ced adharmaśalākādhikyasaṃpattiṃ* [59a5] manyeta na chandānupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta /
analyzed: tathā ced adharma śalākā ādhikya saṃpattim manyeta na chanda anupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta

original: Vin_16.51 / dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānāṃ cāraṇakāle grahaṇaṃ vāmenetarāsāṃ /
analyzed: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānām cāraṇa kāle grahaṇam vāmena itarāsām
pratichādya enāḥ pūrvāḥ prakāśi kṛtyā upayācanam

original: sthavire yaṃ dharmaśalākā ajihmā avaṃkā akuṭil[ā] su[va]rṇā sugandhā sukhasaṃsparśā gṛhāṇeti dvayor vācor itarāṃ mṛgaya tena prayacchet* /
analyzed: sthavire yam dharma śalākā a jihmā a vaṃkā a kuṭilā suvarṇā su gandhā sukha saṃsparśā gṛhāṇa iti dvayoḥ vācoḥ itarām mṛgaya tena prayacchet

original: Vin_16.53 / yathā dharmodbhavam* [59a6] manyeta tathā cārayec channam vā vṛtaṃ vā /
analyzed: yathā dharma udbhavam manyeta tathā cārayet channam vā vṛtam vā

original: Vin_16.54 / āyusman, upādhyāyena te dharmaśalākā gṛhītā ācāryeṇa samānopādhyāyena
analyzed: āyusman upādhyāyena te dharma śalākāḥ gṛhītāḥ ācāryeṇa samāna upādhyāyena

original: samānācāryeṇāla[pta]kena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena sapremakena tvam api dharmaśalākaṃ
analyzed: samāna ācāryeṇa alaptakena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena sa premakena tvam api dharmaśalākam

original: gṛhāṇa mātretaiḥ sārdhaṃ virukṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā karṇamūle tantunāyaṃ /
analyzed: gṛhāṇa mātrā itaiḥ sārdham virukṣaṇam bhaviṣyati iti vā karṇa mūle tantunā ayam

original: Vin_16.57 / na bhedodbhavakṣāntyā nādharmyasya na jānannayo bhaviṣyattāṃ /
analyzed: na bheda udbhava kṣāntyā na adharmyasya na jānan nayaḥ bhaviṣyat tām
na adharmeṇa api evam upaśāntam khoṭayeta

original: Vin_16.61 / caturdhā taccodanāvastukamanyānuṣṭhānavaśāt pratikṛtyanapekṣaṇād unmattakṛtena ca /
analyzed: caturdhā tat codanā vastukam anya anuṣṭhāna vaśāt pratikṛti anapekṣaṇāt unmatta kṛtena ca

original: Vin_16.65 / nirvikriyasavikriyaś ca dviprakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakalasaṃghagataś ca /
analyzed: nirvikriya savikriyaḥ ca dvi prakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakala saṃgha gataḥ ca

original: Vin_16.70 / bahūnām arthe trāsaṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇaṃ /
analyzed: bahūnām arthe trā saṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇam
na a pratijñātasya vṛthā vā pratideśanāya ārūḍhiḥ
kāya vāgbhyām piṭakānām vetṛ tva madīya tvam

original: Vin_16.79 / viparyayato dharmavinayatadviparyayāṇāṃ saṃghamadhye saṃcintyeti trikānvitaṃ codakam ādṛyeran /
analyzed: viparyayataḥ dharma vinaya tad viparyayāṇām saṃgha madhye saṃcintya iti trika anvitam ca udakam

original: Vin_16.81 / saṃjñapanama saṃjñapanamarentaḥ piṭakānāṃ dhārayituran evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīrann enaṃ bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthānasthāpanena /
analyzed: piṭakānām evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīran enam bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthāna sthāpanena
arūḍhi sthāna antara saṃcāre ca codanasya

original: Vin_16.84 / pratijñānaṃ coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭasatyatve prakṛṣṭataratve ca guṇato nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇaṃ gṛhiṇo pi /
analyzed: pratijñānam coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭa satya tve prakṛṣṭatara tve ca guṇataḥ nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇam
praṇidhi karma rūpeṇa asya keḥ cit āmnānam

original: Vin_16.95 / pratipato syaitad avajñānam iti ca pratyavagatāvadarśakatvapratītāyājātatvabhāvāt* /

analyzed: na vyupaśama artham autsukyam na āpadyeran
na anarhasya pūraṇe saṃgha vyavahṛtau sabhya tvam
nta tvam cyutau jīvitāt upasaṃpadaḥ vā

original: Vin_16.103 / prakrāntāv anyena dīrgharogajātasya spṛṣṭau vā /
analyzed: prakrāntau anyena dīrgha roga jātasya spṛṣṭau vā

original: Vin_17.9 / ekasya gandhakuṭer madhye pakṣasya kartavyatā /
analyzed: ekasya gandhakuṭeḥ madhye pakṣasya kartavya tā

original: Vin_17.15 [60a3] anujāniyur anyeṣāṃ sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave vāsavastu(na)karaṇaṃ /
analyzed: anujāniyuḥ anyeṣām sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave
kalpante pratikramaṇaka bahis antar vā nagarasya

original: Vin_17.18 / vyavadhyartha bhittikaraṇena svarūpe saṃrāgapratyayaṃ vihanyuḥ /
analyzed: vyavadhi artha bhitti karaṇena sva rūpe saṃrāga pratyayam vihanyuḥ

original: Vin_17.19 / aṃjalipūraṇikayā pāyanena mātṛgrāmam anug[ṛ]hṇīta nācchinnadhārādānena /
analyzed: añjalipūraṇikayā pāyanena mātṛgrāmam anugṛhṇīta na acchinna dhārā dānena

original: Vin_17.20 / arhastu kāla[t]v[e] ntarvarṣam ā[60a4]gato lābhe /
analyzed: arhaḥ tu kāla tve ntarvarṣam lābhe

original: Vin_17.25 / nirdoṣam atadarthaṃ gatasya velāprāptau vihārāntare bhojanam* /
analyzed: nirdoṣam a tad artham gatasya velā prāptau vihāra antare bhojanam

original: Vin_17.27 / atiriktatāyāṃ bhikṣu mātrarthād grahaṇan na vihāram avyuperan* /
analyzed: atirikta tāyām bhikṣu mātṛ arthāt na vihāram
na a niryāya caura tantra tva abhāvam sa dvāram anuprayaccheta

original: Vin_17.37 / darśanamatirukṣaśaraṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mā tvaṃ jvarita iti [60a6] saṃjñayā khyāpanam ity atropāya[ḥ] /
analyzed: darśana mati rukṣa śaraṇa pṛṣṭham mā tvam jvaritaḥ iti saṃjñayā khyāpanam iti atra upāyaḥ
nivāsānām a pitṛ mātṛ ādeḥ pratyabhijñāne
na a pratyabhijñātāya sa bhaya tāyāḥ dvāram dadyuḥ

original: Vin_17.41 / utthāyaivāsau kālyam avalokayed vihāram* caityā[ṅ]ganaṃ ca /
analyzed: utthāya eva asau kālyam avalokayet vihāram caitya aṅganam ca

original: Vin_17.42 / [..] uccāraś cet tatkṛtaḥ chorayet* prasrāvaś ced u[ddhū]ṣennakharikābhilikhitaṃ cet samaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: uccāraḥ ced tad kṛtaḥ chorayet prasrāvaḥ ced uddhūṣet nakharikā abhilikhitam ced samam kuryāt

original: Vin_17.47 / dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā sām[ī]cīkaraṇapūrvakaṃ na[ḥ]kasya grahaṇāyeryapathabhajaṇaṃ /
Vin_17.61 / susvādhyāyitaṃ suparimṛṣṭaṃ niḥsaṃdhigdhaṃ kṛtvoddeśadhāraṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: su svādhyāyitam su parimṛṣṭam niḥsaṃdhigdham kṛtvā uddeśa dhāraṇam ca

original: Vin_17.69 / cāraṇe syaiṣāṃ vyāpāro bhukte ca gopane /

analyzed: avalokya tena acchaṭā śabda karaṇa pūrvakam
tat yathā anya śabda tayā bhojane su saṃvṛta tayā
su pratichanna tayā caitya vandane yathā vṛddhikayā ca

original: Vin_17.76 / tat prathato bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kākacaṭakapāra([ta])
analyzed: tat prathataḥ bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kāka caṭaka pārata
sa praṇāmām vacam andhakāra vandana sthāne niścārayet
na avandya tvam atīta āyā tad pratyayāḥ

original: Vin_17.91 / dvayaṃ paligodho bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhād aśucinā vā tadbhūmiparikarmaṇāt* /
analyzed: dvayam pali godhaḥ bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhāt aśucinā vā tad bhūmi parikarmaṇāt

original: Vin_17.92 / paligodha tatra nāgnyam ekacīvaratā cadevandane pañcamaṇḍalakena jaṃghaprapī[ḍa]nikayā ca /
analyzed: tatra eka cīvara tā pañca maṇḍalakena jaṃgha prapīḍanikayā ca

original: Vin_17.93 / na kṣut*vantaṃ jīv[e]ty abhivanded utsṛjyāntyāvayasamāgārikāṃ ca /
analyzed: na kṣutvantam jīva iti abhivandet utsṛjya antyāvayasam āgārikām ca
na āyuṣmat nāma gotra vādena tathāgatam samudācaret

original: Vin_17.98 / nāsya nirūpāpadaṃ nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt* /
analyzed: na asya nirūpā padam nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt
pratirūpam atra sthavira āyuṣmatoḥ upapada tvam

original: Vin_17.102 / gamanāgamanasaṃpannava[stu]ni navakarmiko vihāraṃ prati sthāpayet* /
analyzed: gamana āgamana saṃpanna vastuni nava karmikaḥ vihāram prati sthāpayet

original: Vin_17.106 / kāraṇam anujñāte dātrāvihārakaraṇārthād vastunas tatkaraṇabhāṇḍasya /
analyzed: kāraṇam anujñāte dātrā āvihāra karaṇa arthāt vastunaḥ tad karaṇa bhāṇḍasya

original: Vin_17.109 / bhojanaṃ navakarmakeṇa tādṛśasya yādṛśyaṃ yavane /

analyzed: ati recanam gandhakuṭi vāta agra potikayoḥ pura dvayena

original: Vin_17.115 / niravadyam eṣāṃ purojitve bharasya purodveṣṭanam* /
analyzed: niravadyam eṣām purojitve bharasya purā udveṣṭanam

original: Vin_17.116 / prārabdhasya ca vṛhatto lpasya vā karaṇārthaṃ bhañjanam* /
analyzed: prārabdhasya ca vṛhattas lpasya vā karaṇa artham bhañjanam

original: Vin_17.118 / sīrṇatānimittaṃ tulyayor api niṣṭhitayoś ca /
analyzed: sīrṇa tā nimittam tulyayoḥ api niṣṭhitayoḥ ca
jātaka ādi citra buddha vacana lekhanayoḥ ca
karaṇam a kṛtau ārabhya anyena śeṣasya

original: Vin_17.126 / deyatvam ardhotthite saṃghārthañ ce[d] utthānakasya /
Vin_17.127 / paścādbhaktaṃ taddāne kālo hemantaś ce[d] grīṣmaś ceti pūrvabhaktaṃ /

analyzed: madhye bahis saṃvṛtasya abhyantare viśālasya samudra ākṛteḥ
kṛta tvam asya a vyāma mātre kṛta tāyām

original: Vin_17.171 / grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe lohakaṇṭakānāṃ catu[61b3]ṣke py eṣu dānam /
analyzed: grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe loha kaṇṭakānām pi eṣu dānam

original: Vin_17.175 / lambanānāṃ sopānakasya karaṇam iṣṭakāmayasya sthire /
analyzed: lambanānām sopānakasya karaṇam iṣṭakā āmayasya sthire
pārāvatebhyaḥ bhuñjāna āmi viheṭhāya jāla dānam

original: Vin_17.185 / mauñje vāvalvajaḥ sāṇakaḥ kārpyāsikā iti /
naṃ kledaś ca kāṣṭhasya tasmād ayomayīnāṃ /
analyzed: nam kledaḥ ca kāṣṭhasya tasmāt ayaḥ mayīnām

original: Vin_17.192 / pānīyena prāsādasyāplavanāya varṣāsu paṭṭānāṃ dānaṃ [sta]mbhāntareṣu /
analyzed: pānīyena prāsādasya āplavanāya varṣāsu paṭṭānām dānam stambha antareṣu
āsana uttama samāna kakṣyā parimāna antānām
veṣṭika tvam ca kanthāyām pravrajita ārāmasya
mukta udaka bhrama tvam ca bhitteḥ
dvāre yakṣāṇām citraṇam vajradhara ādi hastānām

original: Vin_17.217 / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
analyzed: aupapādukānām sattvānām ghaṭi yaṃtra vat cyavamānānām upapadyamānānām ca rāga dveṣa mohānām pārāvata bhujaṃga sūkara ākāreṇa

original: Vin_17.221 / ūrdhaṃ buddhasya śuklaṃ nirvāṇamaṇḍalam upadarśayet* /
Vin_17.222 / gāthayo[62a3]r ārabdham iti dvayor adhastāt* /

analyzed: sāmantakena asya mahā prātihārya māra bhaṅgayoḥ

original: Vin_17.231 / agniśālāyāṃ mecakādi kurvatām agniṃ* ca jvālayatāṃ kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇāṃ /
analyzed: agniśālāyām mecaka ādi kurvatām agnim ca jvālayatām kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇām

original: Vin_17.232 / dānapater dīpaṃ dhārayato devadūti yasya ca /
analyzed: dānapateḥ dīpam dhārayataḥ devadūti yasya ca

original: Vin_17.233 / nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ kalaśa[hastā]nāṃ nāgakanyakānāṃ codakaṃ dhārayantīnāṃ pānīyamaṇḍape /
analyzed: nānā alaṃkāra vibhūṣitānām kalaśa hastānām nāga kanyakānām ca udakam dhārayantīnām pānīya maṇḍape

original: Vin_17.236 / na vihāre nabhyavakāśe sadhūmam agniṃ* kuryād dhārayed dhārakuṭṭime sarvaṃ /
analyzed: na vihāre na abhyavakāśe sa dhūmam agnim kuryāt dhārayet dhāra kuṭṭime sarvam
samāvartana artham ca ayaḥ mayam daṇḍa tapakam
ḍhiṃsukena api dāru mayena etad kārya sampattiḥ

original: Vin_17.242 / avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvasaṃghe [62a6] gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayāryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
analyzed: avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyām caturdaśyām ca sarva saṃghe gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayā āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena

original: Vin_17.243 / dharmotsave sekaḥ sukumāryāś ca gomayakārṣāḥ pradānam* /
analyzed: dharma utsave sekaḥ sukumāryāḥ ca gomaya kārṣāḥ pradānam

original: Vin_17.248 / ratnārthaṃ saṃmṛṣṭāmṛṣṭayor gandhakūṭipratimācaityayaṣṭichayānāṃ cāryāṃ gāthāṃ paṭhatā laṃghaṇaṃ /
analyzed: ratna artham saṃmṛṣṭa amṛṣṭayoḥ gandhakūṭi pratimā caitya yaṣṭi chayānām cāryām gāthām paṭhatā laṅghanam

original: Vin_17.249 / śayanā[62b1]sanasyānayor evāhnoḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ saṃskaraṇaṃ niḥsṛtaiḥ /

analyzed: seka saṃmārga sukumāri gomaya kārṣā pradānāni vāsa vastuni kurvīt
na prasphoṭite sa rajaska tāyām ādhāre
prajña pranīyebhyaḥ vastrasya ekasya prasphoṭane viniyogaḥ

original: Vin_17.259 / aśakyatāyāṃ cīrīkṛtya yaṣṭyām upanibadhya prasphoṭanam* /
analyzed: aśakya tāyām cīrīkṛtya yaṣṭyām upanibadhya prasphoṭanam

original: Vin_17.260 / tathāpy ayogyatve gomayamṛdāstambhasuśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam* /
analyzed: tathā api ayogya tve gomaya mṛdā stambha suśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam

original: Vin_17.262 / na dvārakoṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyāprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā vā dhāraṇaṃ kuryāt* /
analyzed: na dvāra koṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyā prajñaptim kṛtvā vā dhāraṇam kuryāt

original: Vin_17.263 / kuryād aśadrava pratipakṣeṇārtham aṣṭamīcaturdaśai prāsāde /
Vin_17.265 / kuṭimāvināśārtham* [[62b3] maṇḍalam adhaḥpādakachedaṃ kāraye[nu]ṣamuṭake cainaṃ sthāpayen natukena vā veṣṭayet* /
analyzed: maṇḍalam adhas pādaka chedam ca enam sthāpayet vā veṣṭayet
na a saṃghaḥ lekhya pādaka pīṭhaka a svīkṛtam bhajeta
na a kṛtam pratyavekṣaṇe śayyām kalpayet

original: Vin_17.275 / nāpareṇe sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃ[s]tare nyatra vā /
analyzed: na apareṇa sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃstare nyatra vā

original: Vin_17.276 / kalpayed asaṃbhave lajjī pṛtha[k] pratyāsthī[tyā]ntare vṛṣikāpātrasthāvikādi dattvā smṛtim upasthāpya /
analyzed: kalpayet asaṃbhave lajjī pṛthak dattvā smṛtim upasthāpya

original: Vin_17.277 / na trayād ūrdhaṃ pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃcarūḍhatāṃ bhajet* /
analyzed: na trayāt ūrdham pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃca rūḍha tām bhajet

original: Vin_17.280 / na trivarṣāḥ pareṇāntaritena sārdham āsanasya /
analyzed: na tri varṣāḥ pareṇa antaritena sārdham āsanasya

original: Vin_17.281 / bhaje[d] āntargṛhe [62b5] upādhyāyenāpy āsanābhāve smṛtim upasthāpya /
analyzed: bhajet ā antargṛhe upādhyāyena api āsana abhāve smṛtim upasthāpya
na kvacid gṛhiṇā an upasaṃnpannena vā
na ṣaṇṇa dṛ paṇḍaka mātṛ ghātaka ādi tīrthya tīrthya ākrāntaka steya saṃvāsika nānā saṃvāsika āsaṃvāsikaiḥ
śikṣā dattakena āsana tvam cilinimikāyāḥ sa upasaṃpad saṃgha sannipātāt anyatra

original: Vin_17.287 / saṃcāraṇe śayanāsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃcapīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśyādeḥ /
analyzed: saṃcāraṇe śayana āsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃca pīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśya ādeḥ

original: Vin_17.288 / naita[tsā]ṃghikamadayam ākarṣenniṣkarṣed dhīna tathā kuryād yathāsya
analyzed: na etat sāṃghikam adayam ākarṣet niṣkarṣet tathā kuryāt yathā asya
na asya aśuci kuṭyoḥ sānnihityam bhajet

original: Vin_17.291 / ātapanaṃ sye śoṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ chidrer gaḍakadānam* /
analyzed: ātapanam sye śoṣaṇam prasphoṭanam chidreḥ gaḍaka dānam

original: Vin_17.295 / aśakyapratisaṃskaraṇatāyāṃ dīpeṣu viniyogo vartikātvena ratnopayogeṣu pudgaladātṛkeṣv api /
Vin_17.296 / anupayajyamānasyātra kardamena bhittistambhakavāṭasuṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam ity anupratipattiḥ /
analyzed: an upayajyamānasya atra kardamena bhitti stambhaka vāṭa suṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam iti anupratipattiḥ

original: Vin_17.299 / na śa[63a2]kyaṃ sāṃghikam apaharantaṃ dṛṣ[ṭra] na nivārayet* /

analyzed: na u trāse sāṃghikam a vyupekṣeran

original: Vin_17.303 / paribhuktir asaṃbhave svasthānopanayanasya sthānāntare paribhogena /
analyzed: paribhuktiḥ asaṃbhave sva sthāna upanayanasya sthāna antare paribhogena

original: Vin_17.304 / na sthānāntarīyaṃ bhaktopakaraṇalābhaṃ sthānāntare paribhuñjīt* /
analyzed: na sthāna antarīyam bhakta upakaraṇa lābham sthāna antare paribhuñjīt

original: Vin_17.308 / nirava[d]yoṃsibhiḥ [63a3] sāṃghikasya svasyaiva nirupayojyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhasyopayogaḥ /
analyzed: niravadya oṃsibhiḥ sāṃghikasya svasya eva nirupayojyasya tṛṇa kāṣṭhasya upayogaḥ
śuddha tvam udakena pādasya etat tad bhāvane

original: Vin_17.318 / na saty arthini kṛtakṛtya āvṛddhi bhojyam* dhāray[e]t* /
analyzed: na sati arthini kṛtakṛtye bhojyam dhārayet

original: Vin_17.321 / nārthisadbhāve satyāṃ gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddhatāṃ bhajet* /
analyzed: na arthi sadbhāve satyām gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddha tām bhajet

original: Vin_17.323 / dhārayet saṃgho niṣadāṃ putrakaṃ cā[63a5]syāḥ /
Vin_17.324 / nāpitabhāṇḍañ ca suktyāṃ prakṣipya bhitto sthāpanam* /
analyzed: nāpita bhāṇḍam ca suktyām prakṣipya bhittoḥ sthāpanam

original: Vin_17.325 / vāsī ca saparaśunakhādanādi ta[d] bhāṇḍam* /
analyzed: vāsī ca sa paraśu nakha ādana ādi tat bhāṇḍam
dānam anena a mṛd mayasya bhikṣoḥ yācitaka tvena

original: Vin_17.337 / saṃbhavaty anayor ekena vacasā dānam* /

analyzed: dhāraṇam sa śabdasya śarīsṛpa ādi pratikriyā artham daṇḍasya
dhārayet chatram vā rūḍham varṇa mayam vā
na ghoṣa veśa pāna āgāra rāja kula caṇḍalā kaṭhina stha tām bhajet
na aśuci kuṭi samīpe va sthānam
na ratna bhūtena vastrena araṇye nivaset
na meru kāca cūrṇena praṇākā saṃjātāḥ
diś mārga tithi divasa nakṣatreṣu araṇyaka kuśalaḥ syāt
saktut saṃnidadhyāt natukāni madhu sarppiṣyi yathāśakti
dadīt prasrāva karaṇa dvāre prāṇaka a praveśāya vastra prabhṛti
an ālāpāne avavāda poṣadha pravāraṇa āsthāpanaiḥ enāḥ paridamayeyuḥ
na ananujñāsī eṣā bhikṣum vihāram praviśet
śūcī ghaṭikā cakrika tāṭakā kuñcikānām bandhanāya vihāre samāyojanam

original: Vin_17.382 / kṛtatām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikaṃ saṃghasthaviraḥ pṛcchet* /
analyzed: kṛta tām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikam saṃgha sthaviraḥ pṛcchet

original: Vin_17.383 / vihāramoṣe na ced baddhatvaṃ samāyuktair upadhivārikasya dāsya /
analyzed: vihāra moṣe na ced baddha tvam samāyuktaiḥ upadhi vārikasya

original: Vin_17.386 / nābaddhvā yāvad bhāvaṃ bandhanaiḥ dvāraṃ prakrāmeta /
analyzed: na ābaddhvā yāvat bhāvam bandhanaiḥ dvāram prakrāmeta

original: Vin_17.387 / śūnyāvāsaṃ cet praviśe sekādy anukuryāt* /
Vin_17.388 / bhāṇḍaṃ viprakṛtaṃ pratiśamayet* [63b6]nirmṛjya da[kṣa]maṃ cet* /

analyzed: san ced kalpa kāraḥ lpa harita tām kārayet

original: Vin_17.390 / gṛhiṇaś ced atrāgaccheyur dharmyam ebhyaṣkathām anyac ca
analyzed: gṛhiṇaḥ ced atra āgaccheyuḥ dharmyam anyat ca

original: Vin_17.403 / gṛṣme syāś cedārtham apanayaḥ pūrvasyāpi varṣāḥ svakledāntam* /
analyzed: gṛṣme syāḥ ceda artham apanayaḥ pūrvasya api varṣāḥ sva kleda antam

original: Vin_17.407 / kvacid dantakā[64a2]ṣṭhabhakṣyaṇam* kvacin mukhaśocanaṃ kvacit* pādayor ity evaṃ na tatprasṛtatayā /
analyzed: kvacid kvacid mukha śocanam kvacid pādayoḥ iti evam na tad prasṛta tayā

original: Vin_17.411 / pṛthag pravṛttyāpi pāṭhako bahutaropasthāpanakāriṇām aśakta sānukampet* /
analyzed: pṛthak pravṛttyā api pāṭhakaḥ bahutara upasthāpana kāriṇām sa anukampet
anukampeta udgṛhya tad vinayam tad uddeśa svādhyāyanika paripṛcchānika dānaiḥ

original: Vin_17.414 / [64a3] asamarthaś ca smartuṃ dhāraṇāya vinayaṃ /

analyzed: deya dharmaḥ yam amukasya idam nāmni vihāre iti

original: Vin_17.424 / na buddhavacanaṃ chandasi pade krame vā tatparāyaṇatayāropya paṭhita u[d]gṛhṇītad vahiḥ [64a4] śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ parasaṃjñapane  #
analyzed: na buddha vacanam chandasi pade krame vā tad parāyaṇa tayā āropya paṭhitaḥ udgṛhṇīta vahis śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ para saṃjñapane
ratra trayasya eṣu namasya sthāne vyāhāraḥ

original: Vin_17.434 / ārṣā gāthāṃ bhāṣaṇenainām abhimukhaṃ sthitvā saṃbo[64a5]dhyachaṭāśabdenāyanaprāpto 'nugṛhṇī[tā] /
analyzed: ārṣāḥ gāthām bhāṣaṇena enām abhimukham sthitvā

original: Vin_17.437 / tadbhāṇḍa samutsṛjya śastrakośaṃ sūcīgṛhakaṃ melaṃdukaṃ ca /
analyzed: samutsṛjya śastra kośam sūcī gṛhakam melaṃdukam ca

original: Vin_17.438 / upatiṣṭhet kuśalaś cikitsayā tīrthyaṃ puṇyabhiprāyenānabhṛtikayā /
analyzed: upatiṣṭhet kuśalaḥ cikitsayā tīrthyam puṇya abhiprāyena anabhṛtikayā

original: Vin_17.440 / gacchet tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sāv upadrave vyapadiśya /
analyzed: gacchet tad rūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sau upadrave vyapadiśya
granthanam ca ratna artham mālā guṇānām
lekhanam ca ratna pūja bhūtasya a sattva kṛteḥ ālekhyasya

original: Vin_17.447 / dahanam asya na cet saprāṇakavraṇatvaṃ /
analyzed: dahanam asya na ced sa prāṇaka vraṇa tvam

original: Vin_17.460 / arhatvam asya pravrajitānāṃ kalyāṇa[ñ] cet* /
analyzed: arha tvam asya pravrajitānām kalyāṇam ced
jagatī catuṣkam jaṅghā aṇḍaka harmikā yaṣṭayaḥ trayodaśa chatrāṇi

original: Vin_17.464 / phalaparimāṇaiḥ chatrair ekādhikair asya śravakānāṃ /
analyzed: phala parimāṇaiḥ chatraiḥ eka adhikaiḥ asya śravakānām

original: Vin_17.465 / tathāgatapā[rśva]deśavaivṛttatā cet tasyāṃ diśi karaṇaṃ yatraiṣāṃ
analyzed: tathāgata pārśva deśa vaivṛtta tā ced tasyām diśi karaṇam yatra eṣām
tad parivāra dāne ca sthānam abhūt
bahis eṣām saṃgha ārāmāt kartavya tvam
sabrahmacāriṇām śravaka stūpe niryātitasya isi tvam
dharmyam buddhasya loha mayam stūpa karaṇam
suvarṇa rūpya vaidūrya sphaṭika mayānām keśa nakha stūpānām ca
tuṣita bhavana vāsa ādi parinirvāṇa antam vṛttam tad ākhyam

original: Vin_17.482 / siṃ*hadhvajo makaradhvajo nāgarājadhvajo vṛṣabhadhvaja iti /

analyzed: taila āla candana kuṅkuma śekānām ca

original: Vin_17.489 / na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati /
analyzed: na kaṇṭakānām ropaṇam nāga dantakānām māsa saṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati

original: Vin_17.491 / noparidīpadānaṃ āgārikaiṣpūjanārtham adhirohaṇam abhāve śramaṇodd[e]śaiṣpādo prakṣālya gandhodakena /
analyzed: na upari dīpa dānam āgārika aiṣpūjana artham adhirohaṇam abhāve prakṣālya gandha udakena

original: Vin_17.492 / na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
analyzed: na ced anena gandhaiḥ udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñām āmukhīkṛtya artham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ

original: Vin_17.493 / teṣām api bhikṣubhi[64b6]r evam eva /
Vin_17.502 / [65a1] // navakeṣv asya prāptiḥ paṃcabhiḥ nikāyaiḥ parivāradānaṃ /
Vin_17.504 / vāditreṇaitadvādyamānena sār[d]vanyena ca mahatā sa[t]kāreṇa nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam*
analyzed: vāditreṇa etad vādyamānena sārdvanyena ca mahatā satkāreṇa nirāvadyam vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa śāstuḥ pūjām iti udīraṇam

original: ] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti bhujādāvāropitasya [65a2] hastiskandhe cha[tra]dhvajapatākāparivṛtasya
analyzed: sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvas paraśvas vā bhaviṣyat tāyām likhitasya iti buddha praveśaḥ bhaviṣyati iti bhuja ādau āropitasya hasti skandhe chatra dhvaja patākā parivṛtasya

original: Vin_17.507 / dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
analyzed: dhvajaiḥ asyāḥ parivāraḥ vedikayā āveṣṭanam loha stambheḥ ca

original: Vin_17.510 / ābharaṇapratiyuktir utsṛjya pādābharaṇaṃ karṇapūraṃ ca /
analyzed: ābharaṇa pratiyuktiḥ utsṛjya pāda ābharaṇam karṇapūram ca

original: Vin_17.517 / abhisārasya niḥśritais taruṇavṛddheś ca nayanam* /
analyzed: abhisārasya niḥśritaiḥ taruṇa vṛddheḥ ca nayanam

original: Vin_17.519 / pālaśamudgakasya rathe karaṇaṃ gandhasamu[dga]kena samvidhānam* /
Vin_17.521 / samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye maṇḍanāpanamanam* /
analyzed: samāptāyām pūjāyām nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte jana kāye maṇḍana apanamanam
śayana āsana vastu kṣudraka ādi gatam
samāptam ca śayana āsana vastu paścimam

original: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsaṃ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
analyzed: dhāraṇam vipravāsam ca sparśam agneḥ nivārite

original: bhojanaṃ bījāghātaṃ ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ //
analyzed: bhojanam bīja āghātam ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ

original: utsargaṃ vṛkṣārohaś ca śaikṣā u[65a5]ddeśāyos saha /
analyzed: utsargam vṛkṣa ārohaḥ ca śaikṣā saha
bhūmi praroha ghātābhyām ca sūtra gatam
pravṛṣe katra vasanam poṣadhaḥ sa pravāraṇāḥ

original: ityādy asyāntabhāg liṅga yāñcā bhāṇḍopabhugdrava kāmopabhoga saṃvāsānād
analyzed: ityādi asya anta bhāj liṅga bhāṇḍa upabhuj drava kāma upabhoga
trayam kiṃcitka catuṣṭayam gaṇa mṛta sīmni ratnataḥ
chanda saṃmṛṣṭa saṃsparśāt catuṣṭayam bhavati paścimam

original: vidhāraṇaṃ saptakaṃ dve cānye dhāraṇādhiṣṭhānoddhārānuddhāra iti //
analyzed: vidhāraṇam saptakam dve ca anye dhāraṇa adhiṣṭhāna uddhāra anuddhāre iti
hiraṇya anya cīvara āsana varṣaka jana saṃgha artham vacana pala saṃcataḥ niṣprayojane

original: hitvānuddhṛto cānuśāṭī ca dvādaśaparṣya nalaṣaṭkaṃ cīvaraṃ
analyzed: ca anuśāṭī ca nala ṣaṭkam cīvaram
saṃkṣepasya anu an anu vyabhiśoka bhaṇḍanam

original: [65b1] jatvaṅgulitalaromachannau ca karṇakagrahaṇe bhikṣoś ca vidyāpāṭhanamocana
analyzed: jatu aṅguli tala roma channau ca karṇaka grahaṇe bhikṣoḥ ca vidyā pāṭhana mocana

original: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttanamaṃcaka unmuroṭikā gandhapiṇyākataḥ /
analyzed: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttana maṃcake unmuroṭikā gandha piṇyākataḥ
snā ā uśīra phala kurva tri śīrṣāṇām kārṇaṅ kāravṛddha ādi
chatra upānahaḥ āsandī niṣāda ari karttanam coḍā
vyathana avasyaṇḍana krośa anaseka a vyupaśayanataḥ
chanda avavāda poṣadha varṣa prāvaraṇa kaṭhina uddhāra bhājana varṣā kāla caryā cara

original: jñapanaṃ sekavākyañ ca satyavākyañ ca tadyathā /
analyzed: jñapanam seka vākyam ca satya vākyam ca tat yathā
rahaḥ untaḥ prasrayoḥ artha poṣadhasya atra sā yadi
saṃghe vaimatike ca asyām vivāda niṣṭhita tvayoḥ
pravāraṇa gate ca atra sarvasmin ardhapañcake
varṣa upagamane ca eva mṛta arthe prativastunā
dāne vstrasya gaṇān catuṣke kula samvṛti
tad prasrabdhyau kubje ca sa unmajje jñapti mātrakam
śayyā āsana gṛha gāṇām kalpa bhūmeḥ ca sat mati
vihāraḥ deśika ādīnām sthala stha vyūḍha nāyakam
a prasāda pravedau a vaditroḥ vana vedinaḥ
a vandana anala artham ca daṇḍa śikṣā artham eva ca
eka lābha kriyāyām ca śikṣaṇā na
putre jñātau bahiryāne jñapanam śaikṣya āvāsanam
upasaṃpādanam tīrthya vāsa dānam ca mocanam

original: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānaṃ ca poṣadhasya ca saptakaṃ //
analyzed: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānam ca poṣadhasya ca saptakam
ṣaṭkam ca smṛti asaṃmūḍha tatsvabhāva gam aṣṭakam
ājñapta dhvasta dānam ca jñapanam satri vācanam
anena puṇyena sarveṣām loka piṭaka bhājanam

original: śākyabhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattvārthe likhitaṃ śrīmad vikramaśilām āśritya
analyzed: śākya bhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattva arthe likhitam śrīmat vikramaśilām āśritya

original: gnur chos kyi grags pas bris pa /
analyzed: gnuḥ chos kyi grags pas bris pa

original: dpal ldan 'vyri krama śi lar dpye 'sla ra va la
analyzed: dpal ldan vy ri krama śi lar dpye sla ra va la
gnuḥ dharmakīrttinā śrīmat vikramaśilāyām phālguṇe māse

original: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa (= śīlākaraṇe likhitam)
analyzed: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa  śīla akaraṇe likhitam

original: gnur dha rma kir tis bris pa jo ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin /
analyzed: gnuḥ dha rma kis tis bris pa jaḥ ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin

original: etasya dharmakīrtter vaṇanaṃ debler sro po granthe /
analyzed: etasya dharma kīrtteḥ vaṇanam debleḥ sro paḥ granthe
